Aatrox.name: Aatrox
Aatrox.title: the Darkin Blade
Aatrox.lore:
Aatrox is a legendary warrior, one of only five that remain of an ancient race known as the Darkin. He wields his massive blade with grace and poise, slicing through legions in a style that is hypnotic to behold. With each foe felled, Aatrox's seemingly living blade drinks in their blood, empowering him and fueling his brutal, elegant campaign of slaughter.

The earliest tale of Aatrox is as old as recorded history. It tells of a war between two great factions remembered only as the Protectorate and the Magelords. Over time, the Magelords won a series of crushing victories, leaving them on the brink of obliterating their sworn enemy forever. On the day of their final confrontation, the Protectorate army found themselves outnumbered, exhausted, and poorly equipped. They braced for inevitable defeat.

Just when all hope seemed lost, Aatrox appeared among the ranks of the Protectorate. With but a few words, he urged the soldiers to fight to the last before throwing himself into battle. His presence inspired the desperate warriors. At first, they could only watch in awe as this unknown hero cleaved through their enemies, his body and blade moving in unison as if one being. Soon, the warriors found themselves imbued with a potent thirst for battle. They followed Aatrox into the fray, each fighting with the furious strength of ten until they had won a most unlikely victory.

Aatrox vanished after that battle, but the Protectorate army's newfound fury did not. Their surprising triumph led to many more until they were able to finally return home victorious. Their countrymen hailed them as heroes, but though they had saved their entire civilization from destruction, darkness lingered in the mind of each warrior. Something within them had changed. Over time, their memories of battle faded, only to be replaced with a grim revelation: their acts of heroism were, in fact, brutal atrocities committed by their own hands.

Tales like these appear among the myths of many cultures. If they are all to be believed, Aatrox's presence has changed the course of some of the most important wars in history. Though these stories remember him as a savior in dark times, Aatrox's true legacy may be a world filled with conflict and strife.

''Some fight for honor, some fight for glory. It matters only that you fight.''
-- Aatrox
Aatrox.blurb: Aatrox is a legendary warrior, one of only five that remain of an ancient race known as the Darkin. He wields his massive blade with grace and poise, slicing through legions in a style that is hypnotic to behold. With each foe felled, Aatrox's ...
allytips: Avoid engaging in a fight with low health unless your Blood Well is full so that you regain enough health to continue fighting.
Building Life Steal can be very potent on Aatrox to help compensate for his health costs.
Massacre is great at turning the tide of a battle, make sure to use it at the right moment to maximize the benefits from it.
enemytips: When Aatrox takes fatal damage he is healed for the amount currently in his resource bar, landing a fatal blow on him while the resource bar is low will result in him reviving with a lower amount of health.
When Aatrox casts Dark Flight towards your location, avoid being knocked up by moving away from the center of  impact.
Aatrox is auto attack reliant for most of his damage and survivability, reducing his attack speed by purchasing Randuins Omen or Frozen Heart can help reduce both of those components greatly.

spells.name: Dark Flight
spells.description: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies and knocking up targets at the center of impact for {{ e5 }} second.

spells.name: Blood Thirst / Blood Price
spells.description: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage every third subsequent attack at the expense of his own Health. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
spells.tooltip:
While toggled off Aatrox benefits from Blood Thirst, while toggled on Blood Price is activated and removes Blood Thirst.

Blood Thirst: Every third attack, Aatrox restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f5 }}) when below half Health.

Blood Price: Every third attack, Aatrox deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus physical damage and loses {{ f4 }} Health.

spells.name: Blades of Torment
spells.description: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing damage to all enemies hit and slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Massacre
spells.description: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, damaging all nearby enemy champions around him and gaining increased Attack Speed and bonus Attack Range for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions around him, increasing his Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}%, and gaining 175 Attack Range for 12 seconds.

passive.name: Blood Well
passive.description: When using an ability that costs Health, Aatrox stores the self-inflicted damage into the Blood Well. Upon taking fatal damage Aatrox extracts the blood from the well and recovers it as health over a brief duration. Additionally, Aatrox gains 1% Attack Speed for every 2% blood that is in the well.

Ahri.name: Ahri
Ahri.title: the Nine-Tailed Fox
allytips: Gunakan Charm untuk mengatur combo Anda, akan membuat pemberian Orb of Deception dan Fox-Fire lebih mudah secara drastis.
Buka pertempuran dengan Charm, dan kejar musuh yang melarikan diri dengan Spirit Rush.
Spirit Rush mengaktifkan ability Ahri, membuka jalan untuk Charm, membantu memukul ganda dengan Orb of Deception, dan menutup untuk menggunakan Fox-Fire.

spells.name: Orb of Deception
spells.description: Ahri mengirim dan menarik orb-nya, memberikan magic damage pada waktu keluar dan true damage pada waktu kembali.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on the way out, and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage on the way back.

spells.name: Fox-Fire
spells.description: Ahri melepaskan tiga fox-fires, yang mengunci dan menyerang musuh di dekatnya.
spells.tooltip: Releases three fox-fires that lock on to nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies hit with multiple fox-fires take 50% damage from each additonal fox-fire.

spells.name: Charm
spells.description: Ahri meniupkan sebuah ciuman yang melukai dan men-charm musuh yang dijumpainya, menyebabkan mereka berjalan dengan aman ke arahnya.
spells.tooltip: Blows a kiss dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms an enemy causing them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Spirit Rush
spells.description: Ahri dash ke depan dan menembakkan essence bolt, melukai 3 musuh di dekatnya (memprioritaskan Champion). Spirit Rush dapat di-cash hingga tiga kali sebelum cooldown.
spells.tooltip: Nimbly dashes forward firing 3 essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Can be cast up to three times within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.

passive.name: Essence Theft
passive.description: Mendapatkan sebuah charge Essence Theft ketika sebuah spell mengenai musuh (maks: 3 charge per spell). Saat mencapai 9 charge, spell berikutnya memiliki 35% Spell Vamp.

Akali.name: Akali
Akali.title: the Fist of Shadow
allytips: Akali excels at killing weaker characters. Let your team initiate and then strike at the people in the back.
Find the balance between storing Essence of Shadows, and using Shadow Dance before having max charges.

spells.name: Mark of the Assassin
spells.description: Akali memutar kama-nya pada target untuk meberikan magic damage dan menandai target selama 6 detik. Serangan melee Akali terhadap target yang ditandai akan men-trigger dan mengkonsumsi tanda tersebut untku memberikan tambahan damage dan memulihkan Energy.
spells.tooltip:
Akali throws her kama at a target enemy to deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and mark the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will consume the mark to cause {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and restore {{ e2 }} Energy.

spells.name: Twilight Shroud
spells.description: Akali melemparkan pelindung asap. Ketikda dalam area, Akali mendapatkan Armor dan Magic Resist dan menjadi invisible. Menyerang atau menggunakan ability akan me-reveal dirinya segera Musuh di dalam asap akan dikurangi Movement Speed mereka.
spells.tooltip:
Akali throws down a cover of smoke that lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds. While inside the area, Akali gains {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist and becomes invisible. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

Enemies inside the smoke are slowed by {{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: Crescent Slash
spells.description: Akali mengembangkan kama-nya, memberikan damage berdasarkan Attack Damage dan Ability Power.
spells.tooltip:
Akali flourishes her kamas, slicing nearby enemy units for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Triggers Mark of the Assassin on targets affected by it.

spells.name: Shadow Dance
spells.description: Akali bergerak melallui bayangan untuk secara cepat memukul targetnya, memberikan damage dan mengkonsumsi sebuah Essence of Shadow charge. Akali me-recharge Essence of Shadow charge secara berkala dan saat kill dan assist, maks 3 stack.
spells.tooltip:
Akali moves through shadows to quickly strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Akali stores an Essence of Shadow on kills and assists as well as every {{ f1 }} seconds up to {{ e4 }} total.

passive.name: Twin Disciplines
passive.description:
Discipline of Force: Akali's basic attacks deal an additional 6% bonus magic damage, increasing by 1% for every 6 Ability Power.

Discipline of Might: Akali gains 6% Spell Vamp, increasing by 1% for every 6 Bonus Attack Damage.

Alistar.name: Alistar
Alistar.title: the Minotaur
allytips: Menggunakan Pulverize dapat memungkinkan Anda menentukan posisi yang lebih baik untuk Headbutt.
Movement speed sangat penting pada Alistar. Pertimbangkan pembelian boot dengan hati-hati.
Menggunakan Flash dapat memungkinkan Anda mengejar target yang lengah untuk mendorong mereka kembali ke sekutu Anda dengan Pulverize dan Headbutt.

spells.name: Pulverize
spells.description: Alistar smashes the ground, memberikan damage to all musuh di dekat dan tossing them into the air.  On landing, enemies are stunned.
spells.tooltip: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and tossing all nearby enemy units into the air, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Headbutt
spells.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, memberikan damage dan knocking the target back.
spells.tooltip: Alistar charges at an enemy and rams them, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them while knocking them back.

spells.name: Triumphant Roar
spells.description: Alistar lets out a commanding war cry, restoring health to himself dan nearby friendly units for half the amount.  Can be cast more often if musuh di dekat are dying.
spells.tooltip: Restores {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to Alistar and half as much to nearby allies. Cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} seconds each time a nearby enemy unit dies.

spells.name: Unbreakable Will
spells.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, gaining bonus damage, removing all crowd-control effects on himself, dan reducing incoming physical dan magical damage for the duration.
spells.tooltip: Removes disables from Alistar, and Alistar gains {{ e3 }} Attack Damage and takes {{ e4 }}% reduced physical and magic damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

passive.name: Trample
passive.description: Setiap kali Alistar meng-cast sebuah spell, dia men-Trample unit dan turret di dekatnya selama beberapa detik, memberikan damage kepada unit yang dia lalui.

Amumu.name: Amumu
Amumu.title: the Sad Mummy
allytips: Amumu sangat bergantung pada teammate, jadi coba untuk laning dengan teman-teman Anda untuk efektivitas maksmimum.
Cooldown Reduction pada Amumu sangat kuat, tetapi sering kali sulit untuk merincikan hal tersebut. Ambil buff Golem bila memungkinkan untuk mendapatkan Cooldown Reduction tanpa mengorbankan stat.
Despair sangat efektif melawan tanker yang lain, jadi pastikan Anda berada di dalam jangkauan lawan dengan Health tertinggi.

spells.name: Bandage Toss
spells.description: Amumu men-toss perban yang lengkat pada target, men-stun dan melukai target ketika dia menarik dirinya ke mereka.
spells.tooltip: Throws a bandage to target location. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu will pull himself to the enemy, stun them, and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Despair
spells.description: Dikuasai oleh kesedihan mendalam, musuh di dekat kehilangan sebuah persentase dari maksimum health mereka setiap detik.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Nearby enemies take {{ e2 }} magic damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum health each second.

spells.name: Tantrum
spells.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take.  Amumu can unleash his rage, memberikan damage to surrounding enemies. Setiap kali Amumu is hit, the cooldown on tantrum is reduced by 0.5 detik.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} reduced damage from physical attacks.

Active: Amumu deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.

spells.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
spells.description: Amumu menjerat unit musuh di sekeliling dengan perban melukai mereka dan membuat mereka tidak dapat menyerang atau bergerak.
spells.tooltip: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and preventing attacks and movement for 2 seconds.

passive.name: Cursed Touch
passive.description: Serangan Amumu mengurangi Magic Resistance target untuk waktu yang singkat.

Anivia.name: Anivia
Anivia.title: the Cryophoenix
allytips: Tempatkan Flash Frost dengan Frostbite dapat membuat kombinasi yang mematikan.
Anivia sangat bergantung kepada Mana untuk Glacial Storm, cobalah mendapatkan item dengan Mana atau cari buff Crest of the Ancient Golem di Summoner's Rift.
Di early game, telurnya dapat menjadi sangat susah bagi Champion musuh untuk membunuh. Raih keuntungan dengan bermain agresif.

spells.name: Flash Frost
spells.description: Anivia brings her wings together dan summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling dan damaging anyone in its path. When the lance explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.
spells.tooltip:
A massive chunk of ice flies toward target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and chilling targets, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%.

At the end of its range or if Anivia activates the spell again, the missile detonates, doing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a small area and stunning units for {{ e4 }} second.

spells.name: Crystallize
spells.description: Anivia memadatkan uap air di udara menjadi dinding es yang tidak dapat dilalui untuk menahan semua movement. Dinding hanya bertahan dalam waktu yang singkat sebelum mencair.
spells.tooltip: Anivia summons an impassable wall of ice {{ e2 }} units wide, blocking all movement. The wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds before it melts.

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, memberikan a medium amount of damage. If the target has been slowed by an ice effect, the damage they take is doubled.
spells.tooltip: Anivia blasts her target with a freezing wind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If the target is chilled, they take double damage.

spells.name: Glacial Storm
spells.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice dan hail to damage her enemies dan slow their advance.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second and chilling targets, slowing their Attack and Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}%.

Drains {{ e2 }} Mana per second.

passive.name: Rebirth
passive.description: Saat mati, Anivia akan kembali menjadi sebutir telur. Jika telur dapat bertahan selama 6 detik, dia akan dilahirkan kembali dengan mulia.

Annie.name: Annie
Annie.title: the Dark Child
allytips: Menyimpan sebuah stun untuk digunakan dengan ultimate-nya dapat membalikkan keadaan pertempuran.
Memberikan killing blows pada minion dengan Disintegrate membuat Annie dapat farm dengan sangat baik di awal game.
Molten Shield adalah spell yang bagus untuk di-cast agar dapat bekerja dengan stun Annie, jadi kadangkala menguntungkan untuk mengambil setidaknya 1 ranking di awal.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.description: Annie hurls a mana-infused fireball, memberikan damage dan refunding the mana cost if it destroys the target.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Mana cost is refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.

spells.name: Incinerate
spells.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, memberikan damage to all enemies in the area.
spells.tooltip: Casts a cone of fire dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area.

spells.name: Molten Shield
spells.description: Meningkatkan Annie's Armor dan Magic Resist dan damages enemies who hit Annie with basic attack.
spells.tooltip: Increases Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} for {{ e3 }} seconds. Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies who attack Annie with basic attacks.

spells.name: Summon: Tibbers
spells.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, memberikan damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack dan also burns enemies that stand near him.
spells.tooltip:
Tibbers appears in a burst of flame dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area.

For the next {{ e6 }} seconds, Tibbers chases down enemies and deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby foes.

Tibbers can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

passive.name: Pyromania
passive.description: Setelah meng-cast 4 spell, offensive spell Annie berikutnya akan men-stun target selama 1.75 detik.

Ashe.name: Ashe
Ashe.title: the Frost Archer
allytips: Coba tembakkan Enchanted Crystal Arrow di arah yang sama musuh bergerak, sehingga cenderung akan mengenainya.
Summoner Teleport dapat digunakan setelah Enchanted Crystal Arrow untuk menyerang unit yang jauh ketika mereka di-stun.
Hawkshot me-reveal unit di brush. Jika sebuah pertempuran terjadi di hutan, dapat memberikan keuntungan yang signifikan.

spells.name: Frost Shot
spells.description: While active, setiap of Ashe's basic attack slow her targets. This drains Mana with setiap attack.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Basic attacks slow enemies by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Volley
spells.description: Ashe fires 7 arrows in a cone for increased damage.  Volley also applies Ashe's current level of Frost Shot.
spells.tooltip: Fires arrows in a cone, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Volley applies Frost Shot's slow effect.

spells.name: Hawkshot
spells.description: Setiap kali Ashe kill sebuah unit, she mendapatkan beberapa tambahan gold. Ashe dapat mengaktigkan untuk mengirimkan Hawk Spirit untuk misi pengintaian.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e1 }} extra gold whenever Ashe kills an enemy.

Active: Reveals terrain as it flies toward target location. Grants vision for 5 seconds.

Total Gold Retrieved: {{ f1 }} gold.

spells.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
spells.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line.  If the arrow collides with an Champion musuh, it deals damage dan stuns the Champion for hingga 3.5 detik, berdasarkan how far the arrow has traveled.  In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage dan are slowed.
spells.tooltip: Launches a crystal arrow of ice in a line that stuns an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The farther the arrow flies, the longer the stun, up to {{ e2 }} seconds. Surrounding enemies are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds and take half damage.

passive.name: Focus
passive.description: Ketika di luar pertempuran, Critical Strike chance Ashe meningkat setiap 3 detik untuk serangan berikutnya.

Blitzcrank.name: Blitzcrank
Blitzcrank.title: the Great Steam Golem
allytips: Combo 1-2-3 dari Rocket Grab, Power Fist, dan Static Field dapat menghancurkan lawan tunggal.
Menggunakan cengkraman Blitzcrank untuk menarik seorang musuh ke range tower Anda diikuti dengan Power Fist akan membuat tower memberikan beberapa tembakan ke mereka.

spells.name: Rocket Grab
spells.description: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, memberikan damage dan dragging it back to him.
spells.tooltip: Blitzcrank fires his right hand, if it encounters an enemy unit it will stun them and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage while he pulls them to himself.

spells.name: Overdrive
spells.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased movement dan attack speed.
spells.tooltip: Blitzcrank supercharges himself to increase Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and attack speed by {{ e2 }}% for 8 seconds.

spells.name: Power Fist
spells.description: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack memberikan double damage dan pop his target up in the air.
spells.tooltip: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double his total attack damage as physical damage and pop his target up in the air.

spells.name: Static Field
spells.description: secara pasif causes lightning bolts to damage a nearby enemy. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage musuh di dekat dan silence them for 0.5 detik, but doing so removes the passive lightning until Static Field becomes available again.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Lightning arcs off of Blitzcrank to hit a random nearby enemy for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every 2.5 seconds.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and silences surrounding enemy units for 0.5 seconds. The passive is not in effect during the cooldown.

passive.name: Mana Barrier
passive.description: Ketika life Blitzcrank berada di bawah 20% health, dia mengaktifkan Mana Barrier. Dia membuat perisai mana sebesar 50% dari mana-nya selama 10 detik. Mana Barrier hanya dapat muncul sekali setiap 90 detik.

Brand.name: Brand
Brand.title: the Burning Vengeance
allytips: Anda dapat menghalangi musuh untuk berada di dekat minion mereka dengan membakar mereka, dikarenakan Conflagration.
Anda dapat menggunakan ability Brand dalam berbagai variasi kombinasi untuk memaksimalkan damage-nya dalam berbagai situasi.
Pyroclasm memantul di antara musuh secara acak, jadi coba meng-cast-nya pada sebuah grup musuh kecil jika Anda menginginkannya untuk mengenai target yang sama beberapa kali.

spells.name: Sear
spells.description: Brand meluncurkan bola api ke depan yang memberikan magic damage. Jika target terbakar, Sear akan men-stun target selama 2 detik.
spells.tooltip:
Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Pillar of Flame
spells.description: Setelah delay sebentar, Brand membuat pilar api pada area target, memberikan magic damage kepada unit musuh dalam area. Unit yang terbakar menerima tambahan 25% damage.
spells.tooltip:
After a short delay, Brand creates a pillar of flame at a target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy units within the area.

Blaze: Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.

spells.name: Conflagration
spells.description: Brand memunculkan ledakan kuat pada targetnya, memberikan magic damage kepada mereka. Jika target terbakar, Conflagration menyebar kepada musuh-musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip:
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.

spells.name: Pyroclasm
spells.description: Brand melepaskan semburan api yang menghancurkan, memberikan magic damage setiap kali memantul. Jika.target terbakar, Pyroclasm akan memprioritaskan Champion untuk pantulan berikutnya.
spells.tooltip:
Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each time it bounces up to 5 bounces.

Blaze: If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will prioritize champions for the next bounce.

passive.name: Blaze
passive.description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 8% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 4 seconds.

Caitlyn.name: Caitlyn
Caitlyn.title: the Sheriff of Piltover
allytips: Manfaatkan Yordle Snap Traps-nya dengan menempatkannya terlebih dahulu untuk memastikan Anda masih memiliki satu lagi yang tidak cooldown selama pertempuran.
Hindari menggunakan Ace in the Hole di team melee yang besar karena mungkin akan menahan target yang salah.
Tembakkan 90 Caliber Net menjauh dari lawan untuk menutup celah atau melompati dinding.

spells.name: Piltover Peacemaker
spells.description: Caitlyn memutar senjatanya selama 1 detik untuk melepaskkan sebuah penetrating shot yang memberikan physical damage (memberikan lebih sedikit damage kepada target beruntun).
spells.tooltip: Revs the rifle for {{ e4 }} second to fire a piercing shot dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Deals {{ e2 }}% less damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of {{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: Yordle Snap Trap
spells.description: Caitlyn menyiapkan sebuah perangkap untuk mencari yordles yang licik. Ketika terperangkat, meng-immobilize Champion, me-reveal mereka untuk waktu yang singkat, dan memberikan magic damage selama 1.5 detik.
spells.tooltip: Sets a trap that an enemy Champion can spring immobilizing and revealing them for a short duration. The trap deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds, and lasts for {{ e4 }} minutes. Only 3 traps may be active at once.

spells.name: 90 Caliber Net
spells.description: Caitlyn menembakkan jaring yang berat untuk men-slow targetnya. Recoil mendorong Caitlyn ke belakang.
spells.tooltip: Fires a net dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing an enemy by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second(s). Knocks Caitlyn back.

spells.name: Ace in the Hole
spells.description: Caitlyn membutuhkan waktu untuk memberikan tembakan yang sempurna, memberikan damage besar kepada sebuah target tunggal pada range yang besar. Champion musuh dapat menahan peluru untuk sekutu mereka.
spells.tooltip: Takes a second to line up the perfect shot, firing a bullet at an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage at {{ e2 }} range. Other enemy Champions can intercept the bullet.

passive.name: Headshot
passive.description: Setiap beberapa attack, Caitlyn akan menembakkan sebuah headshot yang memberikan 150% damage kepada Champion atau 250% damage kepada minion.

Cassiopeia.name: Cassiopeia
Cassiopeia.title: the Serpent's Embrace
allytips: Gunakan Twin Fang pada target yang tidak bergerak yang diracun seperti monster dan unit yang di-stun oleh Petrifying Gaze-nya untuk maksimum damage.
Pimpin musuh Anda ketika menargetkan dengan Noxious Blast untuk memastikan mengenainya.
Jangan ragu untuk meng-cast spell Anda dengan cepat karena Deadly Cadence membuat setiap tambahan cast menjadi lebih murah.

spells.name: Noxious Blast
spells.description: Cassiopeia menghancurkan sebuah area dengan racun ber-damage tinggi yang delay, memberikannya peningkatan Movement Speed jika dia mengenai Champion.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia blasts an area with a delayed high damaging poison, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds and granting her {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds if she hits a champion.

spells.name: Miasma
spells.description: Cassiopeia melepaskan sebuah awan beracun, melukai ringan dan men-slow setiap musuh yang melewatinya.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia releases a growing cloud of poison that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Any enemy that passes through it is poisoned for {{ e3 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second and slowing them by {{ e2 }}%. Continual exposure renews this poison.

spells.name: Twin Fang
spells.description: Cassiopeia mengurangi serangan yang melukai pada targetnya. Jika target diracun, cooldown spell ini akan di-refresh.
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to her target. If the target is poisoned then Twin Fang's cooldown is reduced to {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Petrifying Gaze
spells.description: Cassiopeia melepaskan pusaran magical energy dari matanya, men-stun setiap musuh di depannya yang menatapnya dan men-slow yang lainnya yang memunggunginya
spells.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

passive.name: Deadly Cadence
passive.description: Setelah meng-cast sebuah spell, setiap spellcast berikutnya akan berharga 10% lebih sedikit Mana selama 5 detik (efek stack hingga 5 kali).

Chogath.name: Cho'Gath
Chogath.title: the Terror of the Void
allytips: Penggunaan Rupture dan Feral Scream dapat menyebabkan kelaparan mana, tetapi bila berpasangan dengan Champion seperti Soraka atau Champion dengan Mana Manipulator, menggunakan kedua skill di awal dapat memberikan hasil yang positif.
Jika Anda memiliki masalah melahap Champion, cobalah memakan minion hingga Anda menjadi lebih besar.
Menggunakan Rupture pada creep dengan kombinasi Carnivore adalah cara yang baik untuk mendapatkan health dan mana.

spells.name: Rupture
spells.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, memberikan damage dan slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for 1 second, take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, and are slowed by 60% for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Feral Scream
spells.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, memberikan magic damage dan Silencing enemies for a few detik.
spells.tooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} second(s) and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Vorpal Spikes
spells.description: Cho'Gath's attack secara pasif release deadly spikes, memberikan damage to all enemy units in front of him.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Spikes grow wider as Cho'gath levels.

spells.name: Feast
spells.description: Devours an enemy unit, memberikan a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maksimum health (maksimum 6 stack). Cho'Gath loses half of his stack upon death.
spells.tooltip:
Hungrily devours an enemy dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to Champions, or 1000 (+{{ a1 }}) true damage to minions.

If the enemy is killed by Feast, Cho'Gath grows, gaining {{ e3 }} maximum Health (maximum 6 stacks). Loses half of his stacks on death.

passive.name: Carnivore
passive.description: Ketika Cho'Gath membunuh sebuah unit, dia memulihkan health dan mana. Nilai yang dipulihkan bertambah dengan level Cho'Gath level.

Corki.name: Corki
Corki.title: the Daring Bombardier
allytips: Phosphorous Bomb dapat digunakan untuk me-reveal unit musuh yang mungkin bersembunyi di brush di dekat.
Valkyrie dapat digunakan secara defensive juga, jadi coba menggunakannya untuk melarikan diri dengan cepat.
Corki dapat melanjutkan untuk menyerang ketika menggunakan Gatling Gun. Memaksimalkan Gatling Gun adalah kunci untuk menguasai penggunaan Corki.

spells.name: Phosphorus Bomb
spells.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location. This attack reveals non-stealthed units around the blast dan Champion for 6 detik.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in a target area. In addition, the blast reveals the area and champions hit by the blast for 6 seconds (does not reveal stealth).

spells.name: Valkyrie
spells.description: Corki terbang ke lokasi target, menjatuhkan bom yang membuat jejak kehancuran untuk lawan yang diam di dalam api.
spells.tooltip: Corki surges to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to enemies in the fire left along his path.

spells.name: Gatling Gun
spells.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, memberikan damage dan reducing enemy armor.
spells.tooltip: Corki's gatling gun fires at all targets in front of him for {{ e1 }} seconds, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and reducing {{ e2 }} armor per second. The armor reduction stacks and lasts 2 seconds.

spells.name: Missile Barrage
spells.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, memberikan damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores one missile every 12 detik hingga 7 missiles total. Every 4th missile will be a Big One, memberikan extra damage.
spells.tooltip:
Corki fires a missile toward his targeted location that will collide with the first enemy it hits. Each missile deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) area magic damage.

Corki stores one missile every {{ f1 }} seconds up to 7 missiles at any given time.

Every 3rd missile will be a Big One, dealing {{ e3 }}% extra damage.

passive.name: Hextech Shrapnel Shells
passive.description: Bais attack Corki memberikan bonus true damage kepada minion, monster, dan Champion.

Darius.name: Darius
Darius.title: the Hand of Noxus
allytips: Decimate adalah ability harassment yang kuat. Serang seorang musuh dari jarak maksimum untuk efek terbesar.
Noxian Guillotine memberikan lebih banyak damage semakin banyak serangan yang Anda berikan kepada target. Pukul 5 kali untuk double damage.
Keuntungan besar Darius adalah dari peningkatan bertahannya. Semakin lama Anda dapat bertahan dalam satu pertempuran, semakin kuatlah dia.

spells.name: Decimate
spells.description: Darius mengayunkan kapaknya dalam lingkaran yang besar. Musuh yang terkena pisaunya menerima damage lebih besar daripada yang terkena oleh gagangnya.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies in a circle. Champions in the outer half of the ability are struck by the blade, taking {{ e1 }}% additional damage.

spells.name: Crippling Strike
spells.description: Serangan Darius berikutnya menyerang urat nadi yang penting. Ketika mereka kehabisan darah, movement dan attack speed mereka di-slow. Cooldown Crippling bertambah rendah semakin berdarah target.
spells.tooltip:
The next basic attack deals {{ e4 }}% damage and slows the target's movement and attack speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Crippling Strike's base cooldown is reduced by {{ e2 }} second for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target.

spells.name: Apprehend
spells.description: Darius mengasah kapaknya, secara pasif menyebabkan physical damage-nya untuk mengabaikan sebuah persentase dari Armor targetnya. Ketika diaktifkan, Darius menyapu musuh-musuhnya dengan kait kapaknya dan menarik mereka kepadanya.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Darius's physical damage ignores {{ e1 }}% of his target's Armor.

Active: Pulls in all enemies in front of Darius.

spells.name: Noxian Guillotine
spells.description: Darius melompat ke seorang Champion musuh dan memukul sebuah lethal blow, memberikan true damage. Damage ini bertambah untuk setiap stack dari Hemorrhage pada target. Jika Noxian Guillotine adalah killing blow, cooldown di-refresh untuk durasi singkat.
spells.tooltip:
Leaps to target enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) true damage.

For each stack of Hemorrhage on the target, Noxian Guillotine deals an additional {{ e3 }}% damage.
Maximum Damage: {{ f3 }}.

If Noxian Guillotine kills the target, Darius may recast Noxian Guillotine for 12 seconds.

passive.name: Hemorrhage
passive.description: Darius mengarahkan serangannya dengan strategis, menyebabkan targetnya bleed. Efek ini stack hingga 5 kali.

Diana.name: Diana
Diana.title: Scorn of the Moon
allytips: Memberikan Crescent Strike adalah sangat penting, tetapi jangan takut bila miss. Cooldown-nya pendek dan mana cost-nya rendah.
Pertimbangkan kapan meng-cast Lunar Rush tanpa Moonlight dan kapan menunggu Crescent Strike lainnya.
Gunakan Moonfall dan Lunar Rush untuk untuk dekat dengan target dan aktifkan Moonsilver Blade untuk tambahan.

spells.name: Crescent Strike
spells.description: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Pale Cascade
spells.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to memberikan damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. This shield is refreshed if her third sphere detonates.
spells.tooltip:
Creates three orbiting spheres that explode on contact with enemies dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

Grants a temporary shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. If the third sphere detonates, the shield increases by {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

spells.name: Moonfall
spells.description: Diana draws in dan slows all musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip: Draws in all nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Lunar Rush
spells.description: Diana teleports to an enemy dan deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
spells.tooltip:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, teleporting to an enemy and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight.

passive.name: Moonsilver Blade
passive.description: Mendapat Attack Speed. Setiap serangan ketiga akan meng-cleave musuh di dekatnya untuk tambahan magic damage.

Draven.name: Draven
Draven.title: the Glorious Executioner
allytips: Jika Draven tidak bergerak, Spinning Axe akan jatuh dekat lokasi dia sekarang. Axe akan jatuh tepat padanya, atau cukup ke kiri atau ke kanan.
Jika Draven bergerak setelah menyerang, Spinning Axe akan memandu dia ke arah pergerakannya. Gunakan hal inin untuk mengendalikan ke mana Spinning Axe akan pergi.

spells.name: Spinning Axe
spells.description: Draven's next attack will memberikan bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
spells.tooltip:
Draven's next attack will deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage. The bonus is equal to {{ e2 }}% of his total Attack Damage.

This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe.

Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

spells.name: Blood Rush
spells.description: Draven gains increased Movement Speed dan Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
spells.tooltip:
Draven gains {{ e2 }}% increased Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds and {{ e4 }}% increased Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration.

Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

spells.name: Stand Aside
spells.description: Draven throws his axes, memberikan physical damage to targets hit dan knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
spells.tooltip: Draven throws his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Whirling Death
spells.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to memberikan physical damage to setiap unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction dan returns to Draven after striking an Champion musuh. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for setiap unit hit dan resets when the axes reverse direction.
spells.tooltip:
Draven hurls two massive axes to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each unit struck.

Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals 8% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum {{ e2 }}%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.

passive.name: Wicked Blades
passive.description: Critical Strikes si Draven memberikan bonus physical damage seiring waktu. Spinning Axe juga menyebabkan efek ini meskipun tidak Critically Strike.

DrMundo.name: Dr. Mundo
DrMundo.title: the Madman of Zaun
allytips: Sadism yang tepat waktu dapat memancing Champion musuh untuk menyerang Anda bahkan ketika mereka kekurangan damage untuk membunuh Anda.
Spirit Visage akan meningkatkan heal yang dilakukan oleh ultimate Anda dan mengurangi cooldown pada semua ability Anda.
Cleavers adalah alat yang sangat kuat untuk membunuh neutral monster. Daripada kembali ke base, farm neutral monster hingga ultimate Anda dapat meng-heal Anda.

spells.name: Infected Cleaver
spells.description: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, memberikan damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health dan slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned half of the health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver.
spells.tooltip:
Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% of the target's current Health ({{ e1 }} damage minimum) and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Half of the health cost is refunded if the cleaver hits a target.

spells.name: Burning Agony
spells.description: Dr. Mundo menyerap healthnya untuk mengurangi durasi disable dan memberikan damage berkelanjutan kepada musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Dr. Mundo deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies, and reduces the duration of disables on Dr Mundo by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Masochism
spells.description: Masochism meningkatkan Dr. Mundo's Attack Damage by a flat amount for 5 detik. In addition, Dr. Mundo also gains an additional amount of Attack Damage for setiap percentage of Health he is missing.
spells.tooltip: Increases Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds. Dr. Mundo gains an additional +{{ e3 }} Attack Damage for each percentage of Health he is missing.

spells.name: Sadism
spells.description: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed dan drastically increased Health Regeneration.
spells.tooltip: Dr. Mundo regenerates {{ e1 }}% of his maximum Health over {{ e2 }} seconds. Additionally, he gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed.

passive.name: Adrenaline Rush
passive.description: Dr. Mundo meregenerasi 0.3% dari maksimum Health-nya tiap detik.

Elise.name: Elise
Elise.title: The Spider Queen
allytips: Spider Form sangat efektif untuk membunuh musuh dengan health rendah; Neurotoxin di Human Form memberikan lebih banyak damage kepada lawan yang sehat.
Ketika dalam Spider Form, Spiderling akan menyerang target yang Elise berikan Venomous Bite padanya.
Spider Form si Elise dan ability Spider Form tidak ada cost mana dan dapat diprioritaskan ketika Anda mencoba untuk menghemat mana.

spells.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
spells.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy dan deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
spells.tooltip: Deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus 8% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current Health. Max {{ e2 }} bonus damage to monsters.

spells.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
spells.description:
Human Form: melepaskan a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise dan her Spiderlings gain attack speed dan heal Elise on setiap attack.
spells.tooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.

spells.name: Cocoon / Rappel
spells.description:
Human Form: Stuns dan reveals the first enemy unit hit.

Spider Form: Elise dan her Spiderlings ascend into the air dan then descend upon target enemy.
spells.tooltip: Stuns and reveals the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Spider Form
spells.description: Transforms into a menacing spider with new abilities. While in Spider Form, Elise deals bonus magic damage on attack dan has increased movement speed.
spells.tooltip:
Elise transforms into a menacing spider, granting access to arachnid abilities.

Spider Form: Elise deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage per attack and gains {{ e3 }} Movement Speed.

Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities. Max {{ e5 }} Spiderlings.

passive.name: Spider Swarm
passive.description:
Human Form: Ketika spell Elise mengenai musuh, dia menyiapkan sebuah spiderling.

Spider Form: Elise men-summonSpiderling-nya untuk menyerang lawan di dekatnya.

Evelynn.name: Evelynn
Evelynn.title: the Widowmaker
allytips: Ketika stealth, perhatikan kapan Anda (dekat) telah dideteksi oleh Champion musuh. Hal ini bisa dilihat dari mata kuning dan merah yang bersinar di atas Champion musuh di dekatnya.
Coba gunakan Dark Frenzy setelah lawan Anda telah menggunakan slow mereka.

Evelynn dapat memfokus antara Attack Damage yang memberikan lebih banyak damage yang berkelanjutan atau atau Ability Power yang memberikan lebih banyak damage yang meledak. Keseimbangan antara keduanya mungkin ideal.

spells.name: Hate Spike
spells.description: Evelynn fires a line of spikes through an enemy, memberikan damage to all enemies in its path.
spells.tooltip:
Evelynn fires a line of spikes through a nearby enemy dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path.

Hate Spike prioritizes targets Evelynn has recently attacked.

spells.name: Dark Frenzy
spells.description: Evelynn secara pasif meningkatkan her Movement Speed when hitting Champion musuh with her spells. Upon activation, Evelynn breaks free from slows affecting her dan gains a massive Movement Speed boost for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Evelynn's spell hits on enemy champions grant her {{ e1 }} Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds (effect stacks up to {{ e5 }} times).

Active: Evelynn removes all slows affecting her and gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Champion kills and assists refresh Dark Frenzy's cooldown.

spells.name: Ravage
spells.description: Evelynn slashes her target twice, memberikan damage with setiap hit. She then gains increased Attack Speed for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Evelynn slashes a target {{ e3 }} times, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage with each strike. Evelynn then gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Agony's Embrace
spells.description: Evelynn summons spikes from the ground to memberikan damage dan slow enemies in the area. She then gains a shield berdasarkan how many Champion musuh were hit.
spells.tooltip:
Evelynn impales all enemies in the targeted area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their current Health in magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Evelynn siphons their pain, gaining a {{ e4 }} health shield for each enemy champion hit which lasts up to 6 seconds.

passive.name: Shadow Walk
passive.description: Ketika di luar pertempuran, Evelynn menjadi stealth hanya menjadi dapat dilihat oleh Champion musuh di dekatnya atau true sight. Ketika stealth, dia meregenerasi Mana dengan cepat.

Ezreal.name: Ezreal
Ezreal.title: the Prodigal Explorer
allytips: Gunakan Arcane Shift untuk menolong tembakan skill Anda lainnya.
Anda dapat memainkan Ezreal antara sebagai Attack Damage carry atau Ability Power carry, bergangtung kepada bagaimana Anda membangunnya.
Anda dapat mengatur Trueshot Barrage untuk mengenai beberapa gelombang minon atau bahkan Monster.

spells.name: Mystic Shot
spells.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1 detik if it strikes an enemy unit.
spells.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by 1 second if Mystic Shot hits a target.

spells.name: Essence Flux
spells.description: Ezreal fires a fluctuating wave of energy, memberikan magic damage to Champion musuh, while increasing the Attack Speed of allied Champion.
spells.tooltip: Ezreal fires a wave of energy that damages all enemy champions it passes through for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Allied champions hit by the wave have their Attack Speed increased by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Arcane Shift
spells.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location dan fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
spells.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt at the nearest enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Trueshot Barrage
spells.description: Ezreal channels for 1 detik to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to setiap unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to setiap unit it passes through).
spells.tooltip: Ezreal channels for 1 second to fire a barrage of missiles dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each unit it passes through. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (minimum {{ e3 }}%).

passive.name: Rising Spell Force
passive.description: Memukul target dengan ability Ezreal meningkatkan Attack Speed-nya sebesar 10% selama 5 detik (efek stack hingga 5 kali).

FiddleSticks.name: Fiddlesticks
FiddleSticks.title: the Harbinger of Doom
allytips: Gunakan Dark Wind untuk mendapatkan banyak minion kill, dan coba gunakan Drain pada minion untuk mendapatkan penyerapan maksimum health.
Gunakan Terrify pada musuh sebelum memulai Crowstorm atau Drain untuk memastikan maksimum damage.
Fiddlesticks sangat rapuh jika Anda membangun item AP. Coba untuk menyesuaikan keseimbangan antara offense dan defense dengan runes, masteries, dan item.

spells.name: Terrify
spells.description: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
spells.tooltip: Strikes a target enemy unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Drain
spells.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, memberikan damage to a target seiring waktu dan healing himself.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to target unit and heals Fiddlesticks for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.
Lasts up to 5 seconds.

spells.name: Dark Wind
spells.description: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit dan then bounces to unit musuh di dekat, memberikan damage dan silencing the victims.
spells.tooltip:
Strikes an enemy target and then bounces to a nearby enemy unit. Deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silences for 1.2 seconds for each strike.

Can bounce up to {{ e1 }} times and may strike the same target multiple times. Damage to minions is increased by 50%.

spells.name: Crowstorm
spells.description: Gagak pembunuh berkumpul dengan liar di sekitar Fiddlesticks, memberikan damage setiap detik kepada semua unit musuh di area.
spells.tooltip: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks for 5 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second to all enemy units in the area. This has a 1.5 second channel duration and teleports Fiddlesticks to target location.

passive.name: Dread
passive.description: Musuh di dekat memiliki pengurangan Magic Resist sebesar 10.

Fiora.name: Fiora
Fiora.title: the Grand Duelist
allytips: Efek regenerasi Duelist stack terhadap Champion, jadi jangan takut untuk melawan pertarungan yang kecil.
Blade Waltz tidak hanya memberikan damage, tetapi juga mencegah Anda menjadi target oleh team musuh.

spells.name: Lunge
spells.description: Fiora dashes forward to strike her target, memberikan physical damage. Fiora can perform the dash a detik time within a couple detik at no mana cost.
spells.tooltip:
Fiora dashes forward to strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Fiora can perform the dash a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds at no mana cost.

spells.name: Riposte
spells.description: Fiora's Attack Damage is increased. When activated, Fiora parries the next basic attack dan reflects magic damage back to the attacker. Works against Champion, monster, dan large minion.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Fiora's Attack Damage is increased by {{ e1 }}.

Active: Fiora parries the next basic attack within {{ e2 }} seconds and reflects {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage back to the attacker. Works against champions, monsters, and large minions.

spells.name: Burst of Speed
spells.description: Fiora temporarily gains additional Attack Speed. setiap basic attack atau Lunge she lands during this time meningkatkan her Movement Speed. Killing a Champion refreshes the cooldown on Burst of Speed.
spells.tooltip:
Fiora gains {{ e1 }}% additional Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. Each basic attack or Lunge she lands during this time increases her Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds, stacking up to {{ e5 }} times.

Killing a champion refreshes the cooldown on Burst of Speed. (Assists reduce the cooldown by half of the base amount.)

spells.name: Blade Waltz
spells.description: Fiora dashes around the battlefield to memberikan physical damage to Champion musuh. Successive strikes against the same target memberikan less damage.
spells.tooltip:
Fiora dashes around the battlefield striking random champions {{ e1 }} times for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Successive strikes against the same target deal {{ e3 }}% damage.

The first and last attack will be against the same target. Each strike applies on-hit effects.

passive.name: Duelist
passive.description: Fiora meregenerasi health selama 6 detik setiap kali dia memberikan damage. Menyerang Champion akan menyebabkan efek ini stack hingga 4 kali.

Fizz.name: Fizz
Fizz.title: the Tidal Trickster
allytips: Karena Fizz dapat bergerak melalui unit-unit, cari kesempatan di lane untuk berjalan melalui minion dan berikan ability 'Seastone Trident' Anda - Damage akan cepat bertambah seiring health lawan turun.
Ability ultimate Fizz, 'Chum the Waters', dapat diarahkan ke musuh atau ke area di mana Anda anggap mereka akan melaluinya.

Spell Fizz menurunkan ability power - pertimbangkan mendapatkan item seperti Rod of Ages atau Rylai's Crystal Scepter melawan team yang memiliki ancaman ledakan damage - dan items seperti Rabadon's Deathcap jika Anda anggap Anda dapat bertahan tanpa health.

spells.name: Urchin Strike
spells.description: Fizz strikes his target dan runs them through, memberikan magic damage dan applying on hit effects.
spells.tooltip: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing normal attack damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. This ability can trigger on-hit effects.

spells.name: Seastone Trident
spells.description: Fizz's Trident causes rending wounds in his opponents, memberikan magic damage to the target berdasarkan their health hilang.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Fizz's attacks rend his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's missing health as magic damage over {{ e4 }} seconds. (Max 300 vs. minions)

Active: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Fizz's attacks deal an additional {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on hit and apply Grievous Wounds to his target, reducing incoming healing by 50%.

spells.name: Playful / Trickster
spells.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground atau choose to jump again before smashing back down.
spells.tooltip:
Fizz hops toward your cursor onto his spear, becoming untargetable, and then slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

Reactivating this ability while Fizz is on top of his spear causes Fizz to jump again towards your cursor and deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a smaller area to enemies nearby, instead of slamming the ground.

spells.name: Chum the Waters
spells.description: Fizz unleashes a magical fish that latches onto enemies atau hovers over terrain, slowing Champion if it is latched on to them. After a brief delay, a shark erupts from beneath the earth, memberikan damage to enemies around the fish dan knocking them aside.
spells.tooltip:
Fizz releases a magical fish toward a location that can bind itself onto enemy champions, slowing their movement by {{ e2 }}%. If the fish misses an enemy champion, it will remain on the ground for a brief time, binding to any enemy champion walking over it.

After {{ e3 }} seconds, a shark erupts from the earth, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a large area, knocking up the target the fish is attached to, knocking other enemies aside and reducing the movement speed of all enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

passive.name: Nimble Fighter
passive.description: Dexterity Fizz memungkinkan dia bergerak melalui unit-unit dan menerima sedikit physical damage dari basic attack.

Galio.name: Galio
Galio.title: the Sentinel's Sorrow
allytips: Tempatkan Bulwark pada sekutu yang sedang diserang adalah cara yang baik untuk mendapatkan kembali health.
Righteous Gust dapat berguna untuk men-charge lawan atau melarikan diri dari kejaran.
Anda secara signifikan dapat meningkatkan potensi damage dari Idol of Durand dengan menggunakannya ketika beberapa musuh berdekatan.

spells.name: Resolute Smite
spells.description: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes, slowing dan memberikan damage to enemies caught near the impact point.
spells.tooltip: Galio fires a concussive blast from his eyes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies near the impact location, and reducing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Bulwark
spells.description: Galio shields an ally Champion, increasing their Armor dan Magic Resistance, dan restoring Galio's health Setiap kali that Champion suffers damage.
spells.tooltip: Galio shields a friendly champion for {{ e4 }} seconds, increasing their Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ e1 }}. Each time the unit suffers damage, Galio is healed for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}). (-20% healing for each consecutive hit)

spells.name: Righteous Gust
spells.description: Galio claps his wings, unleashing a gust of concussive wind that damages enemies dan leaves a directional draft in its wake that meningkatkan ally movement speed.
spells.tooltip: Galio unleashes a gust of concussive wind that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path. A directional draft remains for 5 seconds, increasing the movement speed of allies passing through it by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Idol of Durand
spells.description: Galio assumes the form of a statue, taunting musuh di dekat dan storing concussive energy as they attack him.  Galio then bursts from his statue shell, releasing the stored energy to damage surrounding foes.
spells.tooltip:
Galio channels for 2 seconds, taunting nearby foes and blocking {{ e4 }}% of incoming damage.

After channeling, Galio deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, plus an additional {{ e2 }}% damage for each attack he suffered while channeling. Max {{ e3 }}% bonus damage.

passive.name: Runic Skin
passive.description: Galio mengubah 50% dari total Magic Resistance-nya menjadi Ability Power.

Gangplank.name: Gangplank
Gangplank.title: the Saltwater Scourge
allytips: Parrrley memberikan efek On Hit seperti Frozen Mallet atau Black Cleaver.
Memperhatikan musuh health rendah di map dapat memberi Anda sebuah kejutan kill dengan Cannon Barrage.
Coba menempatkan Cannon Barrage pada jalur pelarian untuk memotong musuh melarikan diri.

spells.name: Parrrley
spells.description: Gangplank takes aim dan shoots an enemy unit with his pistol. If Parrrley deals a killing blow, he gains extra gold dan half the mana cost is refunded.
spells.tooltip:
Gangplank shoots a target unit for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. If Parrrley deals a killing blow, Gangplank gains {{ e2 }} extra gold and half the mana cost is refunded.

Parrrley can crit and applies on hit effects as if a melee basic attack.

Total Gold Plundered: {{ f2 }} gold.

spells.name: Remove Scurvy
spells.description: Consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit which clears any crowd control effects on him dan heals him.
spells.tooltip: Consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit which clears any crowd control effects on him and heals him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health.

spells.name: Raise Morale
spells.description: Gangplank fires a shot into the air, increasing nearby allied Champion' attack damage dan movement speed.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gangplank gains {{ e1 }} Attack Damage and {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

Active: Gangplank fires his pistol into the air, disabling his passive boost but increasing his Attack Damage by {{ e3 }} and Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% and nearby allied champions' Attack Damage and Movement Speed by half that amount for 7 seconds.

spells.name: Cannon Barrage
spells.description: Gangplank mengisyaratkan kapalnya untuk menembak ke area selama 6 detik, men-slow musuh dan memberikan damage pada sembarang lokasi dalam area.
spells.tooltip: Signals Gangplank's ship to fire upon an area for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies in the area by {{ e2 }}% for the duration. Cannonballs rain upon the area, each causing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

passive.name: Grog-Soaked Blade
passive.description: Basic attack dan Parrrley si Gangplank menghasilkan racun yang memberikan magic damage tiap detik dan me-slow movement speed. Berlangsung 3 detik dan stack hingga 3 kali.

Garen.name: Garen
Garen.title: The Might of Demacia
allytips: Regenerasi Garen sangat ditingkatkan jika dia dapat menghindari menerima damage selama beerapa detik.
Courage meningkatkan efektivitas dari item defensive. Pastikan untuk merincikan dengan tepat terhadap jenis damage lawan Anda.
Garen hanya dibatasi oleh cooldown, membuat item seperti Youmuu's Ghostblade dan Brutalizer sangat efektif baginya.

spells.name: Decisive Strike
spells.description: Garen gains a burst of Movement Speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him dan his next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, memberikan bonus damage dan silencing them.
spells.tooltip:
Garen breaks free from all slows affecting him and gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

His next basic attack deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and silences his target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Courage
spells.description: Garen secara pasif meningkatkan his Armor dan Magic Resist. He may also activate this ability to grant himself a shield that reduces incoming damage dan crowd control effects for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Garen's gains an additional 20% value from bonus Armor and Magic Resist.

Active: Garen gains a defensive shield for {{ e4 }} seconds, reducing incoming damage by {{ e2 }}% and granting 30% Crowd Control Reduction.

spells.name: Judgment
spells.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, memberikan damage around him for the duration.
spells.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of his attack (+{{ f1 }}) as physical damage to nearby enemies every second. Garen can move through units while spinning but moves 20% slower when travelling directly through units.

Judgment can critically strike dealing bonus damage.
Judgment deals 25% less damage to minions and monsters.

spells.name: Demacian Justice
spells.description: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to memberikan a finishing blow to an Champion musuh that deals damage based upon how much Health his target has missing.
spells.tooltip: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} magic damage plus 1 damage for every {{ e2 }} Health the target is missing.

passive.name: Perseverance
passive.description: Jika Garen belum dihantam oleh damage atau ability musuh selama 10 detik terakhir, Garen meregenerasi 0.4% dari maksimum Health-nya tiap detik. Damage minion tidak menghentikan Perserverance.

Gragas.name: Gragas
Gragas.title: the Rabble Rouser
allytips: Buff dari Drunken Rage diberikan pada akhir channel, jadi coba untuk menggunakannya sebelum memulai pertempuran.
Coba untuk mendorong musuh ke tower Anda dengan Explosive Cask.
Coba kombinasikan Body Slam dengan Explosive Cask untuk menyiapkan kill untuk team Anda.

spells.name: Barrel Roll
spells.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode atau will explode on its own after 5 detik.  Enemies struck by the blast have their attack speed lowered.
spells.tooltip: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated again to explode or will explode on its own after 5 seconds, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a {{ e1 }}% attack speed debuff for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Drunken Rage
spells.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 detik, restoring his mana.  After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, increasing his damage dealt dan reducing damage received.
spells.tooltip: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask, channeling for 1 second.  He gains {{ e3 }} mana while channeling, and becomes empowered after finishing, increasing physical attack damage by {{ e2 }}, and reducing damage taken by {{ e1 }}% for 20 seconds.

spells.name: Body Slam
spells.description: Gragas charges to a location dan collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, memberikan damage to all unit musuh di dekat dan slowing their movement.  Damage is split among units hit.
spells.tooltip: Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy unit he hits, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area. Damage is split among targets hit. Units hit by Body Slam are slowed by 35% for 2.5 seconds.

spells.name: Explosive Cask
spells.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, which explodes on impact, memberikan damage dan knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
spells.tooltip: Gragas throws his cask to an area. Upon landing, it deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all units struck, knocking them back.

passive.name: Happy Hour
passive.description: Pada penggunaan ability, Gragas menerima minuman yang memulihkan 2% dari maks health-nya selama 4 detik.

Graves.name: Graves
Graves.title: the Outlaw
allytips: Smoke Screen dapat digunakan untuk melarikan diri dan menyiapkan kill.
Menggunakan Quickdraw untuk mendapatkan range dan memberikan Buckshot dapat memberikan damage yang cukup besar.

spells.name: Buckshot
spells.description: Graves fires three bullets in a cone, damaging all enemies in their paths.
spells.tooltip: Shoots three bullets in a cone, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all enemies in their path. Enemies hit with multiple bullets take {{ e4 }}% damage from each additional bullet.

spells.name: Smoke Screen
spells.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke. Enemies inside the smoke cloud have reduced sight range dan Movement Speed.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact and creates a smoke cloud that lasts {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies inside the cloud are slowed by {{ e2 }}% and have their sight radius reduced.

spells.name: Quickdraw
spells.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Attack Speed boost for several detik. Hitting enemies with basic attack lowers the cooldown of this skill.
spells.tooltip: Dashes forward, gaining {{ e1 }}% increased Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Quickdraw by {{ e4 }} second.

spells.name: Collateral Damage
spells.description: Graves fires an explosive shell memberikan heavy damage to the first Champion it hits. After hitting a Champion atau rsetiaping the end of its range, the shell explodes memberikan damage in a cone.
spells.tooltip: Fires an explosive shell that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage in a cone.

passive.name: True Grit
passive.description: Graves menerima peningkatan armor dan magic resistance semakin lama dia berada dalam pertempuran.

Hecarim.name: Hecarim
Hecarim.title: the Shadow of War
allytips: Spirit of Dread memulihkan health ketika musuh di dekatnya menerima damage, termasuk damage yang diberikan oleh sekutu. Cast ability ini selama pertempuran besar untuk memaksimalkan ketahanan Hecarim.
Devastating Charge memberikan lebih banyak damage berdasarkan jarak tempuh. Coba gunakan Onslaught of Shadows atau Summoner Spell seperti Ghost atau Flash untuk memaksimalkan damage ini.

spells.name: Rampage
spells.description: Hecarim cleaves musuh di dekat memberikan physical damage.
spells.tooltip:
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. ({{ e5 }}% damage to minions and monsters)

If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by {{ e3 }} second for a short duration. This effect can stack up to {{ e2 }} times.

spells.name: Spirit of Dread
spells.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to musuh di dekat for a short duration. Hecarim gains health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
spells.tooltip:
Hecarim deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for {{ e1 }}% of the damage these enemies take from any source.

Hecarim cannot heal more than {{ e4 }} health from minions.

spells.name: Devastating Charge
spells.description: Hecarim gains increasing movement speed for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
spells.tooltip: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge.

spells.name: Onslaught of Shadows
spells.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
spells.tooltip:
Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to anyone they strike.

Hecarim releases a shockwave when he finishes his charge causing nearby enemies to flee from Hecarim for {{ e2 }} second.

Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.

passive.name: Warpath
passive.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.

Heimerdinger.name: Heimerdinger
Heimerdinger.title: the Revered Inventor
allytips: Penempatan turret dapat menjadi faktor penentu di dalam pertempuran. Melawan kebanyakan musuh, menempatkan sepasang turret adalah metode yang paling baik, tetapi jika mereka memiliki banyak ability Area of Effect, turrent Anda dapat dihancurkan dengan cepat.
Tempatkan turret di brush dapat menjadikan serangan kejutan untuk membantu Anda.
Komponen blind dari Concussive Grenade sangat penting. Tidak perlu untuk men-stun target untuk menjadi efektif, jadi coba untuk memukul penyerang ranged dari belakang.

spells.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
spells.description: Heimerdinger lays down a machine gun turret.  Turrets gain abilities as this skill is increased.  (Turrets memberikan half damage to towers).
spells.tooltip:
Heimerdinger constructs a Machine Gun Turret with {{ f2 }} health and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage (half damage to turrets). Max: {{ e3 }} turret(s). Heimerdinger stores enough parts for a new turret every {{ f1 }} seconds.

Each rank of this skill grants a further enhancement:
Rank 2: Turret attacks reduce the target's armor and magic resist by 1 (max 50)
Rank 3: Maximum turrets increased to 2
Rank 4: Turrets gain an additional 125 Health
Rank 5: Turret attacks deal area damage

spells.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
spells.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that hit the enemies closest to Heimerdinger.
spells.tooltip: Heimerdinger fires 3 enemy seeking Micro-Rocket(s), hitting targets nearest to him. Each rocket deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: CH-1 Concussion Grenade
spells.description: Heimerdinger melambungkan sebuah granat ke lokasi, memberikan damage kepada unit musuh, sekaligus juga men-stun setiap orang yang dikenai dan mem-blind unit di sekeliling..
spells.tooltip: Heimerdinger tosses a grenade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemy units and blinding them for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies who are directly hit are stunned for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: UPGRADE!!!
spells.description: Passive / Active: secara pasif meningkatkan Cooldown Reduction.  Activate to heal all active Evolution Turrets dan cause them to fire frost shots, which reduce Movement Speed, for a short time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: {{ e2 }}% Cooldown Reduction.

Active: All active Evolution Turrets are healed for 100% of their maximum health and also fire {{ e3 }}% movement-slowing frost shots. Additionally, your Hextech Micro-Rockets fire 5 rockets instead of 3 and your CH-1 Concussion Grenade travels faster.

passive.name: Techmaturgical Repair Bots
passive.description: Heimerdinger memberikan Champuin dan Turret sekutu di dekatnya peningkatan Health Regeneration.

Irelia.name: Irelia
Irelia.title: the Will of the Blades
allytips: Gunakan Bladesurge untuk mencakup jarak yang besar dengen menargetkan minion life rendah dalam perjalanan Anda ke Champion sasaran.
Simpan serangan Transcendent Blades Anda untuk waktu yang tepat.
Mencadangkan Equilibrium Strike dalam pertempuran yang hampir kalah dapat membalikkan keadaan.

spells.name: Bladesurge
spells.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target. If it kill the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes dan refunds 35 Mana.
spells.tooltip:
Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds 35 Mana.

spells.name: Hiten Style
spells.description: Irelia is skilled in the art of Hiten, secara pasif giving her physical attack health restoration.  Activating Hiten Style gives her basic attack true damage for a short period.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks restore {{ e1 }} health.

Active: Irelia's basic attacks deal {{ e2 }} true damage and doubles health restored for 6 seconds.

spells.name: Equilibrium Strike
spells.description: Irelia's attack balances the scales, memberikan damage dan slowing the target.  However, if the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, then the blow stuns the target instead.
spells.tooltip:
Irelia pierces her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing the target by 60% for {{ e2 }} second(s).

If the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, she stuns the target for the duration instead.

spells.name: Transcendent Blades
spells.description: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to memberikan physical damage dan siphon life from enemies they pass through.
spells.tooltip: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through. She heals for 25% of the damage dealt against champions and 10% against minions.

passive.name: Ionian Fervor
passive.description:
Mengurangi durasi stun, slow, taunt, fear, snare, dan root untuk setiap Champion musuh di dekatnya.

1 Champion: 10%
2 Champion: 25%
3 Champion: 40%

Janna.name: Janna
Janna.title: the Storm's Fury
allytips: Eye of the Storm dapat digunakan pada turret sekutu.
Tembakkan Howling Gale dengan cepat tanpa charge up dapat digunakan untuk men-disable dengan hebat team lain.
Penempatan ultimate Janna dapat mendonrong musuh menjauh dari sekutu yang terluka atau bahkan untuk memisahkan musuh-musuh.

spells.name: Howling Gale
spells.description: By creating a localized change in pressure dan temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can active the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, memberikan damage dan knocking away any enemies in its path.
spells.tooltip:
Summons a whirlwind, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path and knocks them into the air. The whirlwind travels further, deals {{ e2 }} bonus damage, and knocks enemies higher, for each second it charges (up to a maximum of 3 seconds).

Activate again to release the whirlwind early.

spells.name: Zephyr
spells.description: Janna summons an air elemental that secara pasif meningkatkan her Movement Speed dan enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to memberikan damage dan slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and allows movement through units.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Passive benefit is lost while Zephyr is on cooldown.

spells.name: Eye Of The Storm
spells.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally Champion atau turret from incoming damage dan meningkatkan their Attack Damage.
spells.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion or turret for {{ e3 }} seconds. The shield absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and grants {{ e2 }} Attack Damage until it breaks.

spells.name: Monsoon
spells.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
spells.tooltip: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to nearby allies each second for 4 seconds.

passive.name: Tailwind
passive.description: Meningkatkan Movement Speed dari seluruh Champion sekutu sebesar 3%.

JarvanIV.name: Jarvan IV
JarvanIV.title: the Exemplar of Demacia
allytips: Anda dapat menggunakan combo Dragon Strike / Demacian Standard untuk keluar dari arena Cataclysm Anda sendiri.
