Bagi basic attack Anda pada Champion yang berbeda pada awal pertempuran untuk memaksimalkan damage.
Gunakan Demacian Standard sebagai alat pengintai ketika kuatir tentang musuh-musuh yang datang.

spells.name: Dragon Strike
spells.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, memberikan physical damage dan lowering the Armor of all enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
spells.tooltip:
Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and lowering the Armor of all enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path.

spells.name: Golden Aegis
spells.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm dan slow surrounding enemies.
spells.tooltip: Temporarily gains a shield that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ e3 }} damage for each nearby enemy champion) damage for 5 seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Demacian Standard
spells.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, secara pasif granting him bonus attack speed dan armor. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact dan grants Attack Speed to nearby allied Champion.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }} Armor.

Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds and grants surrounding allied champions {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

spells.name: Cataclysm
spells.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them.
spells.tooltip:
Heroically leaps to an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for 3.5 seconds.

Activate again to collapse the terrain.

passive.name: Martial Cadence
passive.description: Initial basic attack Jarvan IV pada target memberikan bonus physical damage. Efek ini tidak dapat muncul lagi pada target yang sama dalam durasi yang singkat.

Jax.name: Jax
Jax.title: Grandmaster at Arms
allytips: Jax dapat mengeluarkan Leap Strike kepada unit sekutu, termasuk ward. Anda dapat menggunakannya untuk merencanakan pelarian diri Anda.
Keuntungan Jax sangat besar dari item yang memiliki Ability Power dan Attack Damage seperti Guinsoo's Rageblade dan Hextech Gunblade.

spells.name: Leap Strike
spells.description: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.
spells.tooltip: Jax leaps to a target unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage if it is an enemy.

spells.name: Empower
spells.description: Jax's charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to memberikan additional damage.
spells.tooltip: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Counter Strike
spells.description: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attack for a short duration dan then quickly counterattack stunning all surrounding enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Jax enters a defensive stance for up to 2 seconds, dodging all incoming basic attacks and taking {{ e3 }}% less damage from area effect abilities.

After 2 seconds or if activated again, Jax stuns surrounding enemies for {{ e2 }} second and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to them.

Counter Strike deals {{ e5 }}% more damage for each attack Jax dodged (max: {{ e4 }}% increased damage).

spells.name: Grandmaster's Might
spells.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional magic damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor dan Magic Resist for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Every third consecutive strike Jax deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional magic damage.

Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him {{ f2 }} Armor and {{ f1 }} Magic Resist for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Armor bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + 30% bonus Attack Damage.
Magic Resist bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + 20% Ability Power.

passive.name: Relentless Assault
passive.description: Basic attack Jax yang beruntun terus menerus meningkatkan Attack Speed-nya.

Jayce.name: Jayce
Jayce.title: the Defender of Tomorrow
allytips: Pastikan untuk menukar stance lebih sering. Hal itu akan meningkatkan serangan Anda dan memberikan Anda ledakan speed.
Jika Anda menerima banyak damage, gunakan Hammer Form karena akan memberikan Anda tambahan defense.
Coba meng-cast Shock Blast melalui Acceleration Gate untuk meningkatkan range dan damage.

spells.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy memberikan physical damage dan slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or rsetiaping the end of its path) memberikan physical damage to all enemies in the area of the explosion.
spells.tooltip: Leaps to an enemy dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies and slowing them by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Memulihkan mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging musuh di dekat for several detik.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing attack speed to maksimum for several attack.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e5 }} mana per strike while in Hammer Stance.

Active: Creates an electric aura dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds to nearby enemies.

spells.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy dan knocks them back a short distance.

Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the movement speed of all allies who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, dan damage will increase.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e4 }}% of the enemy's maximum health (+{{ a1 }}) as magic damage and knocks them back a short distance. ({{ e1 }} Maximum Damage against monsters)

spells.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
spells.description:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities dan increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor dan Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities dan increasing Armor dan Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and ranged attacks.

The next attack in Cannon stance reduces the enemy's Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

label: Cannon Swap: Armor/Magic Resistance Shred
Hammer Swap: Bonus Damage
Hammer Passive: Bonus Armor and Magic Resist

passive.name: Hextech Capacitor
passive.description: Mendapat 40 Movement Speed selama 1.25 detik dan dapat bergerak melalui unit-unit setiap kali Transform di-cast.

Karma.name: Karma
Karma.title: the Enlightened One
allytips: Gathering Fire memberikan permainan agresif. Cari untuk memberikan ability dan basic attack kepada lawan Anda untuk mengurangi cooldown Mantra dan tetap offensive.
Ketika menggunakan Focused Resolve, slow lawan Anda dengan Inner Flame atau tingkatkan kecepatan Anda dengan Inspire jika Anda memiliki masalah menempel pada target.
Jangan menjadi terlalu kolot dengan Mantra. Gathering Fire sangat kuat dalam perempuran, membuatnya mudah untuk recharge Mantra beberapa kali.

spells.name: Inner Flame
spells.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes dan deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra meningkatkan the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a blast of energy that explodes upon enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Soulflare: Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and leaves a circle of flame at the impact area or upon reaching maximum range, slowing enemies for 50%. After 1.5 seconds the circle erupts, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area.

spells.name: Focused Resolve
spells.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself dan a targeted enemy, memberikan damage seiring waktu dan revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, memberikan bonus damage dan healing.
spells.tooltip:
Links Karma to target enemy champion, revealing them, and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds, rooting them in place for {{ e2 }} seconds if the link is not broken.

Mantra Bonus - Renewal: Focused Resolve deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage over the duration and heals Karma instantly for 20% (+{{ a2 }}%) of her Missing Health. If the leash is not broken, she is healed for another 20% (+{{ a2 }}%).

spells.name: Inspire
spells.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage dan meningkatkan the movement speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to casting the shield, energy radiates out from the shield, memberikan damage to enemies dan applying Inspire to allied Champion.
spells.tooltip:
Target ally gains a shield, granting {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds and absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Defiance: The shield overflows with energy, dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to enemy units around her target. Allied champions around her target gain half that amount as a shield, and are also hasted by {{ e5 }}%.

spells.name: Mantra
spells.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 dan does not require a skill point.
spells.tooltip:
Karma empowers her next ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.

Soulflare: Deals bonus magic damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, heavily slowing enemies and dealing damage after a brief delay.

Renewal: The link deals bonus magic damage to her target, instantly healing Karma for 20% of her Missing Health. If the link is not broken, Karma is healed again for the same amount.

Defiance: Allied champions around Karma's target become shielded and gain Movement Speed; Enemy units around her target are dealt magic damage.

passive.name: Gathering Fire
passive.description: Mengurangi cooldown Mantra setiap kali Karma melukai seorang Champion musuh dengan salah satu ability-nya. (Efek berkurang setengah untuk basic attack Karma).

Karthus.name: Karthus
Karthus.title: the Deathsinger
allytips: Minta sekutu Anda untuk membantu menunjukkan di mana Anda harus menggunakan Requiem untuk mendapatkan kill di lane yang berbeda.
Lay Waste sangat kuat dalam farming minion dan meng-harass Champion musuh.

spells.name: Lay Waste
spells.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, memberikan damage to musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip: Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position. After 0.5 seconds, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy, this deals double damage if it hits only a single unit.

spells.name: Wall of Pain
spells.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy.  Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed dan Magic Resist reduced for a period.
spells.tooltip: Creates a wall at target location that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall have their Magic Resist reduced by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed reduced by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds (their Movement Speed gradually recovers over the duration).

spells.name: Defile
spells.description: Karthus secara pasif mencuri energy dari korbannya, mendapatkan Mana untuk setiap kill. Secara alternatif, Karthus dapat mengelilingi dirinya dengan soul mangsanya, memberikan damage kepada musuh di dekat, setapi sangat cepat menyerap mana-nya sendiri
spells.tooltip:
Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores {{ e2 }} Mana.

Toggle On: Drains {{ cost }} Mana to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.

spells.name: Requiem
spells.description: After channeling for 3 detik, Karthus deals damage to all Champion musuh.
spells.tooltip: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).

passive.name: Death Defied
passive.description: Saat mati, Karthus memasuki spirit form, memungkinkan dia melanjutkan casting spell ketika mati selama 7 detik.

Kassadin.name: Kassadin
Kassadin.title: the Void Walker
allytips: Kassadin has multiple item paths; he can go caster via mana and ability power or anti caster with cooldown reduction and Magic Resist.
Kassadin's ultimate has many uses and is on a shorter cooldown than most, use it often.
Try to get the Ancient Golem buff to counteract Riftwalk's increasing mana cost.

spells.name: Null Sphere
spells.description: Kassadin fires an ethereal bolt of void energy, memberikan damage dan silencing the target for a duration.
spells.tooltip: Kassadin fires a void bolt, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silencing the target for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Nether Blade
spells.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attack memulihkan Mana. The Mana memulihkand is tripled against Champion musuh. Active: Kassadin's basic attack memberikan additional magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, restoring {{ e1 }} Mana each hit. If the target is an enemy champion, the Mana restored is tripled to {{ e3 }}.

Active: Kassadin charges his nether blade for {{ e4 }} seconds causing his basic attacks to deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Force Pulse
spells.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage dan slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
spells.tooltip: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him. Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds in a cone in front of him.

spells.name: Riftwalk
spells.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location memberikan damage to unit musuh di dekat. Additionally, multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana dan memberikan additional damage.
spells.tooltip: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemy units. Additionally, each subsequent Riftwalk within the next {{ e2 }} seconds costs {{ cost }} additional Mana and deals {{ e1 }} additional damage, stacks up to 10 times.

passive.name: Void Stone
passive.description: Kassadin menerima pengurangan 15% magic damage dan mengubah damage ini menjadi bonus attack speed.

Katarina.name: Katarina
Katarina.title: the Sinister Blade
allytips: Coba menunggu hingga team lainnya dialihkan dengan melawan tim Anda, dan gunakan Shunpo untuk teleport ke tengah dan lepaskan Death Lotus yang menghancurkan.
Gunakan Shunpo pada Champion sekutu, minion atau ward dapat menjadi taktik yang sangat baik untuk melarikan diri.

spells.name: Bouncing Blades
spells.description: Katarina throws a dagger that bounces from enemy to enemy, memberikan magic damage dan marking them. Her next spell atau basic attack against a marked target will consume the mark dan memberikan additional magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Throws a dagger dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The dagger bounces to the 4 closest enemies dealing 10% less damage with each bounce.

Enemies hit are marked for 4 seconds. Katarina's basic attacks or spells will consume the mark dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage.

spells.name: Sinister Steel
spells.description: Katarina whirls her daggers around her, memberikan magic damage to all enemies in the area. If she hits an Champion musuh, Katarina gains a burst of speed for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Whirls daggers in a circle dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If she hits an enemy Champion, Katarina gains {{ e2 }}% movement speed for 1 second.

spells.name: Shunpo
spells.description: Katarina instantly moves to her target's location dan takes reduced damage from enemies for a few detik. If the target is an enemy, she deals damage.
spells.tooltip:
Moves to a target's location. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage if the target is an enemy.

After using Shunpo, Katarina takes {{ e2 }}% reduced damage for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Death Lotus
spells.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers with unrivaled speed at hingga three nearby Champion. Daggers memberikan magic damage dan reduce incoming healing on targets hit.
spells.tooltip:
Becomes a flurry of blades, throwing daggers at the closest 3 enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds.

Daggers apply Grievous Wounds, reducing incoming healing by 50% for 3 seconds.

passive.name: Voracity
passive.description: Champion kill atau assist mengurangi cooldown Katarina sebesar 15 detik.

Kayle.name: Kayle
Kayle.title: The Judicator
allytips: *Gunakan Intervention pada sekutu high-DPS dapat membalikkan keadaan pertempuran dengan memberikan sekutu Anda kuasa bebas untuk menyerang.
Kayle dapat secara efektif memberikan sejumlah besar damage atau mendukung sekutunya tergantung pada item build-nya.
*Keuntungan Kayle sangat besar dari attack damage dan ability power, membuat item hybrid seperti Malady dan Trinity Force sangat efektif padanya.
Jika Anda ingin mendukung sekutu Anda, item seperti Aegis of the Legion dan Shurelya's Reverie dapat membantu Anda untuk menolong team Anda.

spells.name: Reckoning
spells.description: Blasts an enemy unit with angelic force, memberikan damage, slowing Movement Speed, dan applying Holy Fervor.
spells.tooltip: Blasts a target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, and applying a stack of Holy Fervor.

spells.name: Divine Blessing
spells.description: Blesses a target friendly Champion, granting them increased movement speed dan healing them.
spells.tooltip: Blesses an allied champion, increasing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds and healing them for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health.

spells.name: Righteous Fury
spells.description: Ignites Kayle's sword with a holy flame, granting Kayle a ranged splash attack dan bonus magic damage.
spells.tooltip:
Kayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and her basic attack deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on hit.

In addition, enemies near her target take {{ e2 }}% of her Attack Damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on attack.

spells.name: Intervention
spells.description: Shields Kayle atau an ally for a short time, causing them to be immune to damage.
spells.tooltip: Bathes Kayle's target in a holy light, rendering them immune to all damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

passive.name: Holy Fervor
passive.description: Ketika Kayle menyerang Champion, target kehilangan 3% Armor dan Magic Resistance selama 5 detik. Efek ini stack hingga 5 kali.

Kennen.name: Kennen
Kennen.title: the Heart of the Tempest
allytips: Anda dapat men-stun lawan dengan memberikan 3 Marks of the Storm kepada mereka.
Lightning Rush dapat digunakan untuk membuka pertempuran dengan komponen Energy Return-nya, memungkinkan dia menggunakan ability lain setelahnya.
Anda dapat memberikan debuff Mark of the Storm awal kepada lawan dengan Thundering Shuriken, dan kemudian menambahkannya dengan Electrical Surge.

spells.name: Thundering Shuriken
spells.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage dan adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
spells.tooltip: Throws a shuriken that damages the first enemy it hits for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and adds a Mark of the Storm.

spells.name: Electrical Surge
spells.description: Kennen secara pasif deals extra damage dan adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attack, dan he can activate this ability to damage dan add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Every 5 attacks, Kennen deals magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% of his attack damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target.

Active: Surges electricity through all nearby targets afflicted by Mark of the Storm, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and adding another mark.

spells.name: Lightning Rush
spells.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units.  Any enemy unit he runs through takes damage dan gets a Mark of the Storm.
spells.tooltip:
Kennen moves very fast and may pass through units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any enemy he passes through. Additionally, Kennen will gain {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

Kennen is refunded 40 Energy if he passes through an enemy, but can only gain this effect once. Lightning Rush deals half damage to minions.

spells.name: Slicing Maelstrom
spells.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at random nearby Champion musuh for magical damage.
spells.tooltip: Summons a magical storm that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applies a Mark of the Storm to a random enemy champion near Kennen every {{ e2 }} seconds. This storm attacks up to {{ e3 }} times and cannot hit the same target more than 3 times.

passive.name: Mark of the Storm
passive.description: Ability Kennen menambahkan Marks of the Storm kepada lawan. Saat menerima 3 Marks of Storm, lawan di-stun dan Kennen menerima 25 Energy. Memiliki efek pengurangan jika dilakukan dua kali dalam 7 detik.

Khazix.name: Kha'Zix
Khazix.title: the Voidreaver
allytips: Musuh dianggap terisolasi jika mereka tidak memiliki sekutu dalam jarak yang kecil. Damage dari Taste Their Fear meningkat dengan sangat besar terhadap target-target seperti ini.

Unseen Threat aktif ketika Kha'zix tidak dapat terlihat oleh team musuh. Aktifkan kembali dengan menggunakan brush atau Void Assault. Jangan lupa untuk memberikan Unseen Threat dengan men-autoattack Champion musuh.
Kha'Zix memiliki banyak kebebasan untuk memilih di mana dan kapan untuk bertarung. Pilih pertempuran Anda secara hati-hati untuk berhasil.

spells.name: Taste Their Fear
spells.description: Kha'Zix secara pasif marks enemies that are isolated from nearby allies. Taste Their Fear deals physical damage to a single target. Damage increased on isolated targets. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Enlarged Claws</font>, damage to isolated targets meningkatkan dramatically. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attack dan Taste Their Fear.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Marks enemies who are isolated from nearby allies.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If the target is isolated, the damage is increased by {{ e2 }}%.

Evolved Enlarged Claws: Deals bonus physical damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of the target's missing Health (can be increased by isolation, max {{ e4 }} vs. monsters). Increases the range of Taste Their Fear and Kha'Zix's basic attacks by {{ e5 }}.

spells.name: Void Spike
spells.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that slow and deal physical damage to all nearby enemies. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Spike Racks</font>, Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone.
spells.tooltip:
Fires exploding spikes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies and slow them for {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Heals Kha'Zix for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) if he is within the explosion radius.

Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone.

spells.name: Leap
spells.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, memberikan physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Wings</font>, Leap's range meningkatkan dramatically. Also, on Champion kill atau assist, Leap's cooldown resets.
spells.tooltip:
Leaps to a target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range. On champion kill or assist, Leap's cooldown resets.

spells.name: Void Assault
spells.description: setiap rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Void Assault stealths Kha'Zix, triggers Unseen Threat, dan meningkatkan Movement Speed. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Active Camouflage</font>, Void Assault can be cast three times dan Kha'Zix takes reduced damage while in stealth.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities.

Active: Stealths for {{ e1 }} second. Activates Unseen Threat and increases Kha'Zix's Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%. Void Assault can be cast a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Evolved Active Camouflage: Void Assault can be cast three times. Kha'Zix takes {{ e4 }}% reduced damage while in stealth.

passive.name: Unseen Threat
passive.description: Ketika Kha'Zix tidak terlihat oleh team musuh, dia mendapat Unseen Threat, menyebabkan basic attack berikutnya terhadap Champion musuh memberikan bonus magic damage dan slow.

KogMaw.name: Kog'Maw
KogMaw.title: the Mouth of the Abyss
allytips: Kog'Maw dapat menyakiti kebanyakan Champion dengan ability Bio-Arcane Barrage-nya.
Gunakan Void Ooze untuk menyiapkan Living Artillery yang sempurna.
Maksimalkan Icathian Surprise Anda.

spells.name: Caustic Spittle
spells.description: Passive: Meningkatkan Kog'Maw's Attack Speed. Active: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage dan corrodes the target's Armor dan Magic Resist for 4 detik.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and reduces the enemy's Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e3 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
spells.description: Kog'Maw's attack gain range dan memberikan a percent of the target's maksimum health as magic damage.
spells.tooltip: Basic attacks gain {{ e1 }} range and deal additional magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a1 }})% of the enemy's maximum Health (Max: 100 Damage vs Monsters). Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Void Ooze
spells.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through dan leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Living Artillery
spells.description: Kog'Maw fires a living artillery shell at a great distance memberikan damage dan revealing targets.  Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional mana.
spells.tooltip:
Fires a living artillery shot from a great distance that lands shortly after launch. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and reveals enemies for 4 seconds (deals {{ e3 }}% bonus damage to Champions).

Subsequent artillery shots within {{ e4 }} seconds cost {{ cost }} additional Mana up to a maximum of {{ e5 }} Mana.

passive.name: Icathian Surprise
passive.description: Saat mati, Kog'Maw memulai reaksi berantai dalam tubuhnya yang menyebabkan dia bergerak lebih cepat dan meledak setelah 4 detik; memberikan 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage kepada musuh di sekeliling.

Leblanc.name: LeBlanc
Leblanc.title: the Deceiver
allytips: Damage dari ability Mimic berdasarkan ranking dari basic ability. Sangat penting untuk mempertimbangkan fungsi spell dan damage keluaran.
Menggunakan Distortion dapat membantu posisi Anda untuk memberikan Ethereal Chains.
Anda dapat mengeluarkan Sigil of Silence dan Ethereal Chains untuk mencegah character dengan blink untuk melarikan diri hingga 4 detik..

spells.name: Sigil of Silence
spells.description: LeBlanc projects an orb towards her target, memberikan magic damage dan marking the target for 3.5 detik. If the target takes damage from one of LeBlanc's abilities, the sigil will trigger, memberikan damage dan silencing the target.
spells.tooltip:
LeBlanc projects an orb towards her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds.

If the target takes damage from one of LeBlanc's abilities, the mark will trigger, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and silencing the target for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Distortion
spells.description: LeBlanc rapidly moves to a target location, memberikan magic damage to nearby units. In the following 3 detik, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.
spells.tooltip: LeBlanc rapidly moves to a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby units. In the following 3 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.

spells.name: Ethereal Chains
spells.description: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will memberikan initial magic damage dan slow their movement speed by 25%. If the target remains shackled for 2 detik, the target takes additional magic damage dan is unable to move.
spells.tooltip: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) initial magic damage and slow their movement speed by 25%. If the target remains shackled for 2 seconds, the target takes an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is unable to move for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Mimic
spells.description: LeBlanc can cast a more potent version of the previous spell she cast.
spells.tooltip: LeBlanc can cast the previous spell she cast. The mimicked spell deals {{ e5 }}% increased damage.

passive.name: Mirror Image
passive.description:
Ketika LeBlanc turun di bawah 40% Health, dia menjadi invisible untuk 0.5 detik. Ketika invisibility memudar, dia membuat Mirror Image yang tidak memberikan damage dan bertahan hingga 8 detik.

Mirror Image memiliki 1 menit cooldown.

Mirror Image dapat dikendalikan dengan menahan tombol Alt dan menggunakan tombol kanan mouse.

LeeSin.name: Lee Sin
LeeSin.title: the Blind Monk
allytips: Gunakan Sonic Wave sebelum Dragon's Rage sehingga Anda dapat mengejar target dengan Resonating Strike.
Maanfaatkan Flurry dengan mengeluarkannya dalam basic attack di antara spell cast -- hal ini akan memaksimalkan damage keluaran dan meminimalkan Energy hilang.
Self-casting Safeguard dan penggunaan Iron Will adalah alat yang kuat untuk membunuh neutral monster (dalam hutan).

spells.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
spells.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin memproyeksikan sebuah gelombang suara yang tidak harmonis untuk mencari musuhnya, memberikan physical damage kepada musuh pertama yang ditemuinya. Jika Sonic Wave kena, Lee Sin dapat meng-cast Resonating Strike untuk 3 detik berikutnya.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin men-dash ke musuh yang dikenai oleh Sonic Wave, memberikan physical damage ditambah 8% dari health hilang mereka.
spells.tooltip:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.

Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health (Max: 400 damage vs. Monsters).

spells.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
spells.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin bergebas ke target sekutu, melindungi mereka berdua dari damage. Setelah menggunakan Safeguard, Lee Sin dapat meng-cast Iron Will untuk 3 detik berikutnya.
Iron Will: Latihan intensif Lee Sin memungkinkan dia berkembang dalam pertempuran. Selama 5 detik, Lee Sin mendapatkan Life Steal dan Spell Vamp.
spells.tooltip:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes towards a target ally, shielding them both for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage over the next 5 seconds. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.

Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 5 seconds, Lee Sin gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

spells.name: Tempest / Cripple
spells.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin menghancurkan tanah mengirimkan shockwave yang memberikan magic damage dan me-reveal unit musuh yang dikenai. Jika Tempest mengenai seorang musuh, Lee Sin dapat meng-cast Cripple untuk 3 detik berikutnya.
Cripple: Lee Sin men-cripple musuh di dekat yang di-reveal oleh Tempest, mengurangi Movement dan Attack Speed mereka selama 4 detik. Movement dan Attack Speed pulih secara bertahap selama durasi.
spells.tooltip:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and reveals enemy units hit for 4 seconds. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next 3 seconds.

Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies revealed by Tempest for 4 seconds, reducing their Movement and Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%. Movement and Attack Speed recover gradually over the duration.

spells.name: Dragon's Rage
spells.description: Lee Sin melakukan tendangan melingkar yang kuat, meluncurkan targetnya ke belakang, memberikan physical damage kepada target dan setiap musuh yang mereka tabrak. Musuh yang target tabrak akan didorong ke atas untuk durasi yang singkat. Teknik ini diajarkan oleh Jesse Perring, walaupin Lee Sin tidak menendang pemain keluar dari map.
spells.tooltip: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching an enemy champion back, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration.

passive.name: Flurry
passive.description: Setelah Lee Sin menggunakan ability, 2 basic attack berikutnya mendapat 40% Attack Speed dan mengembalikan 15 Energy masing-masing.

Leona.name: Leona
Leona.title: the Radiant Dawn
allytips: Pimpin charge dan tandai lawan Anda dengan Sunlight sebelum sekutu Anda memberikan.
Shield of Daybreak dan Zenith Blade membentuk sebuah combo offensive yang kuat.
Anda dapat menyerap sejumlah besar damage menggunakan Eclipse, tetapi Anda harus berada dekat musuh untuk mendapatkan bonus durasi.

spells.name: Shield of Daybreak
spells.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, memberikan bonus magic damage dan stunning the target.
spells.tooltip: The next basic attack deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stuns an enemy for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Eclipse
spells.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor dan Magic Resistance.  When the duration first ends, if there are musuh di dekat she will memberikan magic damage to them dan prolong the duration of the effect.
spells.tooltip: Gains {{ e2 }} bonus Armor and Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds. When the effect ends, nearby enemies struck take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and Leona retains her bonus Armor and Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Zenith Blade
spells.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, memberikan magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last Champion musuh struck will be briefly immobilized dan Leona will dash to them.
spells.tooltip: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be briefly rooted and Leona will dash to them.

spells.name: Solar Flare
spells.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, memberikan damage to enemies in an area.  Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.
spells.tooltip: Calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are stunned instead of slowed.

passive.name: Sunlight
passive.description: Damaging spell menimpa musuh dengan Sunlight selama 3.5 detik. Ketika Champion sekutu memberikan damage kepada target tersebut, merek mengkonsumsi debuff Sunlight untuk memberikan tambahan magic damage.

Lissandra.name: Lissandra
Lissandra.title: the Ice Witch
allytips: Anda dapat secara langsung menggunakan ultimate Anda pada diri sendiri dengan menekan tombol self-cast dan tombol ultimate sekaligus (default-nya alt+R).
Meng-cast Glacial Path dan kemudian lari ke arah berlawanan akan membuat musuh bimbang ke arah mana Anda akan pergi.

Ability Lissandra lebih pendek range-nya dari mage-mage lainnya. Akibatnya, membeli item yang menawarkan ability power dan defense sekaligus, seperti Zhonya's Hourglass dan Abyssal Scepter, dapat menjadi pilihan yang tepat untuk menolongnya bertahan dan memberikan damage.

spells.name: Ice Shard
spells.description: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, memberikan magic damage dan slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, memberikan the same damage to other enemies hit.
spells.tooltip: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.

spells.name: Ring of Frost
spells.description: Freezes musuh di dekat in ice, memberikan magic damage dan rooting them.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and roots them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Glacial Path
spells.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
spells.tooltip: Casts an ice claw that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies hit. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

spells.name: Frozen Tomb
spells.description: If cast on an Champion musuh, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, becoming untargetable dan invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target memberikan magic damage to enemies dan slowing Movement Speed.
spells.tooltip:
On Enemy Cast: Freezes target champion solid, stunning it for {{ e4 }} seconds.

On Self Cast: Lissandra encases herself in dark ice for {{ e5 }} seconds, becoming untargetable and invulnerable but unable to take any actions.

Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The ice lasts for {{ e3 }} seconds and slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%.

passive.name: Iceborn
passive.description: Setiap 18 detik, Ability Lissandra berikutnya tidak ada cost mana. Cooldown ini berkurang 1 detik ketika menggangu movement musuh dengan ability (tidak berlaku kepada pengganggu movement dari item).

Lulu.name: Lulu
Lulu.title: the Fae Sorceress
allytips: Glitterlance dapat ditembakkan dari sudut yang aneh bergantung di mana kursor Anda berada - Gerakkan kursor mendekat ke Pix dan Lulu akan mengubah ukuran Area of Effect Anda dengan sangat.
Pertimbangkan meng-cast Whimsy pada Mage untuk meningkatkan AP, Help, Pix! pada penyerang ranged untuk meningkatkan Pix, dan Wild Growth pada Tanker atau Fighter untuk menambah kekuatan initiation.

spells.name: Glitterlance
spells.description: Pix dan Lulu setiap fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
spells.tooltip:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second(s). This slow decays over time.

An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.

spells.name: Whimsy
spells.description: If cast on an ally, grants them movement speed dan ability power for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack atau cast spells.
spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Target ally gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e2 }} Ability Power for {{ e5 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base movement speed by {{ e4 }}.

spells.name: Help, Pix!
spells.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally dan shield them. He then follows them dan aids their attack. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy dan damage them. He then follows them dan grants you vision of that enemy.
spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for {{ e1 }} seconds. Upon arrival, Pix shields them from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Pix deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants vision of them for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Wild Growth
spells.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking musuh di dekat into the air dan granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few detik, that ally gains an aura that slows musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For {{ e4 }} seconds, her ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus health and slows nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

passive.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
passive.description: Pix adalah Faerie liar yang menemani Lulu. Pix akan menembakkan rentetan magical energy pada target yang Lulu serang.

Lux.name: Lux
Lux.title: the Lady of Luminosity
allytips: Lux memilikik kemampuan kendali daerah yang baik. Coba untuk menyiapkan Lucent Singularity untuk mencegah keuntungan atau pelarian diri musuh.

Jika Anda memiliki masalah memberikan Prismatic Barrier, ingat bahwa ia akan kembali ke Anda jika sudah mencapai jarak maksimum. Coba memposisikan diri Anda untuk mengenai sekutu Anda dalam perjalanan kembalinya.
Lucent Singularity adalah alat pengintai yang baik. Coba melemparkannya ke brush sebelum berjalan memasukinya untuk menghindari penyergapan.

spells.name: Light Binding
spells.description: Lux melepaskan a sphere of light that binds dan deals damage to hingga two enemy units.
spells.tooltip: Fires a ball of light, rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The second enemy receives {{ e2 }}% of the effect.

spells.name: Prismatic Barrier
spells.description: Lux throws her wand dan bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
spells.tooltip: Throws Lux's wand to a target location and back, protecting herself and all allied Champions it touches from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Lucent Singularity
spells.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows musuh di dekat. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
spells.tooltip:
Creates a zone that slows enemies by {{ e1 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds the zone detonates dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activate again to detonate early.

spells.name: Final Spark
spells.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area.  In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability dan refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
spells.tooltip: Channels a dazzling ray of light dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line. Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

passive.name: Illumination
passive.description: Damaging spell Lux men-charge target dengan energy selama 6 detik.  Serangan Lux berikutnya menyalakan energy, memberikan bonus magic damage (bergantung kepada level Lux) kepada target.

Malphite.name: Malphite
Malphite.title: Shard of the Monolith
allytips: Armor mengurangi rate yang menyerang melalui Granite Shield. Aktifkan Brutal Strikes sebelum musuh dapat menghancurkan perisai untuk meminimalkan damage yang Anda terima.

Meskipun ability-nya bergantung padaArmor, beberapa game memerlukan Malphite untuk mendapatkan Magic Resist. Ketika game tersebut muncul, coba dapatkan Aegis of the Legion, Mercury's Treads, dan Guardian Angel.

spells.name: Seismic Shard
spells.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, memberikan damage upon impact dan stealing movement speed for 4 detik.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and steals {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed from the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Brutal Strikes
spells.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attack memberikan damage to all units in front of him. Activating Brutal Strikes greatly meningkatkan his Armor dan Attack Damage for a short amount of time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's basic attacks hit units near his target for {{ e1 }}% of his Attack Damage.

Active: Malphite's Armor and Attack Damage increase by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Ground Slam
spells.description: Malphite slams the ground sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage berdasarkan his Armor as damage dan reduces the Attack speed of enemies for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.

spells.name: Unstoppable Force
spells.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies dan knocking them into the air.
spells.tooltip: Malphite charges toward the target area, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking enemies into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds.

passive.name: Granite Shield
passive.description: Malphite terlindung dengan sebuah lapisan batu yang menyerap damage hingga 10% dari maksimum Health-nya. Jika Malphite tidak dipukul selama 10 detik, efek ini akan re-charge.

Malzahar.name: Malzahar
Malzahar.title: the Prophet of the Void
allytips: Jangan takut men-spam skill untuk mempersiapkan Voidling Anda dalam aksi.
Berikan Null Zone sebelum menggunakan Nether Grasp untuk memaksimalkan damage.
Null Zone sangat kuat menghadapi neutral monster ber-HP tinggi. Coba gunakan cara tersebut untuk mendapatkan buff biru dari Ancient Golem.

spells.name: Call of the Void
spells.description: Malzahar membukan dua portal untuk Void. Setelah delay singkat, mereka akan menembakkan peluru yang memberikan magic damage dan men-silence Champion musuh.
spells.tooltip: Malzahar opens two portals to the void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silence champions for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Null Zone
spells.description: Malzahar menciptakan zona energy negatif yang melukai musuh yang berdiri di atasnya.
spells.tooltip: Malzahar creates a zone of negative energy for {{ e3 }} seconds. The zone damages nearby enemies for {{ e1 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their max health each second (damage to Monsters is capped at {{ e4 }} damage per second).

spells.name: Malefic Visions
spells.description: Malzahar menginfeksi pikiran target dengan vision kejam atas kematian mereka, memberikan damage setiap detik. Jika target mati ketika dalam pengaruh vision, akan ditransfer ke unit musuh di dekat dan Malzahar mendapatkan mana. Voidling si Malzahar tertarik pada unit yang terpengaruh.
spells.tooltip:
Malzahar infects his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds.

If the target dies during this time, the visions pass to a nearby enemy and Malzahar gains {{ e2 }} mana.

Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.

spells.name: Nether Grasp
spells.description: Malzahar men-channel essence Void untuk men-suppress seorang Champion musuh dan memberikan damage setiap detik.
spells.tooltip: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress target champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2.5 seconds.

passive.name: Summon Voidling
passive.description:
Setelah meng-cast 4 spell, Malzahar men-summon sebuah Voidling yang tidak terkendali untuk menghadapi unit musuh selama 21 detik. Voidling memiliki 200 + 50 x lvl Health dan 20 + 5 x lvl Damage.

Voidlings Grow setelah 7 detik (+50% Damage/Armor), dan Frenzy setelah 14 detik (+100% Attack Speed).

Maokai.name: Maokai
Maokai.title: the Twisted Treant
allytips: Saplings dapat di-toss ke dalam brush atau di atas terrain untuk mendapatkan penglihatan atas musuh Anda.
Simpan Vengeful Maelstrom hingga lawan Anda telah berkomitmen penuh untuk bertarung.
Me-ranking up Arcane Smash dan Twisted Advance memberikan Maokai gerakan crowd control, sedangkan me-ranking up Sapling Toss akan meningkatkan damage keluaran Anda dan ability untuk farm.

spells.name: Arcane Smash
spells.description: Maokai knocks back musuh di dekat with a shockwave, memberikan magic damage dan slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Maokai releases an arcane shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked back and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Twisted Advance
spells.description: Maokai dissolves into a cloud of arcane energies.  He regrows near a target enemy, memberikan damage dan rooting it in place.
spells.tooltip: Maokai transforms into a cloud of arcane energy that quickly travels to a target enemy, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and roots it for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Sapling Toss
spells.description: Maokai flings a sapling that deals area damage on impact.  The sapling then wards the nearby area.  When enemies approach, the sapling attack enemies with an arcane blast.
spells.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact.

The sapling wards the nearby area, and will chase enemies that approach, exploding to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Saplings last for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Vengeful Maelstrom
spells.description: Maokai shields his allies by drawing power from hostile spells dan attack, reducing non-tower damage done to allied Champion in the area. When Maokai ends the effect, he unleashes the absorbed energy to memberikan damage to enemies within the vortex.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Maokai creates a magical vortex that protects him and allied champions by reducing damage from non-turret sources by {{ e1 }}%.

Maokai can end the effect to release the stored energy, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+2 per damage absorbed) magic damage to enemies within the vortex. Maokai can store up to {{ e5 }} bonus damage.

passive.name: Sap Magic
passive.description: Setiap kali sebuah spell di-cast dekat Maokai, dia menarik energy darinya, mendapat sebuah charge dari Magical Sap. Ketika Maokai memiliki 5 charge, basic attack berikutnya meng-heal dirinya sebesar 7% dari maks HP-nya.

MasterYi.name: Master Yi
MasterYi.title: the Wuju Bladesman
allytips: Jika Anda berada di lane melawan pemain ranged, level up Meditate dapat memungkinkan Anda bertahan di lane lebih lama dan mendapat level lebih cepat dari mereka.
Wuju Style sangat kuat di awal untuk last hitting minion.
Coba gunakan Alpha Strike pada minion di depan Champion musuh sehingga Anda tetap berada di jarak yang aman ketika spell berakhir.

spells.name: Alpha Strike
spells.description: Master Yi melompat melewati medan pertempuran dengan kecepatan yang membutakan, memberikan magic damage kepada beberapa unit dalam jalurnya dengan kesempatan untuk memberikan bonus magic damage kepada minion dan monster.
spells.tooltip: Master Yi leaps across the battlefield striking up to 4 enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each enemy with a {{ e2 }}% chance to deal {{ e3 }} bonus magic damage to minions and monsters.

spells.name: Meditate
spells.description: Master Yi rejuvinates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health dan increasing his Armor dan Magic Resist for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Master Yi channels, restoring {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health over 5 seconds. While channeling, Master Yi gains {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist.

spells.name: Wuju Style
spells.description: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, secara pasif increasing his Attack Damage.  Activating Wuju Style doubles the bonus for a short time, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Increases Attack Damage by {{ e1 }}.

Active: Master Yi doubles the passive bonus for 10 seconds. The passive bonus is then lost while Wuju Style is on cooldown.

spells.name: Highlander
spells.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement dan Attack speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, killing a Champion refreshes all of Master Yi's cooldowns.
spells.tooltip:
Increases Master Yi's Movement Speed by 40% and Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%, and he becomes immune to all slowing effects for {{ e1 }} seconds.

While active, killing a champion refreshes all of Master Yi's cooldowns (assists reduce half of the base cooldown amount).

passive.name: Double Strike
passive.description: Master Yi menyerang dua kali setiap serangan ke-7.

MissFortune.name: Miss Fortune
MissFortune.title: the Bounty Hunter
allytips: Miss Fortune meningkatkan speed jika dia tidak diserang oleh target musuh. Hindari dipukul untuk bergerak sangat cepat.
Gunakan Double Up pada minion musuh terjauh jika Champion musuh bersembunyi di belakang; itu akan memantul kepada mereka untuk damage yang besar.
Double Up memberikan efek On-Hit, membuat item seperti Frozen Mallet dan Bloodthirster sangat efektif.

spells.name: Double Up
spells.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them dan a target behind them.
spells.tooltip: Miss Fortune fires a shot at an enemy target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and {{ e2 }}% of that damage to another enemy target behind the first. Applies on-hit effects.

spells.name: Impure Shots
spells.description: Miss Fortune secara pasif meningkatkan damage dealt to a target with setiap strike.  This ability can be activated to increase Miss Fortune's Attack Speed dan cause her attack to lower healing received by the target.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Miss Fortune deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to her target with each attack, cumulatively stacking up to {{ e4 }} times on the same target.
Maximum bonus damage: {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }})

Active: Miss Fortune's Attack Speed is increased by {{ e2 }}% for 6 seconds and causes her attacks to lower healing received and health regeneration of the target by 50% for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Make It Rain
spells.description: Miss Fortune unleashes a flurry of bullets at a location, memberikan waves of damage to opponents dan slowing them.
spells.tooltip: Miss Fortune fires hundreds of bullets into the air that rain down at a location after 0.5 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds and slowing enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for 1 second.

spells.name: Bullet Time
spells.description: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, memberikan large amounts of damage to enemies.
spells.tooltip: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per bullet.

passive.name: Strut
passive.description: Setelah 5 detik tidak diserang, Miss Fortune mendapat tambahan 25 Movement Speed. Bonus ini bertambah 9 setiap detik hingga maksimum bonus 70.

MonkeyKing.name: Wukong
MonkeyKing.title: the Monkey King
allytips: Decoy dan Nimbus Strike bekerja bersama untuk menghantam musuh Anda dengan cepat dan keluar sebelum mereka dapat membalas.
Coba gunakan Decoy dekat brush untuk membuat musuh bertindak berlebihan terhadap movement Anda.
Oracle's Elixir akan memungkinkan lawan melihat Anda bahkan ketika menggunakan Decoy.

spells.name: Crushing Blow
spells.description: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, dan reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Wukong's next attack gains {{ e4 }} Attack Range, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and reduces the enemy's Armor by {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Decoy
spells.description: Wukong becomes invisible for 1.5 detik. An uncontrollable decoy is left behind that will memberikan magic damage to enemies near it after 1.5 detik.
spells.tooltip: Wukong becomes invisible for 1.5 seconds. An uncontrollable decoy is left behind that will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies near it after 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Nimbus Strike
spells.description: Wukong dashes toward a target enemy dan sends out images to attack hingga 2 additional enemies near his target, memberikan physical damage to setiap enemy struck.
spells.tooltip: Wukong dashes toward a target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to each enemy struck. Upon hitting his target, Wukong gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Cyclone
spells.description: Wukong's staff grows outward dan he spins it around, memberikan damage dan knocking up enemies. Wukong gains movement speed over the duration of the spell.
spells.tooltip: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per second and knocking up enemies he encounters. Wukong gains speed over the duration of the spell. Lasts 4 seconds.

passive.name: Stone Skin
passive.description: Meningkatkan armor dan magic resistance Wukong untuk setiap Champion musuh di dekatnya.

Mordekaiser.name: Mordekaiser
Mordekaiser.title: the Master of Metal
allytips: Anda dapat mengendalikan pet dengan menahan tombol Alt dan gunakan tombol kanan mouse.
Kadang kala, defense terbaik adalah lebih offense; gunakan ability Mordekaiser untuk men-charge up perisainya.
Ingat bahwa Children of the Grave dapat digunakan secara defensif karena komponen lifesteal-nya.

spells.name: Mace of Spades
spells.description: On next hit, Mordekaiser swings his mace with such force that it echoes out, striking hingga 3 additional nearby targets, memberikan damage plus bonus damage. If the target is alone, the attack deals extra damage.
spells.tooltip:
On next hit, Mordekaiser swings his mace with such force that it echoes out, striking up to 3 additional nearby targets, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If the target is alone, {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) damage is dealt instead.

spells.name: Creeping Death
spells.description: Unleashes a protective cloud of metal shards to surround an ally, increasing their armor dan magic resistance dan memberikan damage per detik to enemies in the cloud.
spells.tooltip: Unleashes a protective cloud of metal shards to surround an ally for 6 seconds, increasing their armor and magic resistance by {{ e1 }} and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to nearby enemies.

spells.name: Siphon of Destruction
spells.description: Mordekaiser deals damage to enemies in a cone in front of him. For setiap unit hit, Mordekaiser's shield absorbs energy.
spells.tooltip: Mordekaiser damages enemies in a cone in front of him, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Children of the Grave
spells.description: Mordekaiser curses an enemy, stealing a percent of their life initially dan setiap detik. If the target dies while the spell is active, their soul is enslaved dan will follow Mordekaiser as a ghost for 30 detik.
spells.tooltip:
Steals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of target champion's maximum Health (half stolen initially and half over 10 seconds; deals Magic Damage).

If the target dies while cursed, their soul is enslaved and will follow Mordekaiser as a ghost for 30 seconds. Mordekaiser gains 20% of their Ability Power and Attack Damage, and the ghost's stats are enhanced.

The ghost can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

passive.name: Iron Man
passive.description: Sebuah persentase dari damage yang diberikan ability dirubah menjadi perisai sementara, menyerap damage yang datang.

Morgana.name: Morgana
Morgana.title: Fallen Angel
allytips: Kelihaian menggunakan Black Shield dapat menentukan hasil dari pertarungan.
Item yang menyediakan survivability memungkinkan Morgana menjadi sangat sulit untuk dibunuh dalam hubungannya dengan Black Shield dan Soul Shackle.
Tormented Soil adalah alat farming yang sangat baik jika Anda sendirian di lane.

spells.name: Dark Binding
spells.description: Morgana melepaskan sebuah sphere dark magic. Saat bersentuhan dengan unit musuh, sphere akan memberikan magic damage dan memaksa unit ke tanah untuk sebuah jangka waktu.
spells.tooltip: Fires a bolt of dark energy, rooting the first enemy hit for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Tormented Soil
spells.description: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
spells.tooltip: Curses an area for 5 seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and have their Magic Resist reduced by {{ e2 }} every second.

spells.name: Black Shield
spells.description: Menempatkan penghalang yang melindungi di sekeliling Champion sekutu, menyerap magical damage dan men-disable hingga menembus atau perisai menghilang.
spells.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion for {{ e2 }} seconds. The shield absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.

spells.name: Soul Shackles
spells.description: Latches chains of energy onto nearby Champion musuh, memberikan initial damage to them dan slowing their Movement Speed, dan then echoing the pain a few detik later dan stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.
spells.tooltip:
Dark chains latch onto nearby enemy Champions dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing them by 20% for 3 seconds. After 3 seconds, they are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Enemy Champions can break the chains by moving away from Morgana.

passive.name: Soul Siphon
passive.description: Morgana memiliki Spell Vamp, meng-heal dirinya ketika dia memberikan damage dengan spell-nya.

Nami.name: Nami
Nami.title: the Tidecaller
allytips: Aqua Prison memiliki cooldown yang lama, pastikan menggunakannya pada saat yang tepat.
Menggunakan Ebb and Flow selama pertarungan dengan Champion musuh akan membantu membuat pertarungan menjadi milik Anda.
Ultimate Nami dapat menjadi sangat berguna untuk membuka pada musuh yang berada jauh.

spells.name: Aqua Prison
spells.description: Sends a bubble towards a targeted area, memberikan damage dan stunning all enemies on impact.
spells.tooltip: Sends a bubble towards a targeted area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Ebb and Flow
spells.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back dan forth between allies dan enemies, healing allies dan damaging enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allies and enemies.

On Ally Hit: Heals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health and will bounce to a nearby enemy champion.

On Enemy Hit: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and bounces to a nearby allied champion.

Bounces to each target only once, and hits up to {{ e2 }} targets. The damage and healing value is reduced by 15% each bounce.

spells.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
spells.description: Empowers an allied Champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attack memberikan bonus magic damage dan slow the target.
spells.tooltip: Empowers an allied champion for {{ e5 }} seconds or {{ e4 }} basic attacks. The ally's basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and slow the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

spells.name: Tidal Wave
spells.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, dan damages enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position.

The Tidal Wave knocks up enemies and slows them by {{ e4 }}%, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of 2 seconds and a maximum of {{ e5 }} seconds.

passive.name: Surging Tides
passive.description: Ketika ability Nami mengenai Champion sekutu, mereka mendapat movement speed untuk waktu yang singkat.

Nasus.name: Nasus
Nasus.title: the Curator of the Sands
allytips: Memperhatikan pada last hit dengan Siphoning Strike akan memiliki pengaruh besar pada akhir game.

Jika Anda solo, Spirit Fire adalah cara yang baik untuk farm di lane. Dapat menjadi buruh jika Anda di lane berdua dan Anda mem-push terlalu jauh. Temukan keseimbangan yang tepat antara last hit Siphoning Strike dan AE farming.
Jika Anda memiliki defense rendah, orang akan berfokus pada Anda bahkan selama ultimate Anda. Coba beli beberapa item survivability bahkan dalam DPS build Anda.

spells.name: Siphoning Strike
spells.description: Nasus strikes his foe, memberikan damage dan increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Nasus's next basic attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Passive: Siphoning Strike permanently gains {{ e2 }} damage if it kills an enemy unit. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

spells.name: Wither
spells.description: Nasus ages his target, decelerating their Movement dan Attack Speeds seiring waktu.
spells.tooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, initially slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.

spells.name: Spirit Fire
spells.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, memberikan damage dan reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
spells.tooltip:
Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a target location, dealing an initial {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }} and are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second.

spells.name: Fury of the Sands
spells.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters musuh di dekat. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, cast ranges, dan drains musuh di dekat' maks Health converting into bonus damage for the duration.
spells.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ e1 }}, Attack Range by {{ e2 }}, and cast ranges by {{ e4 }}.

While the storm rages, he deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second ({{ e5 }} damage max per second) as magic damage and converts it into bonus Attack Damage.

passive.name: Soul Eater
passive.description: Nasus menyerap spiritual energy lawannya, memberikan dia bonus Lifesteal.

Nautilus.name: Nautilus
Nautilus.title: the Titan of the Depths
allytips: Ketika ganking, pertimbangkan membidik Dredge Line pada terrain di dekatnya dan diikuti dengan Riptide untuk hit rate yang lebih tinggi.
Riptide memiliki penundaan waktu ledakan saat aktivasi - Anda dapat menggunakannya sambil melarikan diri atau ketika musuh datang untuk bertindak sebagai penghalang.

spells.name: Dredge Line
spells.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a Champion, he drags both himself dan the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor dan the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning them briefly.

If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward and the cooldown is reduced by {{ e3 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

spells.name: Titan's Wrath
spells.description: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attack apply a damage seiring waktu effect to enemies around his target.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, shielding him from the next {{ e1 }} plus 10% of his bonus health (+{{ f1 }}) damage for up to {{ e3 }} seconds.

While the shield persists, Nautilus' basic attacks apply a damage over time effect to all units around his target. The effect deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds.

spells.name: Riptide
spells.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. setiap explosion damages dan slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to units in the area and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take {{ e3 }}% less damage from additional explosions.

spells.name: Depth Charge
spells.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it rsetiapes the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air dan stunning them.
spells.tooltip:
Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through and knocks them into the air.

The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

passive.name: Staggering Blow
passive.description: Basic attack Nautilus memberikan bonus physical damage dan immoblize targetnya. Efek ini tidak dapat terjadi lebih dari sekali setiap beberapa detik untuk target yang sama.

Nidalee.name: Nidalee
Nidalee.title: the Bestial Huntress
allytips: Gunakan brush untuk keuntungan Anda!  Bergerak keluar masuk brush dapat sangat mengubah efektivitas Anda di dalam pertempuran.
Dalam pertempuran, mulai meng-harras dengan Javelin Toss Anda, kemudian ganti ke cougar form untuk mengejar setiap orang yang melarikan diri.
Ability Cougar tidak memiliki cost, memungkinkan Anda memelihara stack penuh atas Guinsoo's Rageblade untuk tambahan waktu.

spells.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
spells.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, memberikan more damage the less life they have.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee tosses her javelin, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage on impact (deals up to 250% damage the farther away the target is).

Cougar: Nidalee's next attack deals additional damage based on how low her opponent's life is.

spells.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
spells.description: Dalam Human Form, Nidalee meletakkan jebakan perusak untuk lawan yang kurang hati-hati yang, ketika terperangkap, me-reveal target dan mengurangi Armor dan Magic Resist mereka selama 12 detik. Sebagai cougar, dia menerkam ke depan, memberikan sejumlah kecil damage ketika dia mendarat. Pounce tidak dipengaruhi oleh cooldown reduction.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee lays a trap that deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds, reveals the target, and reduces their Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }}% for 12 seconds. Traps last for 4 minutes.

Cougar: Nidalee lunges forward, dealing damage to surrounding enemies.

spells.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
spells.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies dan imbue them with attack speed for a short duration.  As a cougar, she rapidly claws enemies in front of her.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee heals an allied champion for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and grants them a {{ e2 }}% attack speed for 7 seconds.

Cougar: Nidalee claws at enemies in front of her.

spells.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
spells.description: Nidalee berubah menjadi seekor cougar, mendapatkan ability baru dan meningkatkan Movement Speed.
spells.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee transforms into a vicious cougar, gaining {{ e5 }} Movement Speed, and her basic abilities become Takedown, Pounce, and Swipe.

Cougar: Nidalee transforms back into human form.

passive.name: Prowl
passive.description: Bergerak melalui brush menambah Movement Speed Nidalee sebesar 15% selama 2 detik.

Nocturne.name: Nocturne
Nocturne.title: the Eternal Nightmare
allytips: Gunakan Paranoia pada waktu genting sangat berharga bahkan jika Anda tidak dapat menggunakan dash.
Duskbringer bukan hanya sebuah ability offensive saja. Ia dapat digunakan untuk menjauh dari pertarungan jarak dekat atau melarikan dari dari kematian tertentu.
Gunakan Shroud of Darkness berpasangan dengan dash Paranoia. Lawan Anda mungkin panik dan menghabiskan sebuah disable critical pada perisai spell Anda.

spells.name: Duskbringer
spells.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, dan causes Champion to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units dan has increased Movement Speed dan Attack Damage.
spells.tooltip:
Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail.

While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e4 }} Attack Damage.

spells.name: Shroud of Darkness
spells.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, secara pasif gaining attack speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability dan doubles his passive attack speed if successful.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne has {{ e1 }}% bonus Attack Speed.

Active: Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Unspeakable Horror
spells.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, memberikan damage setiap detik dan fearing the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
spells.tooltip: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes feared for {{ e2 }} second(s).

spells.name: Paranoia
spells.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all Champion musuh dan removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby Champion musuh.
spells.tooltip:
Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision for 4 seconds.

While Paranoia is active, Nocturne can launch himself at an enemy champion, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

passive.name: Umbra Blades
passive.description:
Setiap 10 detik, Serangan Nocturne berikutnya menyerang musuh di sekeliling sebesar 120% physical damage dan meng-heal dirinya.

Basic attack Nocturne mengurangi cooldown ini sebesar 1 detik.

Nunu.name: Nunu
Nunu.title: the Yeti Rider
allytips: Consume memungkinkan Nunu untuk tetap di lane melawan musuh ranged.
Anda dapat memilih untuk menggangu menggunakan Absolute Zero di awal untuk damage sebagian jika lawan mencoba untuk lari jauh dari jangkauan.
Kadang menguntungkan untuk menunda meng-cast Absolute Zero hingga semua disable di babak awal telah digunakan. Coba menahan diri sebelum buru-buru masuk ke pertempuran.

spells.name: Consume
spells.description: Nunu memerintahkan yeti untuk menggigit target minion atau monster, memberikan heavy damage kepadanya dan meng-heal dirinya sendiri.
spells.tooltip:
Commands the yeti to bite out of a minion or monster, dealing {{ e1 }} true damage to the target and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

Nunu gains bonuses for {{ e3 }} seconds based on what he consumed.

Reptiles: Your attacks and spells deal an additional 1% of your maximum health as magic damage.
Golems: 10% increased Size and Maximum Health
Wolves or Wraiths: Killing a unit grants 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds

spells.name: Blood Boil
spells.description: Nunu memperkuat dirinya dan unit sekutu dengan memanaskan darah mereka, meningkatkan Movement dan Attack Speed mereka.
spells.tooltip: The heat of Nunu and a target ally's blood rises, increasing Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Ice Blast
spells.description: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, memberikan damage dan temporarily slowing their Movement dan Attack Speeds.
spells.tooltip: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Absolute Zero
spells.description: Nunu mulai menguras area panas, men-slow semua musuh di dekat. Ketika spell berakhir, dia memberikan damage besar kepada semua musuh yang terperangkap dalam area.
spells.tooltip:
Nunu saps the area of heat, channeling up to {{ e4 }} seconds, slowing surrounding enemy units' Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}%.

Enemies caught in the area when the channel ends receive up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, depending on how long the spell was channeled.

passive.name: Visionary
passive.description: Nunu dapat meng-cast sebuah spell secara gratis setelah 5 serangan.

Olaf.name: Olaf
Olaf.title: the Berserker
allytips: Olaf dapat mengkombinasikan Berserker Rage, Vicious Strikes, dan Ragnarok di life rendah menjadi kuat secara tipuan.
Setelah membeli item health, Olaf memberikan damage signifikan ketika Vicious Strikes sedang aktif.

spells.name: Undertow
spells.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, memberikan damage to units it passes through dan slowing their movement speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 detik.
spells.tooltip:
Olaf throws an axe to a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to units it passes through and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for 2.5 seconds. This slow fades over time.

If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

spells.name: Vicious Strikes
spells.description: Olaf's attack damage is increased, berdasarkan his health, dan he gains massive lifesteal dan spell vamp.
spells.tooltip: For 6 seconds, Olaf's attack damage is increased by {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }} [1% of maximum Health]) and he gains {{ e3 }}% lifesteal and spell vamp.

spells.name: Reckless Swing
spells.description: Olaf attack with such force that it deals true damage to his target dan himself.
