spells.tooltip: Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} true damage to his target.

spells.name: Ragnarok
spells.description: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables dan gains bonus Armor, Magic Resist, dan Armor Penetration.
spells.tooltip: Olaf removes all disables from himself and becomes immune to them for the next {{ e3 }} seconds. During this time, Olaf gains {{ e1 }} Armor, {{ e1 }} Magic Resist, and {{ e2 }} Armor Penetration.

passive.name: Berserker Rage
passive.description: Untuk setiap 1% health hilang, attack speed Olaf bertambah 1%.

Orianna.name: Orianna
Orianna.title: the Lady of Clockwork
allytips: Command: Protect dapat digunakan pada diri Anda  untuk mengembalikan bola kepada Anda dengan cepat. Kombinasikan ini dengan Command: Attack untuk harassment yang cepat.
Command: Dissonance adalah alat melarikan diri yang sangat kuat jika Orianna memiliki bola. Kombinasi antara kecepatan dan meninggalkan penghalang pelambat dapat menjadi cukup kuat.
Command: Shockwave dapat digunakan untuk menarik musuh ke arah Anda atau menjauh dari Anda jika Anda memposisikan bola dengan benar.

spells.name: Command: Attack
spells.description: Orianna commands her ball to fire toward a target location, memberikan magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her ball remains at the target location after.
spells.tooltip:
Orianna commands her ball to shoot toward a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to targets along the way. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (Minimum {{ e3 }}%).

Her ball remains behind at the target location afterwards.

spells.name: Command: Dissonance
spells.description: Orianna commands the ball to release a pulse of energy, memberikan magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies dan slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Orianna commands her ball to release an electric pulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The pulse leaves behind an energy field for {{ e4 }} seconds, lowering enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and increasing ally Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. This effect diminishes over time.

spells.name: Command: Protect
spells.description: Orianna commands her ball to attach to an allied Champion, shielding them dan memberikan magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the ball grants additional Armor dan Magic Resist to the Champion it is attached to.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: The ball adds {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.

Active: Orianna commands her ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for {{ e5 }} seconds from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Enemies the ball passes through along the way are damaged for {{ e4 }}% of the shield value: {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

spells.name: Command: Shockwave
spells.description: Orianna commands her ball to unleash a shockwave, memberikan magic damage dan launching musuh di dekat towards the ball after a short delay.
spells.tooltip: Orianna commands her ball to unleash a shockwave after a brief delay, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and flinging them into the air a set distance in the direction of the ball.

passive.name: Clockwork Windup
passive.description: Autoattack Orianna memberikan tambahan magic damage. Damage ini meningkat jika semakin lama Orianna menyerang target yang sama.

Pantheon.name: Pantheon
Pantheon.title: the Artisan of War
allytips: Menggunakan Aegis of Zeonia dengan cepat, diikuti Heartseeker Strike dapat menghancurkan musuh Anda.
Menggunakan Spear Shot dengan sering di pertempuran, bersama dengan item attack speed, dapat membantu secara defensif dengan men-charge Aegis Protection.
Menggunakan Grand Skyfall membantu sekutu Anda untuk menyeberangi map dapat dengan cepat membalikkan keadaan, memberikan sekutu Anda keuntungan.

spells.name: Spear Shot
spells.description: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, memberikan damage.
spells.tooltip: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

spells.name: Aegis of Zeonia
spells.description: Pantheon leaps at an enemy dan bashes the enemy with his shield, stunning them.  After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
spells.tooltip: Pantheon leaps at the target enemy champion and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second. Pantheon also instantly refreshes his Aegis Protection.

spells.name: Heartseeker Strike
spells.description: Pantheon focuses dan unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him, memberikan double damage to Champion.  Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% health.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below {{ e3 }}% health.

Active: Pantheon focuses and deals {{ e4 }} swift strikes in front of him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per strike. Deals double damage to champions.

spells.name: Grand Skyfall
spells.description: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area.   Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
spells.tooltip: Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at the target area a few seconds later. Deals up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to units at the center (down to {{ e3 }}% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for 1 second.

passive.name: Aegis Protection
passive.description: Setelah menyerang atau meng-cast spell 4 kali, Pantheon akan menahan basic attack atau turret attack yang datang berikutnya.

Poppy.name: Poppy
Poppy.title: the Iron Ambassador
allytips: Diplomatic Immunity dapat digunakan secara defensive dan offensive. Sangat berharga untuk memilih target dengan damage tinggi dan mencoba untuk membunuh mereka.
Coba gunakan ledakan movement speed Paragon of Demacia untuk memposisikan Heroic Charge Anda.

spells.name: Devastating Blow
spells.description: Poppy crushes her opponent, memberikan attack damage plus a flat amount dan 8% dari her target's maks health as bonus damage. The bonus damage cannot exceed a threshold berdasarkan rank.
spells.tooltip: Poppy crushes her opponent, dealing attack damage (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }} and 8% of her target's maximum health as magic damage. The bonus damage dealt cannot exceed {{ e3 }}.

spells.name: Paragon of Demacia
spells.description: Passive: Upon receiving damage from atau memberikan damage with a basic attack, Poppy's armor dan damage are increased for 5 detik. This effect can stack 10 times. Active: Poppy gains maks stack of Paragon of Demacia dan her movement speed is increased for 5 detik.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Upon receiving damage from or dealing damage with a basic attack, Poppy's armor and damage are increased by {{ e1 }} for 5 seconds. This effect can stack 10 times.

Active: Poppy gains max stacks of Paragon of Demacia and her movement speed is increased by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Heroic Charge
spells.description: Poppy charges at an enemy dan carries them further. The initial impact deals a small amount of damage, dan if they collide with terrain, her target will take a high amount of damage dan be stunned.
spells.tooltip: Poppy charges at an enemy and carries them for a short distance. The initial impact deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If they collide with terrain, her target takes {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and will be stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Diplomatic Immunity
spells.description: Poppy focuses intently on a single Champion musuh, memberikan increased damage to them. Poppy is immune to any damage dan abilities from enemies other than her target.
spells.tooltip:
For {{ e1 }} seconds, Poppy is immune to any damage and abilities from enemies other than her target enemy champion.
In addition, Poppy's attacks deal {{ e2 }}% increased damage to the marked target.

passive.name: Valiant Fighter
passive.description: Semua physical dan magic damage yang diberikan ke Poppy yang melebihi 10% dari health-nya sekarang dikurangi 50%, tetapi tidak mengurangi damage dari structure.

Quinn.name: Quinn
Quinn.title: Demacia's Wings
allytips: Valor lebih memilih menandai musuh yang Anda serang. Dia juga akan menandai minion untuk membantu Anda melakukan last hit.

Vault sangat kuat tetapi harus digunakan dengan hati-hati, karena musuh dapat menyerang Quinn ketika dia menyerang mereka. Vault kadang digunakan untuk menyeberangi terrain jika belakang Anda adalah dinding.
Gunakan Tag Team untuk berjalan dalam jarak yang jauh dengan cepat, untuk melarikan diri dari musuh, atau untuk mengejar target yang terluka.

spells.name: Blinding Assault
spells.description: Quinn calls Valor to blind dan damage targets in an area.
spells.tooltip:
Valor flies in a line and strikes the first enemy in his path. He then attacks all nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage and blinding them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

As Valor: Performs the same attack at the current location.

spells.name: Heightened Senses
spells.description: secara pasif grants Quinn Attack Speed dan Movement Speed after she attack a Vulnerable target. Valor's Attack Speed is permanently increased. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target will increase Quinn's Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed by {{ e6 }} for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Passive as Valor: Gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Vault
spells.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, memberikan physical damage dan slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon rsetiaping the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, dan lands near her maksimum Attack Range away from the target. Valor will immediately mark this enemy as Vulnerable.
spells.tooltip:
Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% (this effect diminishes over {{ e3 }} seconds).

Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range from the target. Valor will immediately mark this enemy as Vulnerable.

As Valor: Performs the same attack but does not mark or leap off the target.

spells.name: Tag Team
spells.description: Valor replaces Quinn on the battlefield as a mobile melee attacker. When ready, Quinn returns in a hail of arrows, memberikan physical damage to all musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Valor replaces Quinn on the battlefield as a mobile melee attacker for {{ e4 }} seconds. Valor can move through units and gains +{{ e3 }}% Movement Speed, decreased gradually to +{{ e5 }}% when in combat.

Second Cast: Quinn returns to perform Skystrike, dealing from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to all enemies in a large area, increasing based on how much health they are missing.

If Skystrike has not been cast before this ability ends, it will be cast automatically.

passive.name: Harrier
passive.description: Valor secara berkala menandai musuh-musuh sebagai Vulnerable. Basic attack Quinn yang pertama terhadap target Vulnerable akan memberikan bonus physical damage.

Rammus.name: Rammus
Rammus.title: the Armordillo
allytips: Powerball dapat digunakan sebagai mekanisme melarikan diri yang efektif.
Penggunaan taunt pada Champion di dekat tower Anda dapat menyebabkan tower menyerang musuh Anda.
Tremors dan Defensive Ball Curl dapat digunakan pada akhir game untuk menghancurkan tower. Jika Anda terjebak dalam pertempuran, kadang berharga untuk memisah dan menyerang bangungan.

spells.name: Powerball
spells.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, memberikan damage dan slowing targets affected by the impact.
spells.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball over {{ e4 }} seconds towards his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies on impact and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Activating Defensive Ball Curl will remove this effect.

spells.name: Defensive Ball Curl
spells.description: Rammus berubah menjadi formasi defensif, sangat meningkatkan Armor dan Magic Resist-nya, ketika kembali, ketika mengembalikan damage kepada serangan.
spells.tooltip:
Rammus goes into a defensive formation for {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} and returning {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to attackers.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e4 }}% of Armor.

Activating Powerball will remove this effect.

spells.name: Puncturing Taunt
spells.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against Rammus' hard shell, reducing Armor temporarily.
spells.tooltip: Rammus taunts the enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault, reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} and forcing them to attack Rammus for {{ e1 }} second(s).

spells.name: Tremors
spells.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to units dan structures near him.
spells.tooltip: Rammus creates tremors beneath him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every second to nearby units and structures for {{ e3 }} seconds.

passive.name: Spiked Shell
passive.description: Rammus mendapatkan tambahan damage saat shell-nya bersatu, mengubah 25% armor-nya menjadi Attack Damage.

Renekton.name: Renekton
Renekton.title: the Butcher of the Sands
allytips: Slice and Dice unggul dalam meng-harass. Slice, diikuti dengan skill lain dan kemudian Dice kembali untuk keamanan..
Cull the Meek menyerap sejumlah besar life ketika digunakan di tengah pertempuran. Anda dapat menggunakan ini untuk memancing musuh berpikir Anda lebih lemah dari Anda yang sebenarnya.
Cooldown reduction sangat baik untuk Renekton, memungkinkan dia untuk cepat berkembang dan menggunakan Fury-nya.

spells.name: Cull the Meek
spells.description: Renekton swings his blade, memberikan moderate physical damage to all targets around him dan heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage dan heal are increased.
spells.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and gains 5% of the damage dealt as Health (20% for champions), up to {{ e2 }}. Enemy champions heal for 4x as much.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Heal percent increased to 10%, up to {{ e3 }}.

spells.name: Ruthless Predator
spells.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, memberikan moderate physical damage dan stuns them for 0.75 detik. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, memberikan high physical damage dan stuns them for 1.5 detik.
spells.tooltip:
Renekton's next attack strikes twice, dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage ({{ e3 }} + {{ e2 }}% of his Attack Damage) and stuns for 0.75 seconds. Each hit applies on-hit effects.

50 Fury Bonus: Instead, Renekton attacks three times, dealing {{ f2 }} physical damage ({{ e4 }} + {{ e1 }}% of his Attack Damage) and stuns his target for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Slice and Dice
spells.description: Renekton dashes, memberikan damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage dan reduces the armor of units hit.
spells.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for 4 seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e2 }}% reduced Armor for 4 seconds.

spells.name: Dominus
spells.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health dan memberikan damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
spells.tooltip: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for 15 seconds, gaining {{ e1 }} Health. While active, he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and gains 5 Fury per second.

passive.name: Reign of Anger
passive.description: Renekton mendapat Fury untuk setiap autoattack yang dibuatnya. Fury ini dapat meng-empower ability-nya dengan bonus efek. Sebagai tambahan, Renekton mendapat bonus Fury ketika dalam life rendah.

Rengar.name: Rengar
Rengar.title: the Pridestalker
allytips: Gunakan ultimate Rengar untuk menemukan dan membunuh target prioritas tinggi dalam pertempuran.
Banyak kekuatan Rengar yang berasal dari ability empower yang digunakan pada waktu yang tepat - pilihlah dengan bijaksana!
Pastikan untuk mengambil jalur melalui brush ketika mengejar musuh untuk mengambil keuntungan dari passive Rengar.

spells.name: Savagery
spells.description:
Rengar's next basic attack deals bonus damage dan grants him increased Attack Speed.
Ferocity Bonus: Rengar deals enhanced damage dan doubles his Attack Speed bonus.
spells.tooltip:
The next basic attack within 6 seconds deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Grants {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity bonus: Additionally deals {{ e2 }}% of Rengar's Attack Damage {{ f1 }} in bonus damage, and the Attack Speed bonus is doubled.

spells.name: Battle Roar
spells.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies dan gaining bonus Armor dan Magic Resist for a short duration.
Ferocity Bonus: Rengar heals for a large amount.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area. Grants {{ e3 }} Armor and Magic resist for 3 seconds if an enemy is hit.

Ferocity bonus: Rengar restores {{ f1 }} Health.

spells.name: Bola Strike
spells.description:
Rengar throws a bola at his target, slowing them for a short duration.
Ferocity Bonus: Roots the target for 1 detik.
spells.tooltip:
Throws a bola dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing an enemy by {{ e3 }}%, Enemy Movement Speed recovers over 2.5 seconds.

Ferocity bonus: Roots the target for {{ e5 }} second.

spells.name: Thrill of the Hunt
spells.description: Rengar activates his predatory instincts, stealthing dan revealing all Champion musuh in a large radius around him. He gains Movement Speed dan rapidly generates Ferocity while stealthed.
spells.tooltip:
Activates predatory instincts stealthing Rengar after 1 second (delayed up to 3 seconds if taking damage), and revealing enemy Champions within {{ e3 }} range.

Rengar gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and 5 Ferocity over 3.75 seconds. Lasts {{ f1 }} seconds or until Rengar uses an ability that removes his stealth.

passive.name: Unseen Predator
passive.description:
Ketika dalam brush atau stealth, Rengar akan melompat ke target saat menggunakan basic attack-nya.

Rengar membangun 1 Ferocity point dengan steiap ability yang digunakan pada musuh. Ketika mencapai 5 Ferocity point, ability Rengar berikutnya di-empower, memberikan bonus efek.

Riven.name: Riven
Riven.title: the Exile
allytips: Broken Wings si Riven mengunci pada Champion di mana kursor Anda berada sewaktu cast. Jika Anda hendak bergerak melewati lawan Anda, pastikan kursor Anda melewati lawan juga.

Riven kekurangan sumber heal atau defense yang kuat dan harus diimbangi dengan ledakan combo. Maju ke pertempuran dengan Broken Wings dan Ki Burst, sementara gunakan Valor untuk melarikan diri dan menyerap harassment balik.

spells.name: Broken Wings
spells.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip:
Riven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be reactivated {{ e4 }} additional times.

1st Use: Slashes forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.
2nd Use: Slashes forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.
3rd Use: Leaps into the air and slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocking nearby enemies away from the point of impact.

Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.

spells.name: Ki Burst
spells.description: Riven emits a Ki burst, damaging dan stunning musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Valor
spells.description: Riven steps forward a short distance dan blocks incoming damage.
spells.tooltip: Riven does a quick dash in the direction of your cursor and becomes shielded, blocking up to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) incoming damage for 2.5 seconds.

spells.name: Blade of the Exile
spells.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy dan gains attack damage dan range. Additionally, during this time, she gains the ability to use Wind Slash once, a powerful ranged attack.
spells.tooltip:
Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for {{ e4 }} seconds, granting her {{ e5 }}% extra Attack Damage (+{{ f3 }}), increased range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once.

Wind Slash: Riven fires a shockwave that deals from {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much health they are missing.

passive.name: Runic Blade
passive.description: Ability Riven men-charge pedangnya, menyebabkan basic attack-nya memberikan bonus physical damage. Pedang Riven dapat di-charge hingga 3 kali dan mengeluarkan 1 charge setiap serangan.

Rumble.name: Rumble
Rumble.title: the Mechanized Menace
allytips: Coba dan pacu diri sendiri berada dalam Danger Zone untuk memaksimalkan efektivitas Anda. Sangat mudah untuk Overheat jika Anda menggunakan ability Anda dengan cepat.
Coba dan jaga target dalam jangkauan Flamespitter Anda. Hal tersebut dapat memberikan damage yang besar seiring waktu.
Jika Anda memenangkan pertempuran, Anda dapat menggunakan ultimate Anda untuk membuat jalur pelarian diri.

spells.name: Flamespitter
spells.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, memberikan magic damage in a cone for 3 detik. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds. This spell deals half damage to minions.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals 50% bonus damage.

spells.name: Scrap Shield
spells.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage dan granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength dan speed bonus is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for 2 seconds that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Rumble also gains an additional {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for 1 second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 25% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.

spells.name: Electro Harpoon
spells.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage dan slowing their Movement Speed. A detik shot can be fired within 3 detik. While in Danger Zone the damage dan slow percentage is increased.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for 3 seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 25%.

After using this ability you may cast it a second time at no cost within 3 seconds.

spells.name: The Equalizer
spells.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages dan slows enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for 5 seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

passive.name: Junkyard Titan
passive.description: Setiap spell yang Rumble cast memberikannya Heat. Ketika mencapai 50% Heat, dia mencapai Danger Zone, memberikan semua basic ability-nya bonus efek. Ketika mencapai 100% Heat, dia mulai Overheating, memberikan basic attack-nya  bonus damage, tetapi membuatnya tidak dapat meng-cast spell selama beberapa detik.

Ryze.name: Ryze
Ryze.title: the Rogue Mage
allytips: Ryze dapat menggunakan diri sendiri sebagai saluran untuk ability Spell Flux-nya jika tidak ada tambahan musuh untuk memantulkan ability tersebut.
Menggunakan ultimate Ryze untuk farm creep dapat menjadikan keuntungan gold yang besar.

spells.name: Overload
spells.description: Ryze throws a charge of pure energy at an enemy for heavy damage dan additional damage based upon Ryze's maksimum mana.  Ryze also gains passive cooldown reduction.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e2 }}% cooldown reduction.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of Ryze's maximum Mana (+{{ f1 }}) in magic damage.

spells.name: Rune Prison
spells.description: Ryze traps target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them dan preventing them from moving.  Also gains bonus damage berdasarkan Ryze's maksimum mana.
spells.tooltip: Roots an enemy for {{ e1 }} second(s), dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of Ryze's maximum Mana (+{{ f1 }}) in magic damage.

spells.name: Spell Flux
spells.description: Ryze melepaskan an orb of pure magical power that deals damage dan bounces from the initial target hingga 6 times.  Also gains bonus damage berdasarkan Ryze's maksimum mana.  Targets hit have their magic resistance reduced.
spells.tooltip: Unleashes an orb that bounces to enemies or Ryze up to 5 times. Each bounce deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of Ryze's maximum Mana (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and reduces Magic Resist by {{ e2 }} for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Desperate Power
spells.description: Ryze men-channel arcane power yang besar, he mendapatkan spell vamp dan semua spell-nya memberikan area of effect damage.
spells.tooltip: Channels immense arcane power gaining {{ e2 }}% Spell Vamp, and {{ e4 }} Movement Speed. Spells deal 50% area of effect damage for {{ e3 }} seconds.

passive.name: Arcane Mastery
passive.description: Ketika Ryze meng-cast spell, semua spell akan berkurang cooldown sebesar 1 detik.

Sejuani.name: Sejuani
Sejuani.title: the Winter's Wrath
allytips: Arctic Assault memberikan banyak fungsi kepada Sejuani di luar damage keluarannya. Gunakan untuk melarikan diri dari situasi yang buruk, channel spell yang terganggu, atau mengejar lawan.
Permafrost memiliki range yang panjang. Menyimpannya hingga musuh mencoba melarikan diri dengan ability movement dapat memungkinkan Anda untuk menangkap mereka kembali ketika mereka di-slow.
Simpan Glacial Prison untuk pertempuran di mana Anda memiliki sekutu hadir untuk menerima keuntungannya.

spells.name: Arctic Assault
spells.description: Charges forward, memberikan magic damage dan knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after knocking an Champion musuh into the air.
spells.tooltip: Charges forward, knocking enemies into the air and dealing magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health (max {{ e4 }} damage to monsters). The charge stops after knocking an enemy champion into the air.

spells.name: Flail of the Northern Winds
spells.description: Sejuani's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage to the target dan enemies near it. She then spins her flail, memberikan magic damage to musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip:
Sejuani's next basic attack deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage to the target and enemies near it. She then swings her flail, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e6 }}% bonus HP]) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies over 4 seconds.

If this ability is reactivated, Sejuani immediately starts swinging her flail.

spells.name: Permafrost
spells.description: Abilities dan basic attack apply Frost to enemies. Activating Permafrost damages dan slows all musuh di dekat with Frost.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Abilities and basic attacks apply Frost to enemies for 4 seconds.

Active: All nearby enemies with Frost take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Glacial Prison
spells.description: Sejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola in a line. If the bola hits an enemy champion, it shatters, stunning the target and nearby enemies for {{ e2 }} seconds. If the bola reaches its maximum range, it shatters and slows enemies by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds instead.

All enemies in the shatter area take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

passive.name: Frost
passive.description: Melukai musuh dengan ability atau basic attack memberikan Sejuani bonus Armor dan pengurangan efek movement-slowing padanya.

Shaco.name: Shaco
Shaco.title: the Demon Jester
allytips: Gunakan Deceive di atas terrain dapat membantu Anda membuat pelarian yang bersih.
Coba mendapatkan item dengan efek on-hit. Hal ini juga akan menguntungkan kloning Hallucination Anda.
Damage Deceive dapat ditingkatkan dengen peningkatan efek Critical Damage seperti Infinity Edge.

spells.name: Deceive
spells.description: Shaco menjadi invisible dan teleport ke lokasi target. Seranga berikutnya dijamin memberikan critical strike.
spells.tooltip:
Shaco teleports nearby and becomes invisible for 3.5 seconds.

His next basic attack within the next 6 seconds will critically strike, dealing {{ e1 }}% damage (normal critical strikes deal {{ e2 }}% damage).

spells.name: Jack In The Box
spells.description: Shaco creates an animated Jack-in-the-Box at target location, which will wait, invisible, to Fear nearby units dan attack them when some come nearby.
spells.tooltip:
Shaco creates a Jack in the Box at the target location. It will become invisible after 2 seconds, and pop out when an enemy comes near, fearing nearby enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and attacking them.

Its attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and it lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds while invisible or 5 seconds while firing.

spells.name: Two-Shiv Poison
spells.description: Shaco's Shivs secara pasif poison targets on hit, slowing them dan applying a miss chance to minion. He can throw his Shivs to memberikan damage dan poison the target.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: While Two-Shiv Poison is ready to cast, Shaco's basic attacks reduce the target's Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Also reduces minions' chance to hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to target enemy and reduces their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Hallucinate
spells.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack musuh di dekat. (Deals half damage to turrets.)  Upon death, it explodes, memberikan damage to musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip:
Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone that lasts up to 18 seconds. The clone deals 75% of Shaco's damage and receives {{ e2 }}% increased damage.

On death, the clone detonates, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

passive.name: Backstab
passive.description: Shaco memberikan 20% bonus damage ketika menyerang unit dari belakang.

Shen.name: Shen
Shen.title: Eye of Twilight
allytips: Shadow Dash memulihkan lebih besar energy jika mengenai beberapa Champion musuh, jadi janga selalu menggunakannya pada target tunggal.
Coba untuk mengawasi health sekutu Anda, sekalipun dalam lane terpencil, karena Stand United dapat digunakan di mana pun pada peta. Anda dapat menggunakan F2-F5 untuk menargetkan mereka dengan cepat.

spells.name: Vorpal Blade
spells.description: Damages target unit dan life taps him, healing allies that attack the target.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to target unit and marks them for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Allied spells and attacks against this target heal them for {{ f1 }} ({{ e2 }} + {{ f2 }} [{{ e3 }}% of Shen's max Health]) over {{ e5 }} seconds.

Killing an enemy with Vorpal Blade restores {{ f3 }} Health instantly instead.

spells.name: Feint
spells.description: Shen shields himself, absorbing incoming damage for a few detik.
spells.tooltip:
Shen shields himself, absorbing the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Lasts up to {{ e4 }} seconds.

While Feint holds, his attacks reduce Ki Strike's cooldown by an additional {{ e5 }} second.

spells.name: Shadow Dash
spells.description: Shen dashes rapidly toward a target location, taunting Champion musuh he encounters dan memberikan minor damage.
spells.tooltip:
Shen dashes in a direction, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to champions and taunting champions he collides with for {{ e1 }} second(s).

Taunted enemies are forced to attack Shen and deal {{ e3 }}% reduced damage.

Restores {{ e2 }} Energy per champion affected.

spells.name: Stand United
spells.description: Shen shields target allied Champion from incoming damage, dan soon after teleports to their location.
spells.tooltip: Places a shield on target allied champion, absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 5 seconds. After channeling for {{ e3 }} seconds, Shen teleports to the target's location.

passive.name: Ki Strike
passive.description: Setiap 8 detik, serangan Shen berikutnya memberikan bonus damage.

Shyvana.name: Shyvana
Shyvana.title: the Half-Dragon
allytips: Ability Shyvana semua keuntungannya dari menyerang unit-unit. Akibatnya, item Attack Speed lebih berharge padanya daripada kebanyakan Champion.
Flame Breath bagus untuk level up melawan musuh lane yang sulit.
Burnout adalah pilihan yang tepat untuk jungling. Monsters akan dikenai oleh durasi penuh, dan penguat speed meningkatkan potensi ganking-nya.
Dapat menjadi berharga untuk membeli satu dari item-item yang dapat men-slow musuh: Phage, Frozen Mallet, Trinity Force, atau Entropy.

spells.name: Twin Bite
spells.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
spells.tooltip:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack, dealing (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage on the second attack. The bonus damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Shyvana's Attack Damage.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

spells.name: Burnout
spells.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, memberikan magic damage per detik to musuh di dekat dan moving faster for 3 detik. The movement speed reduces over the duration of the spell.

Dragon Form: Burnout scorches the ground beneath it, enemies on the scorched earth continue to take damage.
spells.tooltip:
Shyvana deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moves {{ e2 }}% faster for 3 seconds. Shyvana's Movement Speed bonus is reduced over time.

Dragon Form: Burnout scorches the earth, continuing to damage enemies that stand on it.

spells.name: Flame Breath
spells.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to the first enemy it encounters dan leaves cinders on the target that reduces their Armor for 4 detik.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath engulfs all units in a cone in front of her.
spells.tooltip:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and burns {{ e3 }}% of their Armor for 4 seconds.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath engulfs all units in a cone in front of her.

spells.name: Dragon's Descent
spells.description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon dan takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage dan are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana secara pasif gains Armor dan Magic Resistance. Defensive bonuses are doubled in Dragon Form.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Passive: Shyvana reinforces her scales, increasing her Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e2 }}. Defensive bonuses are doubled in Dragon Form.

passive.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
passive.description:
Melee attack Shyvana meningkatkan ability-nya.

Twin Bite - Mengurangi 0.5 detik cooldown.
Burnout - Memperpanjang durasi sebesar 1 detik hingga maksimum 6 detik.
Flame Breath - Memberikan 15% dari damage ability kepada target yang di-debuff.
Dragon's Descent - Serangan menghasilkan 2 Fury dan Shyvana secara pasif mendapat Fury seiring waktu ketika dalam human form.

Singed.name: Singed
Singed.title: the Mad Chemist
allytips: Poison Trail sangat efektif pada farming dan harassing, memungkinkan Singed mendominasi aliran dari lane mana pun dia berada.
Gunakan Insanity Potion untuk menipu lawan Anda untuk mengejar Anda melalui Poison Trail Anda.
Fling musuh ke dalam tower Anda dapat memberikan sejumlah besar damage kepada mereka.

spells.name: Poison Trail
spells.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, memberikan damage to enemies caught in the path.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second.

spells.name: Mega Adhesive
spells.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing enemies who walk on it.
spells.tooltip: Leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds, slowing enemies in the area by {{ e1 }}% (lasts {{ e3 }} second after leaving).

spells.name: Fling
spells.description: Damages target enemy unit dan flings them into the air behind Singed.
spells.tooltip: Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Insanity Potion
spells.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
spells.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ e1 }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regeneration, and Mana Regeneration for {{ e2 }} seconds.

passive.name: Empowered Bulwark
passive.description: Menambahkan Health Singed sebesar 25 untuk setiap 100 Mana yang dimilikinya.

Sion.name: Sion
Sion.title: the Undead Champion
allytips: Penggunaan Enrage di awal membantu Sion di akhir game. Ketika Sion membunuh sesuatu, health-nya bertambah secara permanen, dan Enrage membuatnya mudah untuk me-last hit, menghasilkan farming gold yang lebih baik.
Cryptic Gaze dan Cannibalize dapat digunakan sebagai sikap defensif untuk menyelamatkan sekutu dan bertahan dari push.
Death's Caress dan Cryptic Gaze bergantung dengan baik dengan AP dan dapat dengan sangat ditingkatkan sebagai kekuatan ganking Anda.

spells.name: Cryptic Gaze
spells.description: Tatapan Sion menakuti seorang musuh tunggal, memberikan damage dan men-stun them.
spells.tooltip: Blasts a single enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning for 1.5 seconds.

spells.name: Death's Caress
spells.description: Sion mengelilingi dirinya dengan perisai penyerap damage. Jika perisai tidak dihancurkan dalam 10 detik, maka ia akan meledak, memberikan damage kepada musuh di sekeliling. Cast kembali setelah 4 detik untuk meledakkannya secara manual.
spells.tooltip:
Sion surrounds himself with a shield which absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. If the shield is not destroyed in 10 seconds, it will explode, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies.

Cast again after 4 seconds to manually detonate.

spells.name: Enrage
spells.description: While active Sion gains Attack Damage at the cost of Health on setiap basic attack. Additonally, he permanently meningkatkan his maksimum Health whenever he kill a unit.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Sion's Attack Damage is increased by {{ e1 }} and he permanently gains {{ e2 }} maximum Health per kill. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters

Total Health gained: +{{ f1 }}

spells.name: Cannibalism
spells.description: Sion mengkonsumsi beberapa life force musuhnya dalam setiap serangan, mengisap health kepada dirinya dan sekutu di dekatnya. Bau daging juga memperbaharui Fervor si Sion, meningkatkan Attack Speed-nya.
spells.tooltip: Grants Sion {{ e1 }}% Life Steal and {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed for 20 seconds. Additionally, Sion's basic attacks heal surrounding allies for {{ e2 }}% of the damage dealt.

passive.name: Feel No Pain
passive.description: Sion memiliki 40% chance untuk mengabaikan hingga 30/40/50 damage setiap kali dia diserang.

Sivir.name: Sivir
Sivir.title: the Battle Mistress
allytips: Boomerang Blade si Sivir kembali kepadanya setelah mencapai jarak maksimum, jadi Anda dapat berganti posisi untuk memukul musuh yang mana akan menghindarinya jika memungkinkan.
Penggunaan Frozen Mallet atau Phage bersama dengan On the Hunt memastikan Anda dan team Anda mampu memukul lawan tanpa henti.
Ricochet me-reset waktu basic attack Sivir saat aktivasi, jadi mengaktifkan langsung setelah memberikan normal basic attack akan memaksimalkan damage keluaran.

spells.name: Boomerang Blade
spells.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, memberikan damage setiap way.
spells.tooltip: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first unit and {{ e2 }}% reduced damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of {{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: Ricochet
spells.description: Sivir's next basic attack will bounce between targets, memberikan reduced damage with setiap successive hit.
spells.tooltip: Sivir's next basic attack will bounce to {{ e1 }} additional targets, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to the first target and {{ e3 }}% less damage with each bounce (only the first hit procs item effects).

spells.name: Spell Shield
spells.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana  back if a spell is blocked.
spells.tooltip:
Sivir creates a magical barrier for {{ e1 }} seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains {{ e2 }} Mana.

spells.name: On The Hunt
spells.description: Sivir leads her allies into battle granting them increased Movement dan Attack Speeds for a period of time.
spells.tooltip: Sivir's battle prowess emanates for {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing her Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}%. Nearby allies gain the Movement Speed bonus and half of the Attack Speed bonus for the duration.

passive.name: Fleet of Foot
passive.description: Sivir mendapatkan ledakan singkat atas Movement Speed ketika dia menyerang Champion musuh.

Skarner.name: Skarner
Skarner.title: the Crystal Vanguard
allytips: Basic attack Anda akan mengurangi cooldown ability Anda - gunakan basic attack di antara Crystal Slash untuk maksimum damage.
Pukul beberapa musuh dengan Fracture, dan kemudian diikuti dengan Crystal Slash untuk mendapatkan sejumlah health dengan cepat.
Impale sangat kuat ketika Anda menggunakannya untuk memposisikan musuh sehingga sekutu Anda dapat menyerang mereka.

spells.name: Crystal Slash
spells.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, memberikan physical damage to all musuh di dekat dan charging himself with Crystal Energy for several detik if a unit is struck.  If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage dan slows all targets hit.
spells.tooltip:
Skarner deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies and charges himself with Crystal Energy for {{ e2 }} seconds if a unit is struck.

While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and slows by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
spells.description: Skarner gains a shield, dan while the shield persists his movement speed dan attack speed are both increased.
spells.tooltip: Skarner is shielded for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% increased Movement Speed.

spells.name: Fracture
spells.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck dan marks them. Striking enemies will consume the mark to heal Skarner. Killing targets outright will also activate the heal.
spells.tooltip:
Skarner deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in a line and marks them for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Striking enemies will consume the mark to heal Skarner for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}). Killing targets outright will also activate the heal. (Each activation heals for {{ e3 }}% less.)

spells.name: Impale
spells.description: Skarner suppresses an Champion musuh dan deals magic damage to it.  During this time, Skarner can move freely dan will drag his helpless victim around with him.  When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt additional damage.
spells.tooltip: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion for {{ e1 }} seconds and deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

passive.name: Energize
passive.description: Basic attack menurunkan semua cooldown ability sebesar 0.5 detik. Efek ganda ketika menyerang Champion.

Sona.name: Sona
Sona.title: Maven of the Strings
allytips: Pergunakan bonus ability power Hymn of Valor untuk meng-empower spell berikutnya.
Simpan Crescendo untuk merubah keadaan game.
Secara konstan bergantian antara Song of Celerity dan Aria of Perseverance akan memberikan Anda ketahanan maksimum.

spells.name: Hymn of Valor
spells.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, granting nearby allied Champion bonus Damage dan Ability Power. Additionally, casting this ability sends out bolts of sound, memberikan magic damage to the nearest two Champion musuh atau monster.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Aura: Increases the Attack Damage and Ability Power of nearby allied Champions by {{ e1 }}.

Activation: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the nearest two enemies (prioritizes Champions).

Power Chord - Staccato: Deals double power chord damage.

spells.name: Aria of Perseverance
spells.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, granting nearby allied Champion bonus Armor dan Magic Resist. Additionally, casting this ability sends out healing melodies, healing Sona dan a nearby wounded ally.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Aura: Grants nearby allied Champions {{ e1 }} bonus Armor and Magic Resist.

Activation: Heals Sona and the most wounded nearby allied Champion for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and grants {{ e1 }} additional Armor and Magic Resist for 3 seconds.

Power Chord - Diminuendo: Reduces an enemy's total damage output by 20% for 3 seconds.

spells.name: Song of Celerity
spells.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allied Champion bonus Movement Speed. Additionally, casting this ability energizes nearby allies with a burst of speed.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Aura: Grants nearby allied Champions {{ e1 }} bonus Movement Speed.

Activation: Grants nearby allies {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds.

Power Chord - Tempo: Slows an enemy by 40% for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Crescendo
spells.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, forcing Champion musuh to dance dan memberikan magic damage to them.
spells.tooltip: Strikes an irresistible chord forcing enemy Champions to dance for 1.5 seconds and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

passive.name: Power Chord
passive.description: Setelah meng-cast 3 spell, serangan Sona berikutnya memberikan bonus magic damage sebagai tambahan atas bonus efek bergantung kepada lagu apa yang Sona sedang mainkan.

Soraka.name: Soraka
Soraka.title: the Starchild
allytips: Soraka adalah sekutu yang kuat di pertempuran, menggunakan spell heal dan mana restoration-nya untuk menjaga team bergerak maju.
Anda dapat menggunakan Wish pada sekutu Anda dari seberang map untuk menyelamatkan mereka dari fatal damage.
Damage Starcall dapat bertambah ketika digunakan beruntun.

spells.name: Starcall
spells.description: A shower of stars falls from the sky, striking all musuh di dekat for magic damage dan reducing their Magic Resist for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Strikes all nearby enemies dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, and reduces their Magic Resist by {{ e2 }} for {{ e3 }} seconds (stacks up to {{ e4 }} times).

spells.name: Astral Blessing
spells.description: Soraka mem-bless unit sekutu, memulihkan health dan meningkatkan Armor untuk waktu yang singkat.
spells.tooltip: Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, and temporarily grants {{ e2 }} bonus Armor to an ally for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Infuse
spells.description: Memulihkan Mana to an ally, atau deals damage to an enemy dan silences them for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Restores {{ e5 }} Mana to an ally Champion (cannot be cast on self).

On Enemy Cast: Deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to an enemy and temporarily silences them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Wish
spells.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself dan all friendly Champion.
spells.tooltip: Calls upon divine powers to instantly restore {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to all allied Champions.

passive.name: Consecration
passive.description: Menambah Magic Resist sekutu di sekeliling sebesar 16.

Swain.name: Swain
Swain.title: the Master Tactician
allytips: Jika Anda memiliki masalah me-root musuh dengan Nevermove, coba gunakan Decrepify untuk men-slow mereka terlebih dulu.

Ketika laning, coba mengukur kekuatan lawan Anda untuk menentukan keseimbangan serangan Anda dengan Ravenous Flock. Jika mereka lebih kuat, mungkin lebih menguntungkan untuk berada di belakang dan meng-cast Nevermove atau Torment.

spells.name: Decrepify
spells.description: Swain sets his raven to cripple an enemy. Over the next three detik, the target takes damage seiring waktu dan is slowed.
spells.tooltip: Swain sets his raven to cripple an enemy. Over the next 3 seconds, the target takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second and is slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Nevermove
spells.description: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, mighty talons grab hold of enemy units, memberikan damage dan rooting them.
spells.tooltip: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Torment
spells.description: Swain afflicts his target, memberikan damage to them seiring waktu dan causing them to take increased damage from Swain's attack.
spells.tooltip: Swain afflicts his target for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds. During this affliction, the target takes {{ e2 }}% increased damage from Swain's attacks.

spells.name: Ravenous Flock
spells.description: Swain inspires dread in his enemies by temporarily taking the form of a raven. During this time ravens strike out at hingga 3 musuh di dekat. setiap raven deals damage dan heals Swain for half of the damage dealt.
spells.tooltip:
Toggle: Swain transforms into the form of a raven. During this time, up to 3 lesser ravens strike out at nearby enemies each second, prioritizing champions. Each raven deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and heals Swain for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt against champions, and {{ e5 }}% against minions.

The cost to sustain Ravenous Flock increases by {{ e4 }} mana each second.
spells.resource: {{ e2 }} Initial Mana Cost Per Second

passive.name: Carrion Renewal
passive.description: Swain meregenerasi mana setiap kali dia membunuh unit. Jumlah ini meningkat setiap level.

Syndra.name: Syndra
Syndra.title: the Dark Sovereign
allytips: Untuk memaksimalkan damage ultimate Anda, gunakan ketika masih banyak sphere di medan perang.
Setelah Anda mengenai Champion musuh dengan Force of Will diikuti dengan Dark Sphere, mereka akan di-slow dan kesulitan untuk menghindarinya.
Siapkan salah satu spell Anda untuk mencapai ranking 5 secepat mungkin, mereka mendapat bonus efek yang kuat pada ranking maksimum.

spells.name: Dark Sphere
spells.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere memberikan magic damage. The sphere remains dan can be manipulated by her other powers.
spells.tooltip: Conjures a Dark Sphere dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The sphere remains for {{ e2 }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other abilities.

spells.name: Force of Will
spells.description: Syndra picks up dan throws a Dark Sphere atau enemy minion memberikan magic damage dan slowing the movement speed of enemies.
spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Grabs target Dark Sphere or enemy minion. If no target is selected, grabs nearest Dark Sphere.

Second Cast: Throws the Dark Sphere or enemy minion. Enemies hit take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ f2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Scatter the Weak
spells.description: Syndra knocks enemies dan Dark Spheres back memberikan magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
spells.tooltip:
Knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to them and any enemies they collide with.

Dark Spheres that are knocked back stun all enemies in their path for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Unleashed Power
spells.description: Syndra bombards an Champion musuh with all of her Dark Spheres.
spells.tooltip: Draws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing all Dark Spheres to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per sphere (Minimum damage {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }})) to an enemy Champion.

passive.name: Transcendent
passive.description:
Spell memberikan efek tambahan pada maks ranking.

Dark Sphere: Memberkan 15% bonus damage kepada Champion.
Force of Will: Menambah durasi slow sebesar 33%.
Scatter the Weak: Jangkauan spell bertambah 50%.
Unleashed Power: Range bertambah 75.

Talon.name: Talon
Talon.title: the Blade's Shadow
allytips: *Noxian Diplomacy pada dasarnya bekerja baik dengan Cutthroat. Coba mengaktifkan Noxian Diplomacy sebelum melompat ke lawan Anda dengan Cutthroat.
*Shadow Assault adalah alat melarikan diri yang kuat, tetapi dapat juga menjadi offensive untuk menyerang sebuah grup.

*Ingat untuk memilih target Anda sebelum bertarung. Fokuskan semua ability Talon pada satu target dapat menjadi sangat bermanfaat, tetapi membaginya menjadi beberapa target mungkin dapat membuat Anda tidak berdaya

spells.name: Noxian Diplomacy
spells.description: Talon's next basic attack deals bonus physical damage. If the target is a Champion, they will bleed, taking additional physical damage over a period of time dan revealing their location for the duration.
spells.tooltip: Talon's next basic attack deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. If the target is a champion, the target will bleed for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over {{ e5 }} seconds, revealing their location for the duration.

spells.name: Rake
spells.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, memberikan physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. Additionally the enemy is slowed for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. Additionally the enemy is slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Cutthroat
spells.description: Talon instantly appears behind his target, silencing them dan amplifying his damage against that target.
spells.tooltip: Talon instantly appears behind his target, silencing them for {{ e1 }} second and amplifying Talon's damage against the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Shadow Assault
spells.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades dan becomes invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Every time a blade passes through an enemy, they receive physical damage.
spells.tooltip: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes invisible for up to {{ e5 }} seconds, gaining {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Every time a blade passes through an enemy, they receive {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

passive.name: Mercy
passive.description: Talon memberikan 10% lebih banyak damage dengan basic attack-nya kepada setiap target yang di-slow, di-stun, di-immobilize, atau di-suppress.

Taric.name: Taric
Taric.title: the Gem Knight

skins.name: Armor of the Fifth Age Taric

allytips: Jika Taric meng-cast dirinya dengan Imbue, dia akan meng-heal lebih besar. Akibatnya, dia sangat efektif untuk menghadapi turret.
Kadang akan lebih baik tidak menggunakan Shatter dan menjaga bonus Armor diri sendiri.

spells.name: Imbue
spells.description: Taric brings forth earthen energy to heal an ally dan himself. This heal is more potent when Taric heals only himself. Additionally,Taric's basic attack reduce Imbue's cooldown.
spells.tooltip:
Taric brings forth earthen energy to heal a target ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}). If he targets himself, the heal increases by {{ e4 }}% restoring {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health.

Taric's basic attacks reduce Imbue's cooldown by {{ e5 }} seconds ({{ e3 }} seconds if attacking an enemy champion).

spells.name: Shatter
spells.description: Taric is protected by a hardening aura, increasing the Armor of himself dan nearby allied Champion. He may choose to splinter the enchanted rocks surrounding him to memberikan damage dan decrease the Armor of musuh di dekat at the cost of some Armor for a short time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Taric's gemstones increase his Armor by {{ e3 }}. Additionally, nearby allied champions gain {{ f1 }} Armor ({{ e4 }}% of Taric's Armor).

Active: Taric shatters his armor, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} for {{ e5 }} seconds. Taric loses {{ e3 }} Armor while Shatter is on cooldown.

spells.name: Dazzle
spells.description: Taric memancarkan cahaya bola prisma yang mengagumkan dari perisai berpermatanya, men-stun tergetnya dan melukai mereka berdasarkan seberapa dekat dia kepada mereka.
spells.tooltip: Taric fires a prismatic sphere at a target enemy, stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds and dealing between {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Dazzle's damage increases the closer Taric is to the target.

spells.name: Radiance
spells.description: Taric slams his hammer into the ground to memberikan damage to musuh di dekat. For a time after, Taric's gems radiate energy empowering Taric dan his allies with bonus Attack Damage dan Ability Power.
spells.tooltip:
Taric slams his hammer into the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

For the next {{ e2 }} seconds, Taric's gems radiate energy, granting him {{ e3 }} Attack Damage and Ability Power and his nearby allies half of the bonuses.

passive.name: Gemcraft
passive.description: Taric suka untuk memasukkan magical gems ke semua senjatanya, menyebabkan basic attack-nya memberikan bonus magic damage berdasarkan maksimum Mana-nya.

Teemo.name: Teemo
Teemo.title: the Swift Scout
allytips: Jamuar Teemo da[at digunakan untuk farm gelombang creep dengan efektif.
Tempatkan jamur Anda pada lokasi kunci pada map, seperti di Dragon atau Baron Nashor, me-reveal ketika musuh Anda mungkin mencoba membunuh mereka.

spells.name: Blinding Dart
spells.description: Mengaburkan vision musuh dengan racun yang kuat, memberikan damage kepada target unit dan mem-blind-nya selama durasi.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and blinds the target for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Move Quick
spells.description: Teemo scampers around, secara pasif increasing his movement speed until he is struck by an Champion musuh atau turret.  Teemo can sprint to gain bonus movement speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for 3 seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.

spells.name: Toxic Shot
spells.description: setiap of Teemo's attack will poison the target, memberikan damage on impact dan setiap detik after for 4 detik.
spells.tooltip: Teemo's basic attacks poison their target, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magical damage upon impact and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magical damage each second for 4 seconds.

spells.name: Noxious Trap
spells.description: Teemo menempatkan jebakan beracun yang dapat meledak menggunakan salah satu mushroom yang disimpan di dalam ranselnya. Jika seorang musuh menginjak pada jebakan, ia akan melepaskan awan beracun, men-slow musuh dan melukai mereka seiring waktu.
spells.tooltip:
Uses a stored mushroom to place a trap that detonates if an enemy steps on it, spreading poison to nearby enemies that slows movement speed by {{ e2 }}% and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds. Traps last 10 minutes.

Teemo forages for a mushroom every {{ f1 }} seconds, but he is only big enough to carry 3 at once.

passive.name: Camouflage
passive.description: Jika Teemo bertahan dan tidak menerima aksi dalam durasi singkat, dia menjadi stealth dengan tidak terbatas. Setelah keluar dari stealth, Teemo mendapat Element of Surprise, menambah attack speed sebesar 40% selama 3 detik.

Thresh.name: Thresh
Thresh.title: the Chain Warden
allytips: Komunikasi adalah kunci ketika menggunakan lentera Thresh. Biarkan team Anda mengetahui bagaimana Anda ingin menggunakannya.
Death Sentence dan Flay dapat dikombinasikan menjadi kombinasi yang kuat.
Thresh dapat mengumpulkan soul tanpa dia harus membunuh unit tersebut. Rencanakan posisi peta untuk dekat ke kematian terbanyak akan memaksimalkan pengumpulan soul.

spells.name: Death Sentence
spells.description: Thresh's attack wind up, memberikan more damage the longer he waits between attack. When activated, Thresh binds an enemy in chains dan pulls them toward him.  Activating this ability a detik time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
spells.tooltip:
Grab an enemy, then pull them to you or leap to them.
Throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first unit hit and pulling them toward him for 1.5 seconds.

Reactivate this ability to pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

spells.name: Dark Passage
spells.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champion from damage.  Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
spells.tooltip:
Create a shielding lantern that an ally can use to dash to you.
Throw the Lantern to a point. If an ally near the Lantern clicks it, they pick it up and Thresh pulls both back to him.

Additionally, allies who come near it gain a shield lasting 4 seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Allies can only receive the shield once per cast.

spells.name: Flay
spells.description: Sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Deal {{ f1 }}-{{ f2 }} magic damage on each hit that builds up when not attacking.
This value is equal to total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% of Attack Damage, based on the amount of time since his last attack.

Active: Knock nearby enemies in the direction of your choice.
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a line beginning behind him. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.

spells.name: The Box
spells.description: A prison of walls that slow dan memberikan damage if broken.
spells.tooltip:
Trap enemies inside walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
Creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy Champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 2 seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, remaining walls deal half damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.

passive.name: Damnation
passive.description: Thresh dapat memanen soul musuh yang mati di dekatnya, secara permanen memberikan armor dan ability power.

Tristana.name: Tristana
Tristana.title: the Megling Gunner
allytips: Senapan besarnya memungkinkan Tristana untuk menembak ke Target pada jarak yang jauh. Manfaatkan ini untuk mencegah musuh menyentuh Anda.

Gunakan Rocket Jump untuk melompat melewati musuh, kemudian gunakan Buster Shot untuk mengirimkan mereka kembali ke sekutu Anda, tetapi hati-hati untuk menggunakan strategi ini di pertempuran yang besar.
Penggunaan ability aktif pada Explosive Shot dapat berguna di awal game untuk mencegah team lain meng-heal atau menggunakan health potion.

spells.name: Rapid Fire
spells.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her attack speed for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Increases Tristana's attack speed by {{ e1 }}% for 7 seconds.

spells.name: Rocket Jump
spells.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel herself to a distant location, memberikan damage dan slowing surrounding units for 3 detik where she lands.
spells.tooltip:
Tristana fires at the ground to propel herself to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing surrounding units by 60% for 2.5 seconds when she lands.
On a champion kill or assist, Rocket Jump's cooldown resets.

spells.name: Explosive Shot
spells.description: Ketika Tristana membunuh unit, cannonball-nya meledak menjadi pecahan kecil, memberikan damage kepada musuh di sekeliling. Dapat diaktifkan untuk memberikan damage kepada unit target seiring waktu, dan mengurangi heal yang diterima.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Enemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

Active: Rends target enemy, reducing healing and health regeneration by 50% and dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 5 seconds.

spells.name: Buster Shot
spells.description: Tristana memuat bola meriam yang besar ke dalam senjatanya dan menembakkannya pada sebuah unit musuh. Bola meriam memberikan magic damage dan mendorong target ke belakang.
spells.tooltip: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at an enemy unit. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocks surrounding units back {{ e2 }} distance.

passive.name: Draw a Bead
passive.description: Meningkatkan attack range Tristana seiring dia level-up.

Trundle.name: Trundle
Trundle.title: the Troll King
allytips: Trundle unggul dalam pertarungan dalam Frozen Domain-nya. Cobalah menarik musuh ke dalamnya.
Gunakan Subjugate untuk melunakkan tanker musuh yang kuat atau untuk membuat target kepada team Anda sebagai fokus penyerangan.
Chomp bagus untuk menurunkan physical damage musuh; coba menfokuskan pada physical damage dealer musuh.

spells.name: Chomp
spells.description: Trundle bites his opponent, memberikan damage, briefly slowing dan sapping some of their attack damage.
spells.tooltip:
Trundle lunges at his opponent with his next basic attack, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and briefly slowing his target.

This attack increases Trundle's Attack Damage by {{ e2 }} for 8 seconds, with his opponent losing half of this amount.

spells.name: Frozen Domain
spells.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining attack speed, movement speed, dan increased healing from all sources while on it.
spells.tooltip: Trundle coats target location with ice for {{ e4 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed, {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% increased healing and regeneration from all sources.

spells.name: Pillar of Ice
spells.description: Trundle creates a ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain dan slowing all unit musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip: Trundle creates an icy pillar at target location for {{ e1 }} seconds, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Subjugate
spells.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's health, armor dan magic resistance. Over the next 3 detik the amount of health, armor, dan magic resistance stolen is doubled.
spells.tooltip: Trundle drains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of an enemy champion's maximum Health as magic damage and {{ e2 }}% of their Armor and Magic Resist, half immediately and half over {{ e3 }} seconds. The Armor and Magic Resist is returned {{ e3 }} seconds after the drain ends.

passive.name: King's Tribute
passive.description: Ketika seorang musuh mati dekat Trundle, dia meng-heal sebesar sebuah persentase dari maksimum health-nya.

Tryndamere.name: Tryndamere
Tryndamere.title: the Barbarian King
allytips: Menunda aktivasi Undying Rage sangat efektif untuk membuat Champion musuh over-commit untuk mencoba membunuh Anda.
Bloodlust adalah cara terbaik untuk meng-heal Tryndamere. Coba untuk tidak membiarkannya menghilang sebelum Anda mengaktifkannya.
Jika musuh men-stack Armor, coba membangun item seperti Last Whisper atau Youmuu's Ghostblade.

spells.name: Bloodlust
spells.description: Tryndamere berkembang dalam sensasi pertempuran, meningkatkan Attack Damage-nya selama dia terluka dan terluka. Dia dapat meng-cast Bloodlust untuk mengkonsumsi Fury-nya dan meng-heal dirinya.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Tryndamere thirsts for blood, gaining {{ e1 }} Attack Damage plus {{ e2 }} per 1% Health missing.

Active: Tryndamere consumes his Fury, restoring {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Health per Fury consumed.

spells.name: Mocking Shout
spells.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding Champion' Attack Damage.  Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.
spells.tooltip: Decreases surrounding champions' Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e4 }} seconds, and enemies with their backs turned also have their Movement Speed reduced by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Spinning Slash
spells.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, memberikan damage to enemies in his path.
spells.tooltip:
Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path.

Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds whenever Tryndamere critically strikes.

spells.name: Undying Rage
spells.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
spells.tooltip: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for {{ e3 }} seconds, refusing to be reduced below {{ e2 }} Health and instantly gaining {{ e1 }} Fury.

passive.name: Battle Fury
passive.description: Tryndamere mendapat Fury untuk setiap serangan, critical strike, dan killing blow yang dia lakukan. Fury secara pasif meningkatkan critical strike chance dan dapat dikonsumsi dengan spell Bloodlust-nya.

TwistedFate.name: Twisted Fate
TwistedFate.title: the Card Master
allytips: Koordinasikan dengan sekutu Anda atas waktu yang tepat untuk menggunakan Destiny untuk menyergap musuh.
Character stealth sering melarikan diri dari pertempuran dengan hit point yang sangat rendah. Manfaatkan ability Destiny untuk me-reveal unit stealth untuk menghabisi mereka.
Twisted Fate dapat dibentuk sebagai character Attack Damage atau Ability Power, membiarkan dia mencocokkan diri pada berbagai komposisi team.

spells.name: Wild Cards
spells.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, memberikan damage to setiap enemy unit they pass through.
spells.tooltip: Throws three cards that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

spells.name: Pick A Card
spells.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, dan uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
spells.tooltip:
Cast once to shuffle the deck and again to choose your card, enhancing your next attack.

Blue Card deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and restores {{ e6 }} Mana.

Red Card deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to units around the target and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%.

Gold Card deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stuns for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Stacked Deck
spells.description: Setiap 4 serangan, Twisted Fate memberikan bonus damage. Sebagai tambahan, attack speed-nya bertambah.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Every {{ e4 }} attacks, Twisted Fate deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

In addition, his attack speed is increased by {{ e3 }}%.

spells.name: Destiny
spells.description: Twisted Fate memprediksikan nasib lawannya, me-reveal semua Champion musuh dan mengaktifkan penggunaan Gate, yang men-teleport Twisted Fate ke lokasi target mana pun dalam 1.5 detik.
spells.tooltip:
Reveals all enemy champions (including stealthed champions) on the map for {{ e1 }} seconds.

While Destiny is active, Twisted Fate can teleport up to {{ e4 }} units away in 1.5 seconds.

passive.name: Loaded Dice
passive.description: Twisted Fate dan sekutunya menerima tambahan 2 gold per kill.

Twitch.name: Twitch
Twitch.title: the Plague Rat
allytips: Attack speed Twitch adalah salah satu yang tertinggi di game; coba membeli item dengan efek on-hit seperti Black Cleaver atau Wit's End.
Expunge memiliki range lebar; berikan banyak stack Deadly Venom sebesar mungkin sebelum menggunakannya.
Anda dapat mengejar musuh di luar jangkauan serangan dengan Venom Cask.

spells.name: Ambush
spells.description: Twitch becomes invisible for a short duration, while invisible Twitch gains movement speed. When leaving invisibility twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
After {{ e4 }} seconds of not taking damage or after {{ e5 }} seconds, Twitch turns invisible for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Twitch gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed while invisible and gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after coming out of invisibility.

spells.name: Venom Cask
spells.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets dan applying deadly venom to the target.
spells.tooltip: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area adding {{ e1 }} stacks of Deadly Venom and slowing targets by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Expunge
spells.description: All musuh di dekat secrete Twitch's toxic venoms from their bodies, memberikan damage for setiap stack.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e2 }} physical damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) per stack of Deadly Venom to all nearby enemies affected by Deadly Venom.

spells.name: Spray and Pray
spells.description: Twitch closes his eyes dan fires his crossbow, rapidly spraying powerful piercing bolts ahead of him.
spells.tooltip: For {{ e2 }} seconds Twitch gains {{ e5 }} Attack Range, {{ e1 }} Attack Damage and his basic attacks become piercing bolts that deal {{ e3 }}% less damage to subsequent targets down to a minimum of {{ e4 }}% damage.

passive.name: Deadly Venom
passive.description: Basic attack Twitch menginfeksi target, memberikan true damage setiap detik.

Udyr.name: Udyr
Udyr.title: the Spirit Walker
allytips: Damage diberikan pada turtle shield post-mitigation. Oleh karena itu, membeli item defensive dapat secara drastis meningkatkan ketahanan Anda.
Udyr adalah salah satu jungler terbaik di game. Manfaatkan hal ini dapat memberikan team Anda keuntungan XP team dan kendali map.

spells.name: Tiger Stance
spells.description: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks deal extra damage, and his first basic attack will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage, and Udyr will perform a Tiger Strike with his first basic attack, dealing bonus {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage over 2 seconds.

Activation: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Turtle Stance
spells.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr memulihkan an amount of his Health equivalent to a percentage of his damage dealt.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal.

Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 5 seconds.

spells.name: Bear Stance
spells.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr meningkatkan Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attack stun his target for 1 detik. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several detik.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for 6 seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and ignores unit collision for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Phoenix Stance
spells.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, memberikan damage to musuh di dekat for 5 detik. Persistent Effect - With the first basic attack dan every third attack after, Udyr engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
spells.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Burns enemies in front of Udyr on his first basic attack and every third attack after, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

passive.name: Monkey's Agility
passive.description: Memasuki sebuah stance memberikan Udyr 10% Attack Speed dan 5 Movement Speed untuk durasi singkat. Efek ini dapat di-stack hingga 3 kali.

Urgot.name: Urgot
Urgot.title: the Headsman's Pride
allytips: Sebelum menembakkan Acid Hunter, coba untuk meletakkan mouse di atas musuh yang dikenai Noxian Corrosive Charge. Saat peluncuran, Acid Hunter akan mengabaikan seluruh musuh lainnya dan terbang langsung ke target yang terluka.
Urgot adalah skirmisher yang hebat. Coba melukai musuh dengan Noxian Corrosive Charge diikuiti dengan beberapa missile-locked Acid Hunters.

spells.name: Acid Hunter
spells.description: Urgot fires an Acid Hunter missile that collides with the first enemy it hits, slowing the target if he has his Terror Capacitor up. Acid Hunter missile-locks on enemies affected by Noxian Corrosive Charge.
spells.tooltip:
Urgot fires a missile toward the cursor that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Missile-lock can be achieved by holding the cursor over a target afflicted by Noxian Corrosive Charge.

spells.name: Terror Capacitor
spells.description: Urgot charges up his capacitor to gain a shield. While the shield is active, Urgot gains slowing attack.
spells.tooltip: Urgot charges up his terror capacitor to gain a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 7 seconds. While the shield is active, Urgot's attacks and missiles slow targets by {{ e2 }}%.

spells.name: Noxian Corrosive Charge
spells.description: Urgot launches a corrosive charge that damages enemies in an area dan reduces their armor.
spells.tooltip:
Urgot launches a Corrosive Charge at a target location. Enemies afflicted by the charge have their armor reduced by {{ e2 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.
