Acid Hunter is able to missile-lock onto targets affected by Noxian Corrosive Charge.

spells.name: Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser
spells.description: Urgot charges up his Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser, swapping positions with the target.  His target is suppressed for the duration of the channel. He gains increased armor dan magic resistance after the swap.
spells.tooltip:
Urgot targets an enemy champion and channels his Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser for 1 second, swapping locations with his target afterward. His target is suppressed for the duration of the channel.

Urgot gains {{ e2 }} armor and magic resist during and after the channel, and his target is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after being swapped.

passive.name: Zaun-Touched Bolt Augmenter
passive.description: Basic attack dan Acid Hunter si Urgot mengurangi damage target sebesar 15% selama 2.5 detik.

Varus.name: Varus
Varus.title: the Arrow of Retribution
allytips: Pada awal game Blighted Quiver membantu meng-harass Champion musuh dan mendapatkan killing blow pada minion.
Selama pertarungan jarak pendek, kadang sangat baik untuk menembakkan Piercing Arrow  dengan cepat, daripada men-charge ke tenaga penuh.
Coba manfaatkan range panjang Piercing Arrow untuk men-snipe Champion musuh sebelum pertempuran atau saat mereka mencoba melarikan diri.

spells.name: Piercing Arrow
spells.description: Varus readies dan then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range dan damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
spells.tooltip:
First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage.

Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage, reduced by {{ e3 }}% per enemy hit (minimum 33%).

While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by 20%. After 4 seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds half its mana cost.

spells.name: Blighted Quiver
spells.description: Varus' basic attack memberikan bonus magic damage dan apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, memberikan magic damage berdasarkan the target's maksimum health.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and apply Blight for {{ e3 }} seconds (stacks {{ e4 }} times).

Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of the target's maximum Health per stack (Max: 360 total damage vs Monsters).

spells.name: Hail of Arrows
spells.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that memberikan physical damage dan desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed dan reduces their healing dan regeneration.
spells.tooltip:
Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and desecrates the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and reduces healing effects by {{ e4 }}%.

spells.name: Chain of Corruption
spells.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first Champion musuh hit dan then spreads towards nearby uninfected Champion, immobilizing them too on contact.
spells.tooltip:
Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for 2 seconds.

The corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions, applying the same damage and immobilize if it reaches them.

passive.name: Living Vengeance
passive.description: Saat kill atau assist, Varus secara sementara mendapat Attack Speed. Bonus ini bertambah besar jika musuh adalah seorang Champion.

Vayne.name: Vayne
Vayne.title: the Night Hunter
allytips: Tumble memiliki banyak kegunaan, tetapi tidak dapat digunakan untuk melewaiti dinding..
Condemn dapat digunakan untuk menemplekan target ke dinding untuk memastikan kill, atau melarikan diri dari kejaran.
Jangan pergi duluan ke pertempuran besar. Tunggu hingga team Anda membuka.

spells.name: Tumble
spells.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot.  Her next attack deals bonus damage.
spells.tooltip: Rolls a short distance. The next basic attack within {{ e3 }} seconds deals {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage, equal to {{ e2 }}% of total Attack Damage.

spells.name: Silver Bolts
spells.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things.  The third consecutive attack atau ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maksimum Health as bonus true damage. (maks: 200 damage vs. monster)
spells.tooltip: Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of the enemy's maximum Health as true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)

spells.name: Condemn
spells.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, dan fires a huge bolt at her target, memberikan damage dan knocking them back.  If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, memberikan bonus damage dan stunning them.
spells.tooltip: Fires a bolt that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocks the enemy back. Enemies that collide with terrain take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) additional physical damage and are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Final Hour
spells.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, invisibility during Tumble, dan triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
spells.tooltip: Gains {{ e1 }} Bonus Attack Damage for {{ e2 }} seconds. While active, Tumble grants invisibility for {{ e3 }} second, and Night Hunter's bonus Movement Speed is increased to {{ e4 }}.

passive.name: Night Hunter
passive.description: Vayne secara kejam memburu penjahat. Dia mendapat 30 Movement Speed ketika bergeak ke arah Champion musuh di dekatnya.

Veigar.name: Veigar
Veigar.title: the Tiny Master of Evil
allytips: Gunakan Event Horizon untuk memastikan kesuksesan pemberian Dark Matter.
Veigar sangat membutuhkan mana yang besar di awal. Coba membeli item mana regen untuk meningkatkan efektivitas dari passive Anda dan memungkinkan Anda meng-cast lebih banyal Baleful Strikes.
Veigar sangat rapuh. Sangat berharga untuk memilih sedikitnya satu Summoner spell yang dapat digunakan secara defensif.

spells.name: Baleful Strike
spells.description: Unleashes dark energy at target enemy, memberikan magic damage. If a unit is killed, Veigar gains some Ability Power permanently.
spells.tooltip:
Active: Unleashes dark energy at target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If the target is killed, Veigar gains 1 Ability Power. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

Passive: Veigar gains {{ e2 }} Ability Power when he kills a champion from any source of damage.

Ability Power bonus: +{{ f1 }}

spells.name: Dark Matter
spells.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, memberikan magic damage when it lands.
spells.tooltip: After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Event Horizon
spells.description: Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 detik, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter for a short duration.
spells.tooltip: Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Primordial Burst
spells.description: Blasts target Champion musuh, memberikan a large base amount of magic damage plus 80% dari his target's AP.
spells.tooltip: Blasts an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus 80% of his target's Ability Power in magic damage.

passive.name: Equilibrium
passive.description: Mana regen Veigar bertambah 1% untuk setiap 1% mana yang hilang.

Vi.name: Vi
Vi.title: the Piltover Enforcer
allytips: Vault Breaker yang di-charge penuh akan memberikan double damage. Sangat bagus untuk menangkap dan menghabisi musuh yang melarikan diri.
Excessive Force memberikan damage penuh kepada siapa pun yang terperangkap di shockwave. Gunakan pada minion di lane untuk mengenai musuh yang bersembunyi di belakang mereka.
Assault dan Battery adalah alat pembuka yang kuat, dan ingat jangan terlalu jauh di depan dari team Anda.
enemytips: Vault Breaker yang dicharge dengan full akan menghasilkan damage dua kali lipat. Jika Anda melihat Vi untuk mengeluarkannya, Anda harus mundur dan coba untuk menghinadarinya.
Vi akan mengurangi armor Anda dan mendapatkan attack speed jika dia berhasi menyerang Anda tiga kali berturut. Coba untuk melawannya dalam pertarungan yang panjang.
Vi menjadi immune pada crowd control ketika dia menggunakan ultimatenya. Ingat untuk menyimpan stun Anda untuk setelah dia selesai melakukan charging.

spells.name: Vault Breaker
spells.description: Vi charges her gauntlets dan unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward.  Enemies she hits are knocked back dan receive a stack of denting blows.
spells.tooltip:
Charges a powerful punch that carries Vi forward.

First Cast: Slows Movement Speed by 15% while increasing damage and dash range over 1.25 seconds.

Second Cast: Dashes forward dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Denting Blows to all enemies hit (deals 75% damage to minions and monsters). Stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking it back.

spells.name: Denting Blows
spells.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's armor, memberikan bonus damage dan granting her attack speed.
spells.tooltip: Every 3rd attack on the same target deals an additional {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum Health as physical damage, reduces its Armor by 20% and grants Vi {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for 4 seconds (max 300 damage vs. minions and monsters).

spells.name: Excessive Force
spells.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, memberikan damage to enemies behind it.
spells.tooltip:
Causes next basic attack to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and enemies behind it.

Vi charges a new punch every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold 2 charges at once.

spells.name: Assault and Battery
spells.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way.  When she rsetiapes her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, dan slams it back into the ground.
spells.tooltip:
Targets an enemy champion and chases it down, knocking it up for 1.25 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

While charging, Vi cannot be stopped or slowed and will knock aside enemies in the way, dealing 75% damage to them.

passive.name: Blast Shield
passive.description: Vi men-charge sebuah perisai seiring waktu. Perisai dapat diaktifkan dengan memukul seorang musuh dengan ability.

Viktor.name: Viktor
Viktor.title: the Machine Herald
allytips: Death Ray adalah poke dan alat area of denial yang kuat. Guanakan dalam kombinasi dengan Graviton Field untuk mengendalikan posisi musuh Anda.
Pastikan Anda memilih peningkatan yang tepat. Setiap peningkatan memberikan penambahan kekuatan tertentu kepada Victor dan hanya dapat dibeli sekali saja di game.

spells.name: Power Transfer
spells.description: Viktor blasts an enemy unit memberikan magic damage, returning a portion of the damage dealt as a shield.
spells.tooltip: Viktor blasts an enemy unit for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, returning {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) as a shield.

spells.name: Gravity Field
spells.description: Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows any target in its radius. If enemies stay too long within the radius of the device, they get stunned.
spells.tooltip: Viktor conjures a gravitational imprisonment device, slowing all enemies by {{ e4 }}% of their Movement Speed and stacks every {{ e1 }} seconds. At {{ e3 }} stacks the target will be stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Death Ray
spells.description: Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, memberikan damage to any opponents struck in its path.
spells.tooltip: Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to every enemy in its path.

spells.name: Chaos Storm
spells.description: Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage dan briefly silences enemies. The singularity then does magic damage to all musuh di dekat every detik. Viktor can redirect the singularity.
spells.tooltip:
Viktor conjures a singularity at the target location, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silencing enemies in the area for {{ e5 }} seconds.

As it churns, it deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second to nearby enemies for {{ e4 }} seconds. The storm moves faster the closer it is to Viktor.

Activating this ability again while the singularity is active will redirect it.

passive.name: Evolving Technology
passive.description: Viktor memulai dengan Hex Core yang memberikan stat dan dapat di-upgrade di Soter untuk meningkatkan kemampuannya. Hex Core hanya dapat di-upgrade sekali saja, dan tidak dapat dijual kembali ke Store.

Vladimir.name: Vladimir
Vladimir.title: the Crimson Reaper
allytips: Transfusion secara langsung memberikan damage kepada musuh sebelum meng-heal Vladimir, membuatnya salah satu alat last hitting terbaik di game.
Cast Hemoplague di mana dia akan mengenai banyak unit.
Sanguine Pool meledakkan peluru yang datang, jadi dapat digunakan untuk menghindari disable.

spells.name: Transfusion
spells.description: Vladimir drains life from his target.
spells.tooltip: Vladimir drains the lifeforce of his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

spells.name: Sanguine Pool
spells.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood becoming untargetable for 2 detik. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed dan Vladimir siphons life from them.
spells.tooltip:
Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood for 2 seconds, becoming untargetable and slowing enemies above him by 40%.

Vladimir deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [15% of bonus Health]) magic damage over the duration and heals himself for 12.5% of that amount.

spells.name: Tides of Blood
spells.description: Vladimir unleashes a torrent of blood, damaging surrounding enemies. Additionally, multiple Tides of Blood in a short period of time cause them to cost additional health dan memberikan additional damage, dan meningkatkan his healing dan regeneration by 8%.
spells.tooltip:
Vladimir unleashes a torrent of blood, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies.

Each cast gives him an Empowered stack (max 4), increasing his healing and regeneration by {{ e4 }}% each. Additionally, Tides of Blood cost and damage increases by 25% per stack.

spells.name: Hemoplague
spells.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration.  Hemoplague deals additional magic damage after a few detik to infected enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Vladimir infects the target area with a virulent plague, causing {{ e4 }}% increased damage for 5 seconds.

After 5 seconds, infected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

passive.name: Crimson Pact
passive.description: Setiap 40 point bonus health memberikan Vladimir 1 ability power dan setiap 1 point ability power memberikan Vladimir 1.4 bonus health (tidak stack dengan diri sendiri).

Volibear.name: Volibear
Volibear.title: the Thunder's Roar
allytips: Pimpin charge dengan Rolling Thunder dan men-slow musuh dengan Majestic Roar.
Volibear memanfaatkan tambahan health dan cooldown reduction.
Anda harus menyerang tigak kali dalam serangan yang cepat sebelum Frenzy dapat diaktifkan -- memiliki kekerasan untuk bertahan dalam waktu yang lama adalah cara untuk mencapai tujuan ini.

spells.name: Rolling Thunder
spells.description: Volibear drops to all fours dan runs faster. This bonus speed meningkatkan when chasing Champion musuh. The first enemy he attack is thrown backwards over Volibear.
spells.tooltip:
Volibear drops to all fours to hunt his enemies, gaining {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. This bonus is enhanced to {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed while moving toward enemy champions.

Volibear's next attack during this time deals an additional {{ e1 }} physical damage and flings the target behind him.

spells.name: Frenzy
spells.description: Volibear's repeated attack grant him additional Attack Speed.  Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage berdasarkan the target's health hilang.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Volibear gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed with each attack. Stacks up to {{ e2 }} times.

Active: When Volibear has {{ e2 }} stacks of Frenzy, he can bite an enemy to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e4 }}% of bonus Health]) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each {{ e5 }}% health the target is missing.

spells.name: Majestic Roar
spells.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages dan slows enemies. minion dan monster are feared as well.
spells.tooltip:
Volibear deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Minions and monsters are feared as well.

spells.name: Thunder Claws
spells.description: Volibear channels the power of the storm causing his attack to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip: Volibear channels the storm, causing all basic attacks for {{ e3 }} seconds to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, which chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.

passive.name: Chosen of the Storm
passive.description: Volibear meng-heal dengan cepat selama beberapa detik ketika health-nya turun ke level critical.

Warwick.name: Warwick
Warwick.title: the Blood Hunter
allytips: Warwick adalah Champion yang sangat cocok untuk membunuh monster di hutan. Hungering Strike dapat mempertahankan health Anda, terutama jika Anda mampu mendapatkan buff biru Ancient Golem.
Ultimate Warwick dapat men-stack efek on-hit seperti Black Cleaver atau Wit's End.

spells.name: Hungering Strike
spells.description: Takes a bite out of an enemy unit dan heals Warwick.
spells.tooltip: Strikes an enemy for the greater value between {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and {{ e2 }}% (+{{ a1 }}) of the target's maximum Health as magic damage (can only do flat damage to monsters), and heals Warwick for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.

spells.name: Hunters Call
spells.description: Warwick lets out a howl, increasing all nearby friendly Champion' Attack Speed for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Warwick lets out a howl that inspires all nearby allied champions, increasing Warwick's Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% and all nearby friendly champions' Attack Speed by half of that for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Blood Scent
spells.description: Warwick secara pasif mendeteksi Champion musuh yang lemah di sekelilingnya. Bau darah membuatnya menjadi marah, membuat dia bergerak dengan kecepatan yang luar biasa.
spells.tooltip: Toggle: Warwick senses enemy champions under 50% Health within {{ e1 }} distance of him; while he detects a low-health enemy, he gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

spells.name: Infinite Duress
spells.description: Warwick lunges at an Champion musuh, suppressing his target dan memberikan magic damage for a few detik.
spells.tooltip:
Warwick lunges in front of an enemy champion and suppresses them for {{ e2 }} seconds. During this time, Warwick attacks his victim {{ e4 }} times, dealing a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage (triggers on-hit effects {{ e4 }} times).

Warwick gains {{ e3 }}% Life Steal for the duration.

passive.name: Eternal Thirst
passive.description: Setiap serangan Warwick akan meng-heal dirinya. Setiap serangan beruntun kepada target yang sama akan mencuri lebih banyak lagi Health.

Xerath.name: Xerath
Xerath.title: the Magus Ascendant
allytips: Lebih mudah memberikan Arcanopulse pada musuh ketika mereka bergerak maju atau menjauh dari Anda, daripada menyamping.
Ketika meng-cast Locus of Power, Anda dapat mulai menyiapkan spell Anda berikutnya.
Rylai's Crystal Scepter akan membuat pemberian Arcanopulse setelah Mage Chains lebih mudah karena target akan di-slow.

spells.name: Arcanopulse
spells.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, memberikan magic damage to all targets hit.
spells.tooltip: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all targets hit.

spells.name: Locus of Power
spells.description: Xerath immobilizes himself near a source of magical power, increasing the range of all spells dan causing his magic damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Magic Resist. When the effect ends, Xerath's Movement Speed is increased for 2 detik.
spells.tooltip:
Xerath immobilizes himself near a source of magical power, increasing the range of all his spells and causing his magic damage to ignore {{ e2 }}% of his target's Magic Resist. Lasts {{ e1 }} seconds or until toggled off.

When the effect ends, Xerath's Movement Speed is increased by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Mage Chains
spells.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy dan marks them with Unstable Magic.  The next spell Xerath strikes this enemy with stuns them.
spells.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to an enemy and marks them with Unstable Magic.

Unstable Magic: The next spell Xerath strikes this enemy with stuns them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Arcane Barrage
spells.description: Calls down a blast of arcane energy, memberikan magic damage to all enemies in an area. May be cast hingga three times before going on cooldown.
spells.tooltip: Calls down a blast of arcane energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in an area. May be cast up to three times within {{ e2 }} seconds before going on cooldown.

passive.name: Ascended Form
passive.description: Xerath memakan arcane power, membuatnya bertahan atas physical damage. Dia mengubah 15% dari Ability Power-nya menjadi Armor.

XinZhao.name: Xin Zhao
XinZhao.title: the Seneschal of Demacia
allytips: Xin Zhao adalah pembuka yang hebat di pertarungan. Pimpin ke depan untuk memulai pertarungan dan gunakan ultimate Anda untuk melakukan damage terbesar jika memungkinkan.
Kadang layak mendapatkan setidaknya 1 point Battle Cry untuk mendapatkan efek pemulihan health.
Coba memposisikan diri Anda sehingga knockback ultimate Anda menjadi sangat efektif.

spells.name: Three Talon Strike
spells.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attack memberikan increased damage that reduce his other ability cooldowns, with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
spells.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) bonus physical damage and reduce his other abilities' cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air.

spells.name: Battle Cry
spells.description: Xin Zhao secara pasif heals every 3 attack dan can activate this ability to attack faster.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Xin Zhao heals himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) every third basic attack.

Active: Xin Zhao unleashes a battle cry, increasing his attack speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Audacious Charge
spells.description: Xin Zhao charges an enemy, memberikan damage dan slowing all enemies in the area.
spells.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges and challenges an enemy. The charge deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

spells.name: Crescent Sweep
spells.description: Xin Zhao fiercely sweeps his spear around him, memberikan damage to musuh di dekat berdasarkan their current health dan knocking them back.
spells.tooltip:
Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) plus 15% of target's current health in physical damage and knocks enemies back. Xin Zhao gains {{ e3 }} Armor and Magic Resistance for 6 seconds for each champion hit.

Challenge: If a challenged target is hit by the sweep, it is unaffected by the knockback.

passive.name: Challenge
passive.description: Xin Zhao menantang targetnya dengan basic attack dan Audacious Charge-nya, mengurangi armor sebesar 15% selama 3 detik.

Yorick.name: Yorick
Yorick.title: the Gravedigger
allytips: Omen of Pestilence dapat digunakan untuk menahan skillshot yang datang.
Omen of Death dapat menjadi lebih diandalkan jika Anda meng-cast-nya tepat sebelum sekutu mati, tetapi tidak begitu kuat.
Selama Omen of Death, Revenant dan Reanimated Chzampion dihitung sebagai sebuah summon terhadap bonus Unholy Covenant.

spells.name: Omen of War
spells.description: Yorick's next attack will memberikan bonus physical damage dan summon a Spectral Ghoul that deals additional damage dan moves faster than Yorick's other ghouls. While the Spectral Ghoul is alive, Yorick moves faster as well.
spells.tooltip:
Yorick's next attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and summon a Spectral Ghoul for up to 5 seconds.

The Spectral Ghoul deals {{ e2 }} additional damage per hit and moves {{ e3 }}% faster. While the ghoul is active, Yorick moves {{ e3 }}% faster as well.

spells.name: Omen of Pestilence
spells.description: Yorick summons a Decaying Ghoul that arrives with a violent explosion, memberikan damage dan slowing musuh di dekat. While the Decaying Ghoul remains alive, musuh di dekat continue to be slowed.
spells.tooltip: Yorick summons a Decaying Ghoul that arrives with a violent explosion, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing nearby enemies by {{ e1 }}% for 1.5 seconds. While the Decaying Ghoul remains alive, nearby enemies continue to be slowed by {{ e3 }}% for up to 5 seconds.

spells.name: Omen of Famine
spells.description: Yorick steals life from his target dan summons a Ravenous Ghoul that heals Yorick for the damage it deals.
spells.tooltip: Yorick deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and heals for up to {{ e5 }}% of the damage dealt. A Ravenous Ghoul is summoned behind his target for up to 5 seconds, healing Yorick for the damage it deals. The healing effect is halved against minions.

spells.name: Omen of Death
spells.description: Yorick conjures a revenant in the image of one of his allies. If his ally dies while its revenant is alive, the revenant sacrifices itself to reanimate them dan give them time to enact vengeance.
spells.tooltip:
Yorick conjures a revenant in the image of a target allied champion. Revenants deal {{ e1 }}% of target ally's Attack Damage and last for {{ e4 }} seconds. If his ally dies while its revenant is alive, the revenant sacrifices itself to reanimate them for up to {{ e4 }} seconds.

The revenant can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

passive.name: Unholy Covenant
passive.description: Yorick menerima pengurangan 5% damage dan basic attack-nya memberikan 5% lebih besar damage kepada setiap summon yang aktif. Sementara itu, ghoul si Yorick memiliki 35% dari Attack Damage dan Health Yorick.

Zac.name: Zac
Zac.title: the Secret Weapon
allytips: Memilih potongan yang baik sangat penting untuk bertahan hidup.
Ketika Cell Division telah siap, coba untuk mati dalam posisi yang membuat team musuh susah untuk membunuh bloblet Anda.
Men-charge Elastic Slingshot dari fog of war akan memberikan lawan sedikit waktu untuk bereaksi.

spells.name: Stretching Strike
spells.description: Zac extends his arms, slowing dan memberikan damage to musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip: Smacks enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

spells.name: Unstable Matter
spells.description: Zac's body erupts, damaging musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip: Zac's body erupts, dealing {{ e1 }} Magic Damage +{{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the enemy's maximum Health as Magic Damage to all nearby enemies (Max: {{ e5 }} damage against minions and monsters).

spells.name: Elastic Slingshot
spells.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground dan stretches back, launching himself forward.
spells.tooltip:
Charges up and launches towards a target area, knocking up enemies.
Zac faces the cursor and charges up over {{ e4 }} seconds. Reactivating the ability launches him towards his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to all enemies hit and knocking them back for 0.5 seconds.

Can be cancelled by moving.

spells.name: Let's Bounce!
spells.description: Zac launches into the air, gaining movement speed, dan slams down three times, Setiap kali damaging, slowing dan knocking up musuh di dekat.
spells.tooltip:
Zac bounces 4 times, knocking up and slowing enemies.
Each bounce deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to nearby enemies, knocks them up for 1 second, and slows them by {{ e5 }}% for 1 second. Enemies hit more than once take half damage and are not knocked up. Zac gains an accelerating movement speed buff ({{ e3 }}-{{ e4 }}%) and reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds and immobilizes by {{ e2 }}% while active.

Zac can right-click to move and can activate Unstable Matter while in the air.

passive.name: Cell Division
passive.description: Setiap kali Zac memukul musuh dengan ability, dia membagi dia membagi secuil dirinya yang dapat diserap kembali untuk memulihkan Health. Setelah menerima fatal damage, Zac membelah menjadi 4 bloblet yang mencoba untuk menyatu kembali. Jika salah satu bloblet bertahan setelah 8 detik, dia akan hidup kembali dengan sejumlah Health bergantung pada Health sisa bloblet yang bertahan. Setiap bloblet memiliki sebuah persentase dari maksimum Health, Armor dan Magic Resistance Zac. Ability ini memiliki 5 menit cooldown.

Zed.name: Zed
Zed.title: the Master of Shadows
allytips: Menyimpan energi dan dan spell cooldown hingga Anda menggunakan ultimate akan memaksimalkan damage Death Mark.
Dengan cepat men-tap ganda Living Shadow akan telport Zed ke bayangannya dengan segera untuk melarikan diri dengan cepat.
Menempatkan Living Shadow sebelum menggunakan Death Mark dapat memberikan Zed sebuah pelarian yang aman dari pertempuran.

spells.name: Razor Shuriken
spells.description: Zed dan his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, memberikan damage to any targets they pass through.
spells.tooltip:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy they pass through, and {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to each additional enemy.

Additional shurikens that hit the same enemy deal 50% less damage than the previous shuriken.

spells.name: Living Shadow
spells.description: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 4 detik, dan mimicking his spell casts.  Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow. Zed's Attack Damage is secara pasif increased.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e2 }}% additional bonus Attack Damage (+{{ f3 }}).

Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 4 seconds.
Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

Zed's shadows mimic his abilities. If an ability strikes any target twice, Zed restores {{ e3 }} energy. Energy can only be restored once per mimicked ability.

spells.name: Shadow Slash
spells.description: Zed dan his shadow spins their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy.  The shadow's spin slows.
spells.tooltip:
Zed and his shadow slash, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies.

Each enemy champion hit by Zed's Shadow Slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by 2 seconds.
Each enemy hit by a mimicked Shadow Slash will be slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Enemies hit by both Shadow Slashes will be slowed by {{ e3 }}% but will not take additional damage.

spells.name: Death Mark
spells.description: Zed dashes to target Champion, projecting a shadow behind them, dan marking the Champion for death. After 3 detik, the mark will trigger, memberikan a percentage of the damage Zed has dealt while the mark was active.
spells.tooltip:
Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to target enemy champion. Upon arrival, he marks the target for death and spawns a Living Shadow behind the target. This shadow lasts 4 seconds and mimics Zed's abilities. Reactivating Death Mark will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing physical damage equal to {{ a1 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of all magic and physical damage dealt to the target by Zed and his shadows while the mark was active.

passive.name: Contempt for the Weak
passive.description: Basic attack Zed terhadap target di bawah 50% health memberikan 8% dari maksimum health target sebagai bonus magic damage. Efek ini hanya dapat muncul sekali setiap 10 detik pada target yang sama.

Ziggs.name: Ziggs
Ziggs.title: the Hexplosives Expert
allytips: Bahkan jika Anda jauh dari pertempuran, Anda masih bisa membantu dari jauh dengan Mega Inferno Bomb.
Men-slow musuh Anda dengan Hexplosive Minefield membuatnya lebih mudah memberikan ability lainnya.
Mendorong diri sendiri melewati dinding dengan Satchel Charge dapat membantu ketika mengejar atau melarikan diri dari musuh.

spells.name: Bouncing Bomb
spells.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
spells.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

spells.name: Satchel Charge
spells.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 detik, atau when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.
spells.tooltip:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after {{ e2 }} seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, knocking them away.

Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

spells.name: Hexplosive Minefield
spells.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, memberikan magic damage dan slowing.
spells.tooltip:
Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies triggering a mine take 40% damage from additional mines. Mines disarm automatically after {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
spells.description: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those further away.
spells.tooltip: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies further away take {{ e2 }}% damage.

passive.name: Short Fuse
passive.description: Setiap 12 detik, Serangan Ziggs berikutnya memberikan bonus magic damage. Cooldown berkurang ketika Ziggs menggunakan ability.

Zilean.name: Zilean
Zilean.title: the Chronokeeper
allytips: Anda dapat mengkombinasikan penggunaan Time Bomb dan Rewind untuk meletakkan dua Time Bomb pada target dengan cepat. Menempatkan bom kedua akan meledakkan bom pertama.
Time Warp adalah cara yang efektif untuk membuat sekutu menghabisi musuh atau melarikan diri dari pertempuran yang kalah.

Chronoshift penghalang yang kuat untuk menyerang carry Anda, tetapi meng-cast Chronoshift terlalu awal dalam pertempuran dapat menyebabkan musuh berganti target terlalu cepat, membuatnya kurang efektif.

spells.name: Time Bomb
spells.description: Places a bomb on any unit, allied atau enemy, which detonates after 4 detik, memberikan area of effect damage.
spells.tooltip: Zilean places a time-delayed bomb on a target. After {{ e2 }} seconds this bomb will detonate, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all surrounding enemies.

spells.name: Rewind
spells.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of all of his other abilities.
spells.tooltip: Reduces all of Zilean's other spell cooldowns by {{ e2 }} seconds.

spells.name: Time Warp
spells.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed atau increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.
spells.tooltip: Zilean increases an allied champion's Movement Speed, or slows an enemy champion, by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Chronoshift
spells.description: Zilean menempaknan time rune pelindung pada Champion sekutu, teleport Champion kembali dalam waktunya jika mereka menerima lethal damage.
spells.tooltip: Zilean marks himself or an allied champion with a protective time rune for {{ e2 }} seconds. If the target would take lethal damage, they are instead transported back in time, regaining {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health.

passive.name: Heightened Learning
passive.description: Meningkatkan pertambahan experience dari semua Champion sekutu sebesar 8%.

Zyra.name: Zyra
Zyra.title: Rise of the Thorns
allytips: Meletakkan seed pada jalur spell Anda setelah Anda meng-castnya memberikan Anda kesempatan yang paling baik untuk memiliki seed di tempat yang benar.
Seed memberikan vision kepada team Anda.

Zyra adalah ambusher yang baik -- Cari kesempatan untuk menyiapkan perangkap seed dalam brush, kemudian pancing musuh untuk masukook for opportunities to set a trap of seeds in brush, then lure enemies in.

spells.name: Deadly Bloom
spells.description: Zyra grows a bud at target location.  After a brief delay, it explodes, launching damaging thorns at all musuh di dekat. If cast upon a seed, Deadly Bloom grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
spells.tooltip:
Thorns shoot from the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies within the area.

Rampant Growth: If Deadly Bloom hits a seed, a Thorn Spitter grows, dealing {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

spells.name: Rampant Growth
spells.description: Zyra plants a seed, granting vision of an area for hingga 30 detik. Other spells cast on seeds will turn them into plants, who fight for Zyra. Additionally secara pasif grants her Cooldown Reduction.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e2 }}% Cooldown Reduction.

Active: Plants a seed, lasting 30 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it will be destroyed but they will be revealed for 2 seconds.

Zyra stores a seed every {{ f1 }} seconds (Max: 2 seeds stored, 4 seeds planted).

Rampant Growth: Cast spells on seeds to grow plants. Plant damage is based on Zyra's level. Extra plants striking the same target deal 50% less damage.

spells.name: Grasping Roots
spells.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, memberikan damage dan rooting enemies they come across. If cast upon a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attack reduce enemy movement speed.
spells.tooltip:
Sends forward vines dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting enemies for {{ e5 }} second.

Rampant Growth: If Grasping Roots hits a seed, a Vine Lasher grows dealing {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by 30% for 2 seconds. Lasts 10 seconds.

spells.name: Stranglethorns
spells.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, memberikan damage to enemies as it expands dan knocking them airborne as it contracts.
spells.tooltip:
Summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket at target location which deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area as it expands. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward knocking enemies into the air.

Rampant Growth: Plants within the thicket are enraged, increasing their Attack Speed by 50%.

passive.name: Rise of the Thorns
passive.description: Ketika Zyra mati,  dia dengan cepat kembali ke plant form. Setelah 2 detik, dia dapat menekan sembarang ability untuk menembakkan Thorn ke arah kursor, memberikan true damage kepada setiap musuh yang dihantamnya.
